送料込みで５０００円以内で購入できますので試してみては
どうでしょうか。
ユーザーID：7362976202
めーぷる
2010年12月21日 16:24
我が家も夫婦そろって腰痛もちです。最近、いろいろ検討した結果むあつフトンを購入しました。かためが好きなのでスーパーハード。
なかなかいい感じです。最安値を探して２人分で10万円、ちょっと高いですけれど、長く使えて腰にもいいとなると、決して高価すぎる買い物ではなかったと満足しています。
検討の際に、低反発マットレスも視野に入れました。ただ、夏場を考えてやめました。低反発の商品はもともとが北欧とかヨーロッパからのものが多く、日本のような高温多湿の気候にはあまり適していないとのこと。夏は熱がこもって暑くて大変みたいです。たしかに、今テンピュールの枕を使っていますが、夏はやわらかいし冬は固めだし、一度体温で温まるとしばらくは抜けないです。あれがマットレス全体だと思うと夏は怖いな〜。
ただ、むあつフトンを使う際は、湿気対策をしないとカビを生やすことになるので注意です。すのこをや除湿マットを敷いたり、定期的に干す（天日じゃなくていい）ことが必要ですが、たいした手間でもないです。
今のところ快適快眠できて、大満足！お勧めですよ。
ユーザーID：8807087242
あいたたた
2010年12月21日 16:35
腰痛は運動しないと治りません。
痛みをかばっていると、ますます痛みが酷くなります。
ユーザーID：9103740991
janmama
2010年12月21日 16:43
椎間板ヘルニアもちで２回入院していますが、布団はムアツふとんにしています。値段が少し高いかもしれませんが、腰痛もちにはお勧めですよ。寝起きに腰が痛いことはそんなにありません。
体に合わないソファーは腰に悪いので、テレビを見る時は腰に腰枕（テンピュール？テンピューロ？）を敷いて、ねっころがって見ています。
ユーザーID：1834898410
ザッツ
2010年12月21日 18:17
バスタオルを４つに畳んで、腰の下にしいてます。寝る前に腰痛を感じたときは、枕に足をのせて寝ています。
家の固めのマットでも、ホテル利用時の柔らかめのマットにおいても有効でしたよ。
今晩にもお試しを。
ユーザーID：1730827943
腰痛(トピ主)
2010年12月21日 19:14
レスと共に、腰痛を理解して下さる方がいらっしゃる事に嬉しさを感じました。
（皆様、御自愛くださいませ）
あの強烈な痛み！！起きる事もままなりませんでした。
あの痛みがまた起こるのかと思うと悪夢です。。。
ところで無圧ふとんとは、腰痛に良いとは初めて知りました。
ＣＭでは良く耳にしてた様に思いますが。
私は、固いのが良いのかと思い込み、スノコか畳かと考えてました。
でも、ＴＶ通販で、トゥルースリー○ーというのを目にして、それが良いかな？と。
低反発マットレスですよね？
やはり、スノコなどより良いのでしょうか？
早速検討してみます。
引き続き、レスお待ちしております。
ユーザーID：3041555732
通りすがり
2010年12月21日 20:43
ニトリの低反発腰枕使ってます。
ユーザーID：1023277586
腰痛仲間
2010年12月21日 20:48
専門家ではありませんが、背骨はほどよく湾曲していないといけないそうです。つまり、硬い寝具で背中を真っ直ぐにしようとするとかえって腰痛の原因になるそうです。私はS川の○アツふとんにして腰痛から開放されました。あなたにとって確実に効果があるとは断定できませんので、あくまで私個人の体験として参考にしてください。
ユーザーID：4663745271
ホットケーキ
2010年12月21日 23:41
クッション（またはバスタオルを４つ折りくらいにしたもの）を
入れています。
脚が伸びていると、体がエビ反りになります。
実際には、体の下には布団があるのでわかりませんが、フローリングの
床に直に寝てみるとわかります。腰の下（体と床の間）に手が入るようなら
エビ反りになっているということです。
背中の筋肉が柔らかい人（腰痛になりにくい人）は、床と体の間に隙間は
できないそうです。
エビ反りになると脚の重さが腰に掛かって腰痛を引き起こします。
床に寝たまま膝を立てるようにして軽く曲げてみてください。
腰が床に着きませんか？この状態を保つため、クッションを膝の下に
入れています。但し、クッションが新しくて高さがあると逆につらいので
少しくたびれたものがいいです。
ユーザーID：1156257662
ばうわう
2010年12月22日 10:01
と、良いようです。
ワタクシも酷い腰痛で苦しみました。
ここ二〜三年は大分楽になりましたが、今でもケアはしております。
人間はお尻が後ろに出ていてウエストが引っ込んでいますよね。
この「腰椎の自然なカーブのカタチを保つ」ようにするのが良いようです。
バスタオルを腰に敷くのも良いですが、寝返りもすると思いますので、
「バスタオルを縦に三つ折りにして腰に当たる部分にさらにハンドタオルを入れて、腰に巻く」
のがお勧めです。
ワタクシはウエストは80cm以上あると思いますが、お腹の部分でバスタオルを結んでいます。
最近話題のマッケンジー法のロビン・マッケンジーさんの本にも同様の商品が紹介されています。
つまり、寝返りをしても腰の自然なカーブを保つように後ろが厚めの腰ベルトを身体に巻くのです。
また、仰向けで寝るときに膝を伸ばすのは腰に良くないとも聞きました。
ワタクシは膝の下には枕を置いて寝ております。
寝具は畳の上に布団だけです。
なかなか良くはなりませんが、悪くはならないみたいです。
お大事に。
ユーザーID：5083617410
めーぷる
2010年12月22日 10:07
人間の体、横になると腰が一番沈みますよね。で、柔らかすぎる寝具だと、腰が沈みすぎて悪い姿勢になり、腰が痛くなる。というのがよくあるパターン。
もしトピ主さんの腰痛が病気（ヘルニアとか）のせいではなく単に寝具のせいであるのなら、まずは簡単にその腰の沈みすぎをなくせばいいはずです。
私が以前やっていたのは、腰の来るあたりにバスタオルを折って敷くということ。そんなに厚く折らなくても、敷くと違いはわかると思います。
また、枕との関係も結構重要。高すぎる枕はＮＧです。適度な高さについては、ネットで調べるといろいろあると思うんで。私はこれまたバスタオルを使って自分にあった高さにして寝ていたときがありました。ためしてガッテンでやっていました。寝返りがしやすかったな。
寝具による腰痛は、脊椎が悪い姿勢になるから起こりやすいので、腰周辺だけでなく、首周りも含めトータルでよい形で寝られるようにするのがベスト。そういう面ではムアツふとんは優秀だなと思います。ムアツふとんの効果についても、これまたネットで調べてみて。欲しくなっちゃうかもよ。

description.hltext_display: How to Attract Your Ex Girlfriend Back - 2 Techniques That Work Like a Charm
description.content:
It's not easy having to deal with feeling like you want to get a chance to attract your ex girlfriend back. When you think about your ex girlfriend, you probably get a mix of emotions, a part of you thinks that maybe you should move on, and another part of you wants to hang on and find a way to get her back. Ultimately, only you can make the final decision, but you should know that it can be kind of easy to win her back, as long as you are using the right techniques to try and make it happen.
What happens to a lot of guys is, they get discouraged because they don't immediately know what the right things to do are, and that can kind of make the whole situation seem a lot more dramatic than it has to be. However, getting her back can actually be the easy part, it's keeping her after you win her back that tends to be the real challenge.
Here are 2 techniques that work like a charm to attract an ex girlfriend back to you:
1) Play it cool, like the break up never even bothered you.
Most women expect that when they break up with a guy, his natural response is to get upset and try and try as much as he can to win her back and change her mind. She won't be surprised at all if this is what you do. However, if you play it off like the break up never even bothered you, now you are throwing her for a loop. And that is going to make her get curious and a little intrigued, and that can lead to attraction. Does it always work? No, but more often than not, it does get her thinking about you again, which is a good start.
2) In a subtle way, weave your way back into her life.
Usually when it comes to women and relationships, the more subtle you are about things, the better. When the woman happens to be your ex girlfriend, subtle is definitely a good thing. Getting back with her by slowly waving your way back into her life is an effective way to get in there without her realizing that you are trying to win her back. Hang out with her again, flirt with her, but don't come right out and let her know that you are trying to win her back. Send her some clever mixed signals and you will drive her crazy with wonder, which can lead to her wanting YOU back.

description.hltext_display: UNH demographer: 2010 census shows slow growth in New England: New Hampshire posts greatest regional gains
description.content:
DURHAM — The first data from the 2010 Census shows that New England grew more slowly than the rest of the United States between 2000 and 2010, with New Hampshire the fastest-growing state in the region, according to Kenneth Johnson, professor of sociology at the University of New Hampshire and senior demographer at UNH's Carsey Institute.
New England grew by 559,000 residents during the decade. The region's population was 14,481,000 on April 1, 2010. The population gain of 4 percent in New England was smaller than in the United States as a whole, which was 9.9 percent.
Among New England states, New Hampshire grew at the fastest rate (6.9 percent) and Rhode Island at the slowest rate (. 7 percent). In terms of raw numbers, Massachusetts had the largest absolute population gain at 211,000, while Rhode Island gained only 7,000 residents.
"Nearly all of the population gain in New England was because of the excess of births over deaths. In all, such natural increase accounted for 463,000 of the total population gain. Migration accounted for the remaining 96,000 new residents. The minimal migration gain in New England was because of immigration. Many more people left New England for other U.S. destinations than came to it during the decade," Johnson said.
New Hampshire and Maine received the largest net percent gains in migration. This migration gain, coupled with natural increase, caused New Hampshire to grow faster than other states in the region. Massachusetts and Rhode Island both suffered migration losses. Minimal migration gains combined with modest natural increase caused the slow population growth in the region. This slow growth caused Massachusetts to lose one of its 10 Congressional seats.
@Subhead:N.H.'s Population Gains Greatest in Region, but Still Modest
New Hampshire is the fastest growing of the New England states, with its gain fueled both by more births than deaths and by migration, Johnson said. New Hampshire's gain from natural increase was 3.7 percent because it had 45,000 more births than deaths during the decade, according to recent census estimates. In contrast, Maine, which had the least natural increase in the region, grew by only 1 percent from natural increase. The smaller excess of births over deaths in Maine is because its population is considerably older, resulting in higher mortality.
New Hampshire also gained 40,000 migrants, a 3.3 percent gain. Only Maine at 3.6 percent had a larger gain from migration. In contrast, both Massachusetts and Rhode Island experienced overall migration losses.
"Both Maine and New Hampshire's population growth has slowed recently because of reduced migration to the state. The economic recession is the primary reason for this because it makes it more difficult for people to move because of concerns about selling homes and jobs. In contrast, Massachusetts has benefited from the slowdown in migration because of the recession because fewer people have left the state to move elsewhere in the United States," Johnson said.

description.hltext_display: Know the Lie Detector in the Brain
description.content:
A circuit in the brain that functions like a lie detector, has been discovered by Scientists from Oxford University.
Humans have the ability to imagine what others are thinking and learn from their social habits - giving them clues as to when something is incorrect. The findings could also help explain why some people become paranoid, reports the Daily Mail.
Lead author Matthew Rushworth, of Oxford University, and colleagues scanned volunteers' brains while they chose one to two boxes to win points.
The participants were sent advice on which box to choose from a second player who was sometimes dishonest.
When the volunteers suspected they were being lied to, activity levels in the dorsomedial prefrontal cortex (DPFC), an area near the front of the brain, rose dramatically.
If a volunteer thought the player was telling the truth the brain activity remained low.
If their suspicions were proved wrong, the brain activity changed, suggesting the volunteers needed to rethink their opinion of the second player.
The activity was predicting how trustworthy the advice would be, then reacting to the results of that prediction.
Failures of this system could explain why those with schizophrenia are often paranoid.
The work was presented at a Cell Press Lablinks conference in London earlier this month.Source-ANI

description.hltext_display: iPhone程序成用户隐私最大泄密工具
description.content:
订东北网彩信手机报，移动发TX到10628007，联通发DBWY到1065566600，电信发DBWY到10628999。东北网手机版 3g.dbw.cn
根据美国媒体近期的一项调查显示，智能手机似乎已经成为泄露用户隐私的最常用工具。这些智能手机不仅记录着自身手机号码、当前所处位置，而且有时候还能获取手机用户的真实姓名。它们似乎生来就是专门用于记录、获取并泄露用户隐私而设计生产的。
有美国媒体对当前iPhone和Android智能手机使用的101款主流智能手机应用程序进行了一项测试，这些程序包括游戏和其他常用软件。测试结果显示，在用户毫不知情的条件下，其中有56款应用程序曾经将智能手机的设备识别码发送给了其他公司，有47款程序以各种方式向第三方发送了手机当前所在位置，另外还有5款程序泄露了用户的年龄、性别和其他个人信息。
这项调查结果表明，为了收集用户个人数据信息以充实自身用户数据库，在线追踪公司可谓无所不用其极。
在此次测试的程序中，iPhone一款名为TextPlus 4的文本发送程序成为向第三方传输信息最多的程序。该程序不仅曾经将手机的独有识别码发送给了八家广告公司，而且还向其中的两家公共公司发送过手机用户的年龄和性别。
全球移动营销协会(Mobile Marketing Association)的一位主管迈克尔贝克尔(Michael Becker)表示：“在移动领域，根本没有秘密可言。手机无时无处不在。”
苹果公司表示，在每款iPhone程序上市前该公司都会对其进行严格的测试。苹果和谷歌也都纷纷表示，为了保护用户的隐私，它们设计的应用程序只有在获得用户授权的前提下才能够向第三方传输或发送包括当前位置等各种信息。(志强)

description.hltext_display: Precios del gas natural aumentaron 9,7% en la Región Metropolitana en enero-noviembre
description.content:
en Valparaíso y concepción se mantuvieron sin grandes VARIACIONES, pero más altos que en Santiago
Silvia Véliz Poblete
En la Región Metropolitana es donde las tarifas del gas natural han experimentado un mayor incremento durante 2010.
De acuerdo a cifras recopiladas por la Comisión Nacional de Energía (CNE), entre enero y noviembre, los valores para un consumo referencial de 58 m3 en el Gran Santiago han fluctuado entre los $ 35.063 y los
$ 38.465, lo que representa un incremento de 9,7%.
De acuerdo a lo señalado por Metrogas -empresa que abastece de gas natural a la Región Metropolitana- "las tarifas dependen de factores competitivos, entre éstos, las variaciones del petróleo y sus derivados, manteniéndose siempre en niveles convenientes, lo que ha permitido aumentos considerables en el volumen de ventas de m3 en todos los segmentos (residencial, comercial e industrial) en que participa".
En tanto, para un consumo de 116 m3 el alza fue en los primeros 11 meses del año de un 9,22%.
En regiones
Las regiones de Valparaíso, del Biobío, de Antofagasta y de Magallanes son abastecidas de gas natural y la situación en cada una de ellas es diferente a la de Santiago.
En el caso de la Región de Valparaíso, donde opera GasValpo y Energas, las tarifas -para un consumo de 58 m3- han variado un 5,99% en el año, pasando de $ 40.088 a $ 42.493.
En Concepción, abastecen de gas natural, GasSur e Intergas y las tarifas durante 2010 se han mantenido en $ 42.505 y en $ 47.963, respectivamente, sin registrar ningún tipo de variación.
Lipigas es el distribuidor de gas natural en la Región de Antofagasta y para un consumo de 58 m3 ofreció valores similares a los de la Región Metropolitana.
En enero registraba una tarifa de $ 36.313 y en noviembre $ 34.551, lo que representa una baja de 4,85%.
En Magallanes, el escenario es distinto, ya que las tarifas son considerablemente más bajas y fluctúan entre los $ 5.058 y los $ 5.190 para el consumo referencial de 58 m3.

description.hltext_display: Sarah Palin Mocks US First Lady's Anti-obesity Drive
description.content:
Sarah Palin is picking a fight with the US First Lady - over dessert.
In a recent episode of her TLC reality show, the former Alaska Governor mocked Michelle Obama for her efforts to stem childhood obesity, reports the New York Daily News. "This is in honor of Michelle Obama, who said the other day we should not have dessert," Palin said mockingly as she rummaged through her kitchen cupboards for graham crackers, marshmallows and chocolate.
Palin was apparently referring to a speech Obama gave during the NAACP's annual conference for childhood obesity in July, when she said, "As I tell my kids, 'Dessert is not a right.'"
While Obama's program does not explicitly tell parents to avoid dessert, it suggests cutting back on sugar.
It was the second time in a month Palin has bashed the First Lady's calorie-curbing movement.
"What she is telling us is she cannot trust parents to make decisions for their own children, for their own families in what we should eat," she told radio host Laura Ingraham last month.Source-ANI

Leaders in Interior fit out sector provide specialist solution for Netherlands Consulate-General
description.content:
Working hand-in-hand with revered Dutch-based design firm, Jorissen Simonetti Architects, Summertown Interiors have co-ordinated and executed a project that is incomparably unique in it's requirements and client expectations.
Located in the premium positioned Al Habtoor Business Tower in Dubai Marina, the project for the recently occupied Netherlands Consulate-General represents a marked achievement in interior solutions, providing a fit-out that speaks to the Consulate-General's place as a commercial, cultural and consular foothold in the region.The primary aim was to create an interior that embraced the modern, minimalist feel that characterises European design, catering to the Consulate's client base and creating an identity that is truly Dutch in nature. The pre-designed project was expertly handled by Jorissen Simonetti with Summertown taking an applied approach managing the project on-site. Taking responsibility for liaising with suppliers in sourcing products, both locally and from overseas in addition to to co-ordinating municipality approvals and the like, Summertown's strengths lie in their unparalleled standards in project management, taking the challenges of creating a fit-out into their own hands on behalf of the client. As a Consulate-General, putting the project into action inevitably required the delivery of specialist materials, ranging from bullet proof glass partitions provided from Dutch manufacturer Unispace, and state-of-the-art security systems. To facilitate this, Summertown's involvement on the project exceeded that of general project management, offering detailed workshop drawings that allowed ease of installation of products across the board from a number of suppliers. Collaborating with the Consulate-General and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs on Jorrissen Simonetti's design Summertown completed demolition works of an area of the interior to incorporate a stairwell that would connect two floors internally within the office area, illustrating Summertown's flexibile approach to this interior fit-out project."Working with Summertown Interiors over the course of the project was a pleasant, trouble free experience. Not only were activities regarding architects Jorrisen Simonetti design syncronised harmoniously but we were highly impressed with the expertise and experience that Summertown brought to the table.Taking control of the finer details on site that are parliamentary in delivering a high quality fit-out, positions Summertown as a real leader in this area" commented Stephan van de Wall, Consul and Head of the Economic Department - Netherlands Consulate-General.
Press Enquiries:Amy Walker+971 4 369 3569Omar Abdraboo+971 4 369 3575About Summertown InteriorsBy collaborating with our clients we enable the achievement of green environmentally friendly, functional, timeless and inspiring workspaces that employees will love coming to work to.Offering superior quality interior solutions on a complete turnkey fit-out basis, Summertown Interiors' solutions are creative and inspirational within the framework of feasibility and budget, incorporating the latest technology and global trends. Each project reflects and incorporates the brand at hand and encapsulates the culture and philosophy of each individual client.The Summertown Interiors team is made up of: architects, planners, and project managers who interpret client requirements and suggest solutions prior and during the projects development stage. All projects are executed under quality standards and are ISO 9001 certified.Summertown's joinery company was the first joinery in the UAE to be ISO certified, and all facets of the company perform under the ISO quality management system. ISO 9001-2008 Certification covers the design and execution of turnkey interior projects, manufacture and installation of joinery works, and the supply and installation of office furniture.Summertown Interiors has made its mark as the first interior and turnkey fit-out contractor to occupy a Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design (LEED) Gold Standard- certified interiors in their new corporate headquarters and showroom in JAFZA. The showroom showcases the company's capabilities and social responsibilities in a fully-functional green environment.

description.hltext_display: City Council votes to make legal advice off-limits to public
description.content:
The Salt Lake Tribune
Updated 38 minutes ago Updated Dec 22, 2010 12:52AM
Ogden • The City Council voted 5-2 Tuesday to usher in some new rules and procedures for how it functions, among them two changes that stirred controversy.
The first involved implementing a secret straw-poll procedure to select the council chair and vice-chair each year, which would then be ratified by a public vote. Salt Lake City Council currently uses that method.
The second instructs council members that legal opinions and advice they’ve received on city matters should not be publicly disclosed.
One resident spoke out against both of these changes, asking that the Council remove the “secrecy items” from their procedures.
“Everything the council does is political,” said watchdog Dan Schroeder.
“I think the straw poll would make the council less accountable,” he added, urging the council to keep their deliberations and votes public.
Schroeder also questioned the council’s need to address the attorney-client privilege issue in its rules.
“If council members feel they should disclose information, they should consider it carefully,” Schroeder said, adding that Ogden Mayor Matthew Godfrey uses that discretion when it’s to his advantage.
Story continues below
Published Dec 21, 2010 11:30:02PM 2 Comments
Published Dec 21, 2010 10:53:53PM 2 Comments
Published Dec 16, 2010 07:11:02PM 0 Comments
Council members Amy Wicks and Susan Van Hooser voted against the new rules and procedures.
“We should do the people’s business in public,” Wicks said.
Council Chairwoman Natalie Gochnour was among the five who voted in favor of the new framework, viewing the straw poll as a way to strengthen council relationships.
“I feel we are very transparent,” Gochnour said. “And I think it’s a long-standing American tradition to have the right to a private ballot.”
The new rules also reiterate that council members will get a pay raise in 2012. That ordinance was unanimously approved this summer, based on recommendations from a human resource study comparing Ogden to other cities with the same strong mayor form of government.
The ordinance also gave the mayor’s salary a boost.
In other related action, the council, acting as the city’s Redevelopment Agency board, approved an amended development agreement for the four-story hotel that former House Majority Leader Kevin Garn and Western States Lodging LLC plan to build in the city’s downtown Junction project.
A $3 million underground parking garage — to be funded by the hotel owner through a special assessment levy — was scrapped based on the developer’s negotiations with US Bank.
Copyright 2010 The Salt Lake Tribune. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
Utah News
78 Comments

Article Tools
» Comments ( 10 )

At a glance
—
Ogden’s elected officials to get raises in 2012
The City Council chair currently makes $10,917 per year. That will increase 27 percent to $13,884. The vice chair makes $9,860, which rises 30 percent to $12,888. Council members are now paid $8,804, which increases 34 percent to $11,880.
The mayor currently receives an annual salary of $88,000. That jumps to $108,000 in 2012, a 23-percent boost.

双料冠军获奖无悬念 红牛被ESPN评为F1最佳车队
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：由于在2010赛季取得了年度双料冠军的优异成绩，红牛车队被ESPN的F1频道评选为年度最佳车队。参加投票的包括传奇车手斯特灵・莫斯爵士、三届F1世界冠军杰基・斯图尔特爵士和雷诺车队大股东杰拉德・洛佩兹等。
在之前已经公布的得奖者中，年度世界冠军红牛小将塞巴斯蒂安・维特尔荣膺ESPNF1的年度最佳车队。而红牛的获奖也是在意料之中的。2010赛季的他们表现优异，共获得15次杆位及9场分站冠军。
车队老板克里斯蒂安・霍纳在得知获奖后显得很高兴，他说：“能被ESPNF1票选为年度最佳车队，这真是太棒了。感谢每一位投票者。”
“对我们来说这是一个不可思议的赛季，我们获得了四次‘1-2名’完赛、9场分站胜利、15个杆位和两个世界冠军头衔。这实现了我们在赛季初就制定下的最高目标。这得感谢全队上下的努力工作、感谢我们所有的赞助商、感谢每一位支持红牛的人及来自马特斯希茨先生的坚定不移的支持。现在，我们要在这一成就的基础上去面对2011赛季的挑战。”霍纳最后说道。

description.hltext_display: Caso de virus ISA en Aysén divide aguas y desata malestar en la industria salmonera
description.content:
TRAS DECLARACIÓN DE UN NUEVO BROTE EN UN CENTRO DE CULTIVO DE LA FIRMA ACUINOVA
Cristián Candia H.
Luego del registro de un nuevo caso de brote de virus ISA reportado a principios de diciembre por el Servicio Nacional de Pesca (Sernapesca) en Aysén, que aparentemente, podría ser considerado "como un episodio normal" dentro del comportamiento esperado de una enfermedad que se manifestó con tanta fuerza en el país, se escondía una trama anterior que encendió los ánimos de la industria salmonera.
Fuentes del sector reconocieron que el alcance del hecho fue analizado en una reunión de SalmonChile, donde los involucrados en el tema, la empresa Acuinova, filial salmonera del grupo español Pescanova; Sernapesca; y representantes de otras firmas, dieron cuenta de cómo se gestó la problemática en torno a una declaración del ISA, en un proceso que, acusan, no se trató con la prolijidad en la información que se pretende para resguardar el patrimonio sanitario.
Cronología del caso
Un informe denominado "Caso Butan 1", con fecha diciembre de 2010, registró la cronología de cómo se fueron sucediendo estos hechos.
El documento relata que el 1 de diciembre en la página web de Sernapesca apareció una clasificación inesperada de ISA, "en observación", y en la que se incluyó a los centros Abato, de AquaChile, y Butan 1 de Acuinova.
Aquí surgieron los primeros reparos, porque días después, el 10 de diciembre, este último centro fue catalogado como brote virus ISA en proceso de cosecha, lo cual derivó en una serie de suspicacias al accionar de Sernapesca en la información proporcionada.
Una fuente del sector, aseguró que en este caso, Sernapesca mostró un déficit en cuanto a la información, porque si bien las empresas secuencian sus propios virus, es este organismo el que está haciendo muestras permanentes y, teóricamente, debiera publicarlo en su página web. Ocurrió que Sernapesca el 2 de diciembre detectó HPR7B (cepa altamente patógena) y recién el 10 lo informó; lo que generó una incerteza.
A esto se sumó que en agosto pasado, el mismo centro presentó un muestreo positivo al ISA, con niveles bajos de carga del virus que impidieron que se pudiera secuenciar al patógeno, y que significó que esta unidad fuera clasificada como sospechosa. La contramuestra de laboratorio arrojó negativo.
Transcurrido eso, el 19 de noviembre se registró un hallazgo de ISA (sospechan de un HPRO) mediante un muestreo de la propia compañía, que también debido a la imposibilidad de secuenciarlo fue imposible aislar de inmediato y, por lo cual, la autoridad visó la cosecha en well-boat, restringiendo su circulación de agua en ciertos tramos donde estaban presenten otras firmas.
Ante esta nueva situación una de las críticas que se hace es que Sernapesca, sabiendo de un resultado positivo en agosto, no informó en última instancia al barrio comprometido para que las empresas adoptaran las medidas de bioseguridad y siembra según sus análisis, ya que todos los centros sembrados en la zona, están expuestos al virus y el riesgo mayor es no haber informado. Acuinova insistió que el centro no dio positivo.
Sin embargo, el 2 de diciembre, Sernapesca informó a la firma que el virus ISA aislado del centro Butan 1 era de cepa altamente patógena, pero la jaula muestreada ya estaba cosechada.
Fuentes de esta industria advirtieron que esto pudo contribuir a diseminar el patógeno, y aunque el well boat en que se realizó el traslado era de sistema cerrado, la descarga se efectuó en agua de mar en los denominados viveros. Acuinova informó que se trataba de peces con SRS y que la descarga fue autorizada, debido a que no habían más centros en producción en la zona.
Lo anterior derivó en suspicacias respecto de la información que se entregó y desde el rubro comentaron que no se puede proceder de esta manera, pues podría volver a generarse una crisis sanitaria. Para evitar esto, Sernapesca entregó a Intensal una propuesta del nuevo plan de contingencia ISA, mientras tabto ante cualquier resultado positivo, las firmas del barrio involucradas serán comunicadas en la fecha del resultado positivo.

订东北网彩信手机报，移动发TX到10628007，联通发DBWY到1065566600，电信发DBWY到10628999。东北网手机版 3g.dbw.cn
看点：Super AMOLED触控屏、1GHz处理器、智能bada系统
三星 S8500
外观方面，三星S8500采用的是大屏幕全触控设计，手机正面配备了一块尺寸为3.3英寸，分辨率为480×800像素的电容式Super AMOLED屏幕。S8500机身外壳采用了全铝机身，质感非常强大，机身的三围为118×56×10.9mm，显得非常轻薄,机身虽然轻薄也很霸气，但始终有股说不出的“三星味”，喜欢的人会觉得这是美的延续，不喜欢的人会觉得审美疲劳。
三星 S8500
配置方面，三星S8500搭载了一枚主频为1Ghz的ARM Cortex A8处理器，配合所使用的三星bada智能操作系统，整机运行十分流畅，软件的拓展性也不错。另外，该机还内置有WIFI、GPS等功能。
三星 S8500
编辑点评：
三星S8500大屏设计，拥有Super AMOLED魔幻炫屏设计，搭载了一枚主频为1Ghz的ARM Cortex A8处理器。

US poised to approve nuclear arms pact with Russia
description.content:
Posted:
Updated:
Wednesday, December 22, 2010 3:29 AM EST
Most Popular Stories
National News More>>
AP National Video More>>

Downward-facing dogs to jobs? Free yoga for the unemployed aims to chill out the out-of-work
Senate set for historic vote to repeal military's 'don't ask, don't tell' policy on gays
Obama pushes for Senate ratification of nuclear arms treaty with Russia in weekly address
Steel construction at 1 WTC, still known by many as Freedom Tower, reaches halfway mark
Prosecutors: 700K Ecstasy tabs seized in northeast Atlanta; Customs agent, 13 others charged
Seeking other victims, LAPD releases photos of women found in home of suspected serial killer
Bill preventing big tax hikes for millions of Americans goes to Obama; to sign into law Friday
Las Vegas' Neon Boneyard highlights city's glitzy history in unique electronic graveyard
Bill preventing big tax hikes for millions of Americans goes to Obama; to sign into law Friday
Associate Press
WASHINGTON (AP) - The Senate is poised to approve a nuclear arms pact with Russia, handing President Barack Obama a huge victory on his top foreign policy priority.
Passage of the New START treaty appeared assured after 11 Republicans joined Democrats in a vote Tuesday to end debate on the pact. That signaled that Obama should have the two-thirds majority he needs when the Senate votes on final approval Wednesday.
The approval would mark a big comeback for Obama's arm controls efforts after the treaty appeared all but dead just weeks ago. It also would allow Obama to continue efforts to improve relations with Russia.
Ratification would mark a third recent major political victory for Obama, even though his Democratic party was trounced in last month's congressional elections. In recent days he won passage of a bipartisan tax deal and a vote ending the ban on gays openly serving in the military.
"We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons," Foreign Relations Committee Chairman John Kerry, a Democrat, said after the vote.
The treaty would limit each country's strategic nuclear warheads to 1,550, down from the current ceiling of 2,200. It also would establish a system for monitoring and verification. U.S. weapons inspections ended last year with the expiration of a 1991 treaty.
The administration was adamant that it be ratified this year because the Democrats' majority in the Senate is set to shrink by five in January and waiting could have meant months of delay or defeat.
Republicans accused Democrats of rushing approval of the treaty for political reasons. They have asserted it would limit U.S. missile defense options and argued it has insufficient procedures to verify Russia's adherence.
When Jon Kyl, the leading Republican on negotiations over the treaty, suggested a delay last month, Obama appeared unlikely to find the nine Republican votes needed for passage.
But he and top members of his administration lobbied intensely, with Obama postponing his Christmas vacation in Hawaii. They enlisted support from top military officials and big-name Republicans from past administrations who argued the treaty was essential for U.S. national security.
In the end, they persuaded enough Republicans to defy the party's top two leaders in the Senate and support the pact.
"We know when we've been beaten," Republican Sen. Orrin Hatch told reporters hours before Tuesday's vote.
Even the Senate's No. 3 Republican, Lamar Alexander, endorsed the accord, saying he was assured U.S. defenses would not be weakened.
The treaty will leave the United States "with enough nuclear warheads to blow any attacker to kingdom come," Alexander said on the Senate floor.
Republicans had tried to kill the treaty by forcing changes in its language that would have sent it back for negotiations with Moscow. Democrats were working to appease some Republican senators by letting them raise these issues in legislation accompanying the treaty that would not directly affect the treaty.
Most Republicans remained opposed.
"The administration did not negotiate a good treaty," Kyl said. "They went into the negotiations it seems to me with the attitude with the Russians just like the guy who goes into the car dealership and says, 'I'm not leaving here until I buy a car.'"
Though Kyl looks likely to vote on the losing side of the debate over the treaty, in his negotiations with the administration he did win Obama's commitment to modernize the remaining nuclear arsenal with projected spending of $85 billion over 10 years.
Some of that money is now in the pipeline, contained in a stopgap government funding bill that cleared Congress on Tuesday. The measure would finance the government, mostly at current levels, through March 4.
It makes an exception for nuclear security programs, allowing the government to spend money to modernize the United States' nuclear arsenal at a rate equal to Obama's $624 million request.

The administration did not negotiate a good treaty
with enough nuclear warheads to blow any attacker to kingdom come
We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons

description.hltext_display: 莎娃有望首次亮相悉尼赛 超人气巨星享贵宾待遇
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：前世界排名第一的俄罗斯网球名将莎拉波娃将很有可能持外卡首次出战下个月揭幕的悉尼国际网球赛。
根据早已制定好的参赛计划，莎拉波娃将于1月3-8日在新西兰角逐奥克兰精英赛，此后她决定是否前往澳洲海港城市悉尼亮相。通常赛事组委会在比赛开始一周前就颁发完所有外卡，很显然莎拉波娃享受到了贵宾待遇，这也充分说明即使她不在巅峰状态，但她仍然是当今世上最受关注的网球选手之一。
悉尼保险国际赛将于1月9-15日进行，在签表出来之前，赛事方负责人克雷格・沃特森都将为三届大满贯冠军得主莎拉波娃保留参赛资格。
"我很希望在签表中看到她的名字，我也很想看到她的大批球迷来悉尼观看比赛。"克雷格在周三表示。"我接到玛利亚（莎拉波娃）经纪人的消息，他问是否能为她保留一张外卡，因为她可能决定要来悉尼比赛。"
"玛利亚无疑是世界上最受欢迎的选手之一，不仅在网球界，在整个女子网坛她都很有人气。俄罗斯女选手过去几年来在悉尼保险国际赛上都有不错的表现，我相信无论是场地还是配套设施都会对她的澳网备战有帮助。"
今年23岁的莎拉波娃此前从来没有参加过悉尼国际赛。如果最终她能成行，这项男女联合赛事的参赛阵容将更加强大。截至目前七位世界前十的女选手都将出战，其中包括排名前三的沃兹尼亚奇、兹沃娜列娃和克里斯特尔斯，澳洲头号女单斯托瑟、法网冠军斯齐亚沃尼、前世界第一扬科维奇和白俄罗斯少女阿扎伦卡。此外中国名将李娜、塞尔维亚美少女伊万诺维奇，俄罗斯女将佩特洛娃、安德烈・基里连科、库兹涅佐娃、克雷班诺娃都将出战。
目前排名第18位的莎拉波娃是第一位登顶世界第一的俄罗斯女将，她在22岁前就已斩获三座大满贯单打冠军奖杯--温布尔登锦标赛冠军（2004年）、美国网球公开赛冠军（2006年）和澳大利亚网球公开赛冠军（2008年）。在经历肩伤手术和长达数个月的康复治疗后，莎拉波娃的状态渐渐回升，先后在孟菲斯、斯特拉斯堡收获冠军，并在伯明翰、斯坦福和辛辛那提站打进决赛。

description.hltext_display: 子どもに優しくできない最低の母親です。 - 気を楽にして
description.content:
小学生の２人の息子がいます。
子育てに行き詰ってます。
子育てというより、私に問題があるのです。
今まで様々な育児本や自己啓発本など読みあさり、しっくり来るものも
ありましたが、結局自分はなにひとつ変われずにいます。
子どもに対して些細なことですぐ怒ってします。キレてしまいます。
今朝も下の子がリコーダーがないと言い出し、本当なら困っているのだから
一緒に探してあげればいいのに、「ちゃんと持って帰ってきたの？」「きちんと片付けないからだよ！」「なんで昨日の夜のうちに用意しないの？」
「部屋を片付けないから、どこかに紛れ込んでるんじゃない？なんできちんと片付けないの！」と、探すどころかだんだんイライラしてきて怒鳴りまくりです。
これは本当に一例ですが、日常こんなかんじです。
どうしてもっと優しく対応してあげられないのだろう。
子どもから見たら、お母さんは本当に僕のこと好きなんだろうか。嫌いなんだろうな。と思ってるに違いありません。
嫌いなんかじゃない。好きなんですが、どうしても自分の感情の起伏が抑えられません。
まず、子ども云々よりも自分自身が満たされていないから、子どもに八つ当たりして、
ストレス発散しているという最低の図式もわかっています。
自分も満足に掃除もできず、家の中はいつも雑然としているのに、
子どもにはキレイに片づけろと矛盾したことばかり言ってます。
怒鳴りながらも自己嫌悪・・・。
何かというと子どもを怒ってしまいます。
そのくせ、お友達が遊びに来ていたりすると、いいお母さんを演じたり
しています。
夫がいるときはあまり怒りません。
子どもと私だけの空間のときは、暴言はきまくりです。
だめだとわかっていても自分の気持ちを抑えられません。
どうしたらいいでしょうか・・・。
ユーザーID：9794885353
お気に入り登録数：54
古いレス順
レス数：19本
タイトル
投稿者
かん
2010年12月21日 10:24
子供はまだ三歳ですが全く同じです。
あとで自己嫌悪で泣けてきます。
でも怒りがコントロールできずに怒鳴ってしまう…
カウンセリングに行こうかと考え中です。
アドバイスでなくてすみません。
私もどうすればいいか聞きたいです。
ユーザーID：4400674642
娘のママ
2010年12月21日 10:25
トピ主さんの今の感情、手に取るようにわかります。違っていたのは子供が女の子で、私の場合は主人の前でも怒鳴るところくらい。
最近はよっぽどの事がないと怒鳴ったりキレたりしなくなりました。私の場合で説明すると、
・正社員で働きだして、時間的に子供にばかり目がいかなくなった。
・毎日分刻みで忙しくて、子供の些細な失敗や散らかしごときで怒鳴るパワーが残っていない。
・正社員になったことで、パート時代と違って部屋の片づけなど出来ない理由ができて気が楽になった。
・子供が成長してきて（小学校高学年）怒られるような事を前ほどしなくなった。
書きだしてみるとものすごく自分勝手な理由ですが、以上のような理由から最近は月一回くらいしか怒鳴ってません。
うちの娘もよく無くし物をしたり忘れ物をしていますが、もう高学年なのだし放置しています。自分で管理できないのが悪いのだから、先生に怒られて自覚を持てばいいと思えるようになってきました。
今朝も玄関で靴を履く時にでも落としたらしい忘れ物がありましたが、そのまま放置してきました。帰って怒るつもりもありません。自分が一番困ったはずですから。
ユーザーID：6702342110
ュゥ
2010年12月21日 10:25
何がそんなに上手くいかないんだい？
貴方の不満の元はどこ？
今からでも遅くない。
子育て相談とか行ってみたら？
ユーザーID：4099236337
きょうこ
2010年12月21日 10:27
頭きますよね。息子も忘れん坊なのでよく分かります。「あ！今日は彫刻刀がいる日だった！」「今日は縄跳びの試験日だった！」何度聞いたセリフでしょう。呆れて何も言えなくなりましたよ。何故夜の内に用意しない何故予定帳を見ないのだと腹が立ってきますよね。これね、本人任せにして観察したんですけど無理だという事が解りました。暫くはお母さんとタイマーの手助けがいるようですよ。「はい、今から五分以内に予定帳と擦り合わせしなさい。始め！」といった具合でタイマーをスタートさせてしまいます。だらだらしてきたら「あと何分！」と合間に喝を入れ緊張感を与えてくださいね。終わりしがたになったらカウントしてください。ここ重要です。「はい10！9！8！」とやると焦りますから。この焦りが大事なんですよ。これを暫く続けてあげると改善すると思いますよ。試しにやってみてください。

description.hltext_display: $10g bail for woman charged with stabbing her husband
description.content:
@Cutline nameline:Cristin Yerakes
ROCHESTER — A local woman was arraigned Monday on a felony second-degree assault charge alleging she stabbed her husband in the arm over the weekend.
Bail for Cristin Yerakes, 30, of 391 Portland St., Apt. B in Rochester, was set at $10,000 cash only by Rochester District Court Judge Daniel Cappiello as Yerakes appeared via video from Strafford County jail in Dover. Because district courts do not have jurisdiction over felony charges, Yerakes did not enter a plea Monday.
Police said they responded along with Frisbie Memorial Hospital EMS to 391 Portland St. at approximately 12:45 a.m. Sunday morning for a report of a male — Yerakes' husband — who had been stabbed by an unknown assailant when he opened the door.
Police said it was reported the assailant knocked on the door and upon the victim opening it, the suspect said nothing but stabbed him in the arm with a knife. The victim was taken to Frisbie for treatment for non-life threatening injuries, police said.
According to a police affidavit filed in Rochester District Court, the victim told police an "unknown black male" had stabbed him when he opened the front door to answer it and then "ran off." The victim was unable to provide a description of the assailant to police other than that it was a black male in his 30s and was wearing dark clothes. The victim told police Yerakes was in the kitchen and Yerakes' daughter was outside the residence at the time of the attack.
Yerakes was questioned by police and said she wasn't present when her husband was assaulted. According to the affidavit, Yerakes changed her story a number of times during questioning and was contradicting herself.
Yerakes' daughter was also questioned by police. According to the affidavit, she told police there was an initial physical altercation between her mother and the victim, followed by the victim going to a nearby bar. She said her mother confronted the victim at the bar, and they later returned to the residence with more fighting.
The daughter told police she didn't see the alleged stabbing but saw Yerakes go toward the victim with a knife and later saw blood on her mother's hand and the knife in her hand, as well as the victim's arm bleeding badly.
Through the investigation, police said they were able to determine there was no unknown assailant who fled on foot, but instead the injuries were the result of a domestic violence incident between the victim and his spouse. Police said they arrested Yerakes at approximately 6 a.m. as a result of the investigation.
If Yerakes posts bail, she is to be monitored using a GPS device, undergo a mental health referral, have no contact with the victim in the case or with a minor child identified only by their initials in court, have no entry into 391 Portland St., Apt. B in Rochester, refrain from possessing dangerous weapons, abuse no illicit drugs or alcohol and sign a waiver of extradition.
Yerakes has previous domestic-violence related offenses in the state of Maine, according to Assistant Strafford County Attorney Dorothy Walch.
Walch said Strafford County Community Corrections has issued a report and they found the defendant is not acceptable for their program. Yerakes had previously been monitored by Community Corrections and during that supervision tested positive for THC, the psychoactive substance in marijuana.
"Community Corrections does not believe there are any conditions of bail that would ensure compliance if this defendant were to be released," Walch said.
A probable cause hearing will be held for Yerakes in Rochester District Court on Thursday, Dec. 30, at 1 p.m.

description.hltext_display: Jasmine Flower Seller Sent To The Gallows For Murder
description.content: SHAH ALAM, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- A jasmine flower seller was sent to the gallows by the High Court here Wednesday after he was found guilty of murdering a dispatch rider three years ago. Justice Datuk Mohd Yazid Mustafa handed down the sentence on M. Nagarajan after finding that the prosecution had succeeded in establishing the case beyond reasonable doubts. Nagarajan, 39, was charged with murdering B.Elanko, 31, at a squatter house in Pandan Jaya, Ampang Jaya, about 8.30pm on Dec 30, 2007. The offence, under Section 302 of the Penal Code, carries the mandatory death sentence upon conviction. In his judgment, Mohd Yazid said the court accepted the evidence by Elanko's cousin, G.Mogan and wife, T.Nancy, who were at the scene and witnessed the incident. He said Mogan and Nancy testified that Nagarajan stabbed Elanko on the right rib, neck and abdomen. Mohd Yazid also said that Nagarajan, in his defence, did not deny that prior to the incident, he had met Elanko and Mogan at a shop and a fight broke out between him and Elanko. "The victim and Mogan then went home to Mogan's house (crime scene). The court found that the accused was not satisfied and followed the victim. On the way, the accused saw a scrap metal shop and took a knife. In his defence, the accused said a struggle broke out between him and the victim and did not realise that he had stabbed the victim. "The accused said he had no intention of causing hurt to the victim, but the court found that the accused failed to raise doubts against the prosecution's case," he added. Earlier, Nagarajan's lawyer, James George, requested that his client should be convicted on an alternative charge for culpable homicide, but was rejected by the court. Deputy public prosecutor Mohd Nordin Ismail prosecuted. -- BERNAMA

description.hltext_display: İşte İstanbul dan Götürülen 14.5 Milyon Dolar Ve 4 ...
description.content: DHA İSTANBUL- İŞTE İSTANBUL'DAN GÖTÜRÜLEN 14.5 MİLYON DOLAR VE 4 MİLYON EURO Rusya devlet televizyonu İstanbul'dan Moskova'ya inen bir uçaktaki 4 yolcudan çıkan 14.5 milyon dolar ile 4 milyon Euro'nun görüntülerini yayınladı. İstanbul'dan 14 Aralık'ta uçakla Rusya'nın Vnoukovo Havaalanına indikten sonra beraberlerinde getirdikleri parayla gümrükten geçmeye çalışan 3'ü Azeri 1'i İran'lı 4 kişi polis tarafından gözaltına alındı. Rusya'da yasalara göre ülkeye gümrük beyannamesinde belirtilmeden 10 bin dolardan fazla nakit para sokmak yasak olduğu hatırlatılırken kuryelerin isimleri ve paranın kime ait olduğu soruşturuluyor. Rus devlet televizyonu paraların 4 kilodan ağır olduğunu ekledi. (Doğan Haber Ajansı) 5 dakika önce.. [2430084]

description.hltext_display: Emissie schuldpapier daalt in 2010
description.author: cees.vanlotringen@fondsnieuws.nl (FD-redactie
description.content:
Bedrijven, financiële instellingen en semioverheden hebben in 2010 voor bijna� 6000 miljard dollar aan nieuw schuldpapier uitgegeven. Dat is een daling van 4 procent ten opzichte van een jaar eerder.
De grote zakenbanken die de emissies begeleidden, streken hiervoor 19,3 miljard dollar aan inkomsten op.
Dat meldt onderzoeksbureau Dealogic dinsdag in een publicatie.
De uitgifte van obligaties door overheden is niet in de cijfers meegenomen. Het gaat om zo'n 25.000 transacties, hoofdzakelijk leningen die door niet-financiële ondernemingen zijn uitgegeven.
BarclaysDe markt voor emissies van obligaties wordt beheerst door grote Europese en Amerikaanse zakenbanken. Het Britse Barclays staat op de wereldwijde ranglijst bovenaan. De bank was de leidende partij bij� 450 miljard dollar aan emissies.
J.P. Morgan, Deutsche Bank en Bank of America Merrill Lynch zijn de volgende op deze lijst.
EmissievolumeNederlandse banken spelen op de internationale markt voor obligatie-emissie geen enkele rol. ABN AMRO had hier ooit een goede positie, maar de bulk van deze activiteiten ging naar het Britse RBS, dat wereldwijd een tiende plek bezet. De tien grootste spelers hebben een marktaandeel van 55 procent.
Ondanks de lichte daling van het emissievolume hebben de banken hun inkomsten toch weten te vergroten.
De opbrengst van 19,3 miljard dollar is een toename van 3 procent ten opzichte van een jaar eerder. Op de uitgifte van risicovolle high yield-obligaties van bedrijven werd� 5,7 miljard dollar verdiend, meer dan de 4,2 miljard dollar aan inkomsten op uitgifte van gewone bedrijfsleningen.
Schuldpapier bankenDe grootste afname binnen de emissiemarkt werd gemeten bij de uitgifte van schuldpapier door banken. In 2009 gaven banken nog voor 1500 miljard dollar aan nieuwe obligaties uit.
Ruim een derde hiervan werd naar de markt gebracht met steun van de overheid, dat aflossing aan beleggers bij faillissement van de bank garandeert.
Dit jaar is het totale volume van banken gedaald naar� 755 miljard dollar, waarbij de omvang aan garantieleningen slechts� 91 miljard dollar is.
Copyright: Het Financieele Dagblad, 22 december 2010.

description.hltext_display: Οκτώ νεκροί και εννέα τραυματίες σε τροχαίο στη δυτική Σιβηρία
TDLC amplía plazo para aportar antecedentes en consulta Soprole-Nestlé a petición de Fedeleche y Colún
description.content:
El Tribunal de Defensa de la Libre Competencia (TDLC) decretó -en el marco de la consulta de Soprole y Nestlé para operar de forma conjunta-, ampliar el plazo para aportar antecedentes en la causa.
De acuerdo a la resolución del TDLC, Colún y la Federación de Productores de Leche (Fedeleche) solicitaron la medida, lo que se resolvió favorablemente.
El nuevo plazo para que los interesados en la causa entreguen datos relevantes, para que el TDLC considere en su análisis, será el 20 de enero.
Entre sus argumentos, Colún dijo que, por la complejidad del caso y el levantamiento de antecedentes relevantes en el marco de la fusión de ambas empresas en el mercado lácteo, era necesario ampliar la fecha para hacer llegar su análisis del proceso.
Fedeleche, en tanto, indicó a la autoridad que era relevante extender el plazo propuesto en primera instancia, ya que señaló que el mercado primario de compra de leche donde ellos intervienen, es uno de los eslabones fundamentales para analizar la unión de ambas empresas, a la que se han opuesto abiertamente.
Fedeleche agregó que las firmas que consultan la operación, Soprole y Nestlé, concentran el mayor poder de compra de leche, sumando entre ambas compañías, el 40% del mercado primario.

description.hltext_display: 伊万登杂志封面小德成配角 道生涯灰暗时刻[图]
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：塞尔维亚美少女伊万诺维奇近日登上本国时尚杂志《Blic Puls》的封面，有意思的是，同期德约科维奇的光头造型也出现在了该杂志封面上，但显然不如阿娜占据的地位醒目，可见女人一旦美貌究竟有多占便宜。
在接受采访时，伊万谈到了自己对于选择教练的要求，“我觉得尽管自己需要一个性格比较强的，能够在赛场上推动我向前走，但同时也能够给予我适当空间的人。我比较喜欢有很多的私人时间，而不是到了赛场外还花太多时间与教练待在一起。但是当我们在场上时，我喜欢他能够非常支持我，并且态度很坚决，不怕直言我有哪些地方做得不对。”
此外，在谈到自己职业生涯的灰暗瞬间时，阿娜举例称去年美网首轮就输球毫无疑问是自己最糟糕的时刻之一，还有今年在曾经的冠军福地罗兰加罗斯败给俄罗斯悍将克雷巴诺娃，都让自己经历了不少心理上的挫折。“在这些时候从我的团队那里获得支持就非常重要了，”伊万说道，“他们帮助我可以保持积极的心态，提醒我依然还很年轻，前面还有许多的机会等待着我。”

Voor de nationale markt vormt het nieuwe vehikel, ook bekend als de 'PPI', vooral een bedreiging voor verzekeraars, die nu een deel van het pensioengeld beheren.

description.hltext_display: 即時娛樂: 佘詩曼 勤護理抗皺紋
EXL EXPANDS DELIVERY CAPABILITY IN INDIA
description.content:
Inaugurates new delivery center in Noida (SEZ)
New York/New Delhi: December 22, 2010 -- ExlService Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: EXLS), a leading provider of outsourcing and transformation services, today announced the official inauguration of a new global delivery center in Noida. This inauguration marks the completion of EXL’s first phase of expansion plans in Noida, which was announced earlier in the first quarter of 2010. EXL will begin providing services to its clients from this center immediately.
This center in Noida, which has been set up in a Special Economic Zone (SEZ), has further expanded EXL’s global delivery capacity by over 800 seats spread over 100,000 square feet. The planned second phase will entail setting up of 1400 additional seats. The new facility will service new client acquisitions and the expansion of existing client operations. It will further strengthen EXL’s ability to offer a stronger business continuity framework to its clients. The location of the delivery facility in a Special Economic Zone (SEZ) will also allow EXL to take advantage of significant tax benefits. With the addition of this new facility, EXL now has 20 delivery centers and offices spread across ten locations in six countries.
In line with EXL’s commitment to operational excellence, this new delivery centre is a LEED certified green building and will also provide state of the art infrastructure to ensure effective operational delivery. Noida is a strategic location for EXL as it offers a rich talent pool to recruit from, robust public infrastructure support and is in close proximity to other EXL delivery centers in the region.

description.hltext_display: "外援决定一切"成CBA名言 表现糟糕球队冤大头
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：弗朗西斯在CBA首次得分了，但北京队把8年来首胜广东队的功劳，都算在了外援阿巴斯、莫里斯的头上。本赛季CBA开赛以来，相较于本土球员的出色表现，让人感到意外的是弗朗西斯、马布里这些大牌外援的糟糕表现。
本赛季外援堪称CBA联赛史上最强。在中国篮协公布的32名外援名单中，17名球员有过NBA经历，他们效力NBA时拿到的最高年薪总和，达到了惊人的6694万美元。相比去年只有“独狼”马布里，今年的外援来势凶猛，除了有“CBA史上最大牌”之称的弗朗西斯外，还有小皇帝詹姆斯的前老大戴维斯、土耳其联赛得分王杜比、诺维斯基的替补辛格尔顿……
随着中国经济实力的提升与篮球水平的提高，CBA的影响力与吸引力今非昔比。但在近几个赛季，名气大但却未给球队带来实质性进步的外援也不少。在山西队巨资招揽的明星球员中，无论是邦奇・威尔斯还是马布里，最终都未能给球队带来最理想的成绩；前NBA悍将斯威夫特在2008年来到山东队，完全没能展现出在内线的统治力，只能灰溜溜地离开了。
前四轮比赛，在外援问题上“栽跟头”的俱乐部已有不少。3场比赛拿到2分的“弗老大”自不必说，马布里领衔的佛山队仅取得了1场胜利，被陕西队当作“强力中锋”引入的桑普森竟然不想上场比赛……在球员数据排行中，得分、篮板球前10名中少见这些大牌外援的影子，反倒是莫里斯、阿巴斯这样的外援打得风生水起。
花大钱买大牌，难道球队就甘愿当“冤大头”吗？当然不是！首先，在如今的CBA，“外援决定一切”已越来越成为至理名言。CBA某俱乐部负责人表示，“如果我们的外援不行，关键时候肯定顶不住啊。俱乐部最重要的是成绩要好，这样经营就会好。如果在外援上省了几个钱，成绩搞差了，这不是本末倒置了吗？”
根据国家篮管中心公布的数据，2008-2009赛季，CBA俱乐部平均运营成本约2000万元，最高的达到了2769万元。2009-2010赛季，由于篮协控制联赛成本，外援限薪令的执行，才使得俱乐部的亏损平均减少了66%。如今，更多大牌外援的涌入，限薪令被废除，很多俱乐部的运营成本大幅度提高已是不争的事实。
而目前，CBA各俱乐部的盈利渠道基本上就有两条：一是球队冠名权，二是球票的销售。大牌球星的加盟，不仅提高了冠名权的费用，也增加了门票的收入。最为明显的例子就是北京队，“弗老大”的到来不仅使得比赛场场爆满，甚至引发了现场球迷的骚乱。难怪有俱乐部人士表示，“大牌外援就是票房啊。”
正是在这种心理下，CBA引援越来越看重名气，球员年龄、状态以及跟球队的磨合都成了次要的。但如果这些大牌外援的状态持续低迷，恐怕俱乐部、球迷都不会买账，毕竟球队战绩才是第一位的。

description.hltext_display: Bakanlar Boğaz Manzaralı Aile Fotoğrafı Çektirdi
description.content:
Ekonomik İşbirliği Teşkilatı (EİT) 11. Devlet ve Hükümet Başkanları Zirvesi öncesinde düzenlenen 19. Dışişleri Bakanları Konseyi Toplantısı başladı.
Çırağan Sarayı'nda gerçekleştirilen toplantının açılışı öncesinde konsey toplantısına katılan dışişleri bakanları, sarayın bahçesinde İstanbul Boğazı'na karşı aile fotoğrafı çektirdi.
Fotoğrafta Dışişleri Bakanı Ahmet Davutoğlu'nun sağında Azerbaycan Dışişleri Bakanı Elmar Memmedyarov, solunda geçici olarak İran Dışişleri Bakanlığına atanan Ali Ekber Salihi yer aldı. (Anadolu Ajansı) 7 dakika önce.. [2430072]

description.hltext_display: 'Distressed debt biedt belegger kansen'
description.author: bas.dommerholt@fondsnieuws.nl (Bas Dommerholt
description.content:
'De ontwikkelingen rondom de kredietcrisis hebben ervoor gezorgd dat hedgefondsen die zich richten op 'distressed debt' na een positief 2009 en 2010 ook in 2011 goede resultaten moeten kunnen laten zien.'
Dat zegt Michiel Meeuwissen, senior portfoliomanager van het Fund of Hedgefund van Kempen Capital Management, in een gesprek met Fondsnieuws.

description.hltext_display: 三星Android旗舰 i9000 8G售价3480元
description.content:
搭载1GHz处理器、最新Android 2.1操作系统以及绚丽的屏幕，三星I9000自上市后倍受用户关注。该机无论在硬件，软件，娱乐功能，还是商务办公方面都有不错的表现。目前售价为3480元(8G)，喜欢的朋友可以关注一下。
三星 i9000 Galaxy S 8G
三星I9000在外观的上采用黑色元素装点机身，并且机身周围采用金属包边，使得整机彰显时尚气息。4.0英寸1600万色的显示屏，采用Super AMOLED材质，其拥有超快的触摸反应以及超广的视角。而机身还内置一枚500万像素摄像头，支持触点对焦，在拍照效果方面令人满意。
三星 i9000 Galaxy S 8G
在操作系统方面，三星I9000 Galaxy S采用Google Android 2.1，搭配ARM Cortex A8 1GHz超强处理器，内置8GB的内存和512MB的程序运行内存，运行起来极为流畅，并且该机还拥有时下流行的Wi-Fi功能，使得I9000在娱乐方面发挥的淋漓尽致。
三星 i9000 Galaxy S 8G
编辑点评：三星I9000还支持32GB的扩展卡。另外，该机还支持A-GPS导航，假日出游刚方便快捷。这款拥有强大的硬件性能，配置了高达1GHz主频的CPU的机器人拥有完善出色的娱乐功能，目前该机价格小降，感兴趣的朋友可到以下商家具体获悉。
三星 i9000 Galaxy S 8G

description.hltext_display: 子宮頸部の腺癌について教えて下さい。 - 経験者様ありがとうございます。
description.author: toki
description.content:
31才で7月に第1子を出産した者です。
1年半前に一度細胞診で3aが出て以来、妊娠中も3〜4ヶ月毎に検査を続けずっと2を保ってきましたが、11月に行った検査で「異形腺細胞3」の診断結果が出てしまいました。。通常多いとされる子宮入り口付近ではなく、その奥の腺部に異形成がみられるようです、、。健康診断所の紹介状には「要組織診」とありましたが、紹介先の医師は「まだ癌ではないし、もう1度細胞診をして、結果次第で組織診。」ということでしたが、すぐに組織診に進まなくていいのかとても不安です。
ネットの情報を見ると腺がんだとしたら予後もあまり良くないようですし、これからどうなるのだろうととても不安で眠れない・食べられない日々を過ごしています。（子供の育児もなんとかこなしている状態です。。）
子宮頸部の腺異形成や腺がんご経験者の方のアドバイスを頂きたくお待ちしています。。
ユーザーID：8849836875
お気に入り登録数：8
古いレス順
レス数：9本
タイトル
投稿者
10年目
2010年12月19日 20:00
気になるトピなので、お気に入りに入れてレスの動向を見ていましたが今の所レスがないようなので、私自身の経験を書きます。
（ガンは人それぞれなので参考として聞いてください。）
私は10年前に40代で子宮けい部の腺癌になりました。
いまでは子宮の腺癌も増えていますが、当時はめずらしく治療も「気休め程度になるだろう」と言われるがまま手術と抗がん剤をしました。
腺癌は粘膜の内部にもぐっていくので、検査のたびに陰性と陽性の繰り返しでした。
検査で出なかったから大丈夫…とはけっして言えません。
念入りに検査して、一日も早く治療にすすむのがベストかと思います。
とはいっても、子宮がんは「グレーゾーン」があるので、がんの顔つきによっては「しばらく様子をみましょう」となる場合もあります。
そこはドクターとのコミュニケーション次第でもあります。
納得いかなければセカンドオピニオンを受けるのもありです。
予後が悪いと落ち込まないで、前向きにいってください。
ユーザーID：8987386382
経験者
2010年12月20日 12:46
１０年目様と同じくレスがつかないようなので書き込みさせて頂きます。
2006年に子宮頸部腺がんを手術のみで治療しました。現在４ヶ月ごとの定期観察中です。
主様の場合、現段階では細胞診だけですよね？
組織診をしてみなければ腺がんかどうかはわかりません。
「異型成」と「がん」は別物です。
ただもう一度細胞診をというのはナンセンスな感じがします。
腺がんは扁平上皮がんと違って表面の細胞をこすりとる細胞診では診断が
つかないからです。
主様も不安なお気持ちでいっぱいでいらっしゃるかと思いますが、
ここは組織診を受けられることをお勧めします。
また、ネット上の情報は玉石混交です。
全てが「真」だと捉えないでくださいね。
ユーザーID：3893193102
toki(トピ主)
2010年12月20日 20:31
10年目様完治されたとのこと、大変大変励みになりました。検査で出なかったから大丈夫…でないところが怖いです。私は3ヶ月毎に受けていて5回ほど続けて2だったのですが、腺癌が奥で見過ごされていて進行していたらと気が気じゃありません。。経験者様のおっしゃる通り確かにまだ確定診断はついていませんが、細胞診結果を伝えてきた医師から、細胞の所見から腺癌の可能性が限りなく高い（3といっても悪い方）と言われていますから多分腺癌なんだと思います。。手術だけで良い経過を得られているとのこと、とても励みになります。
お二人にすみません、ぶしつけな質問、、。お差支えなかったら教えて下さい。両卵巣も切除されましたでしょうか？そして…今は元気に暮らしていらっしゃいますか？

description.hltext_display: Agguato nel Brindisino, un morto
description.author: redazione@tgcom.it (Redazione TGCOM
description.content:
Vittima un 28enne con precedenti
Un 28enne è stato ucciso all'alba in un agguato a Francavilla Fontana, nel Brindisino. Secondo gli investigatori il giovane, noto alle forze dell'ordine per piccoli precedenti penali, è stato ucciso a colpi d'arma da fuoco da un uomo che è poi fuggito a bordo di un'auto guidata da un complice. Per il momento non è ancora chiaro quale sia il movente del delitto.
Ultimo aggiornamento ore 09:13
Condividi con Messenger

description.hltext_display: Council split on spending $10g to study why bridge project was delayed
description.content:
ROCHESTER — The City Council did not act on a proposal for an independent review of the North Main Street Bridge project at its Tuesday night workshop, but discussion on the topic produced split opinions from councilors.
Some councilors feel the review is necessary to look at what went wrong with the bridge rehabilitation project, which was slated for 105 days over the summer yet is still going on, with the bridge reopening more than two months after its originally scheduled completion.
Some don't like the idea of paying CMA Engineers of Portsmouth $10,800 for the review and tack it on top of the $1.3 million project. Others still don't see the benefit of the review, with one councilor saying he had "absolutely zero confidence" in both the council or city staff to do anything different in the future.
"We're not going to reprimand anybody," Councilor Geoffrey Hamann said. "We're not going to go back and ask for more money. I don't see anything changing besides myself knowing who to point the finger at."
City Manager John Scruton said the council had set a goal to review the way Public Works conducts its projects and how the city has a whole handles such work. He said an internal review was possible, but that some might "question the results" of such a review.
"The purpose is to review our processes, and that of the bridge engineers who designed the bridge," Scruton said. "In particular we want to look at the items that were not discovered and addressed in the engineering. We want to see what caused those and what internal processes can be changed to prevent this from happening again."
Deputy Mayor Ray Varney wanted to ensure a review of the contract between the city and the engineers who designed the project.
"This would be tremendously beneficial to us in the future and save us money," Councilor Chuck Grassie said.
Councilor Dave Walker commented on the problems with the project that existed from its very outset, and said city constituents need to know what went wrong.
"We owe it to the constituents of the city of Rochester to get down to the bottom of what happened and why," Walker said.
Mayor T.J. Jean expressed concern about the wisdom of conducting a review while the bridge work is still ongoing, saying "a number of things can still happen." Grassie, Walker and Varney all said it's better to start now to review all the processes of the project, with Grassie saying the bulk of the important things they will learn came from the early stages where mistakes were made.
"We need a fundamental change in the way we manage our projects," Varney said.
Councilor Ralph Torr was worried about the project review being "put away on a shelf somewhere" and never acted on. Jean, in contrast, said it's "important to act on what we find... I'm sure it's going to be clearly identified."
In a proposal letter sent to Public Works Director Melodie Esterberg on Dec. 8, CMA President Craig N. Musselman and Vice President Jason L. Gallant said the audit would begin on Jan. 10, 2011 with a final report to be issued on March 4. CMA said their credentials to work on the audit include "experience with rehabilitation of similar types of historic bridges, including stone masonry arches."
The CMA team would review all documents related to the bridge project, including the engineering services contract between the city and its design consultant; copies of drawings and reports submitted at each phase of the project; and all executed change orders, among others. They will discuss the project with all necessary city staff involved with the project.
Scruton said he will consider council suggestions and look at other engineering firms for ideas on the scope of work for the review. The council will take up the issue as an action item at its Jan. 4 regular meeting.

description.hltext_display: 邓华德视上海为自己的故乡 在上海过圣诞节很好
description.content:
东方网记者屠佳时12月22日报道：临近圣诞了，不少在CBA打拼的外援和外籍教练都会在这个时候想起美国的家，也算是人之常情。不过昨天上海男篮公开训练后，当记者问起邓华德，想不想远在美国的家，邓华德却笑着表示，自己的家就在这里。“如果接下来我们去吉林和辽宁打客场，我也许会想家，可现在我就在家里。”
显然邓华德已经把上海当做自己的故乡，亚运会期间，上海发生火灾时，邓华德也曾在发布会上说过自己的家乡受了难，感觉非常伤心。“我就是个上海人。”邓华德说。

description.hltext_display: NCKU Vice-President Hwung Shared Thoughts on Industrialization of University R&D Achievements (BIZ)
description.content:
TAINAN, Taiwan--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung of National Cheng Kung University (NCKU), Tainan, Taiwan, has shared his thoughts on the important strategies which will help promote industrialization of research and development achievements in universities with dozens of presidents, business managers, research and development heads, as well as government personnel, on December 21st in the 6th Academic R&D Summit, receiving zealous response and questions from the audiences.
View More Ads| Disclaimer
NCKU Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung believed that the implementation of the industrialization of research and development achievements should rely on the joint efforts of universities, government and the industry, and the excellent communication between the universities and the industry should depend on professional teams assisting industry-academia cooperation and government establishing complete regulations to help the industrialization, and the industry upon receiving the achievements should give back, thus achieving a virtuous circle.
NCKU Honorary Prof. Cheng-I Weng, the host of the conference, revealed, â€œIn the face of government reducing funds and birthrate declining, universities today normally face the difficulties of increasing their revenue. Universities are the place where outstanding talents gather together. Even though professors publish many papers to elevate their academic standard each year, the papers are not helpful to improve the financial resources of the universities. Thus, the creation of practical values of the research and development achievements by the professors can help universities raise funds.â€
â€œThe first university in the world was established in 1088 in Italy, with the sole purpose of teaching. It was not until the 15th century that it started doing research and it was not until the 1950s that the United States had linked universities and society together. In 1980, the United States had passed an act which clearly states that patent technology transfer, produced under the funds from the government, must put to the industry, finally indicating the functions of a university, which consist of teaching, research and service. Thus, it is evident that the functions of a university adjust to social changes,â€ said NCKU Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung in his speech.
In Taiwan, National Science Council, Executive Yuan, had initiated Science and Technology Basic Act, starting to promote science-oriented industrial cooperation, and in recent years, the Ministry of Education, Taiwan, has been promoting Project of Increasing Master-Level Industrial RD Manpower, and National Science Council has been promoting cross-disciplinary industry-academia platform, illustrating the governmentâ€™s emphasis on university functions.
The current research and development manpower in Taiwan consists of approximately 240,000 research, technological and support personnel, and among them, the research manpower is approximately 130,000 people, including 30,000 doctoral personnel, where universities occupy approximately 75%, revealing that Taiwanâ€™s research resources mainly focus on universities. Thus, if resources at universities are not used effectively, it will be unfortunate for the nation. According to the analysis done by Intellectual Property Office, Ministry of Economic Affairs, in 2006, the international patent industrialization ratio is about 3% and the ratio in Taiwan is about 0.3%, showing that Taiwan still has a lot of room for improvement.
NCKU Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung stated, â€œIt is easier said than done. First of all, universities tend to focus on academic research, which often result in unpractical and unsalable products. How to transfer something useful onto the industry is worth considerable consideration of the government. However, there are many regulations and procedures that are still incomplete in Taiwan. I hope the government can set them up as soon as possible.â€
Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung further explained, â€œAlso, because professors lack contact with the industry, they do not understand the cost of the improvement process of an item or the social demands. The Ministry of Education should think carefully about merely focusing on papers rather than industry-academia achievements. National Science Council should also take industry-academia into account and if the Council can transform it into a policy, the promotion of industry-academia will be easier.â€
The transfer of research and development achievements to industry requires professional assistance. For a transfer to be successful, the technology needs to be industrialized and have a professional team. In the United States, nearly all universities with excellent industry-academia cooperation have special offices, where professional teams will assist professors understand the features of the technology and then help them to seek business owners, and even help find solutions when they encounter legal issues.
NCKU Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung emphasized, â€œUniversities have the social responsibilities to elevate industrial-academia industrialization. The higher the industrialization of research and development achievements, the greater the contributions to the society become.â€
National Cheng Kung University, for instance, has 60 to 70 patent applications and about 3 or 4 successful technological transfer cases annually, much higher than the average 0.3% patent industrialization in Taiwan and reaching the international ratio of 3%, being the only university in Taiwan with recent technology transfer payments exceeding over NT$100,000,000.
National Cheng Kung University
News Center
Crystal Chen, +886-6-275-7575 Ext. 50042
Fax: +886-6-238-9919
Source: National Cheng Kung University

description.hltext_display: 即時兩岸: 台萬丹泥火山爆發
Refuerza China campaÃ±a antisida orientada a trabajadores emigrantes
description.content:
22 de diciembre de 2010, 02:54Beijing, 22 dic (PL) China refuerza hoy la lucha contra el Sida con una campaña de prevención enfocada principalmente a la población emigrante, estimada en 200 millones de personas.
Ese sector procedente de zonas rurales del país es muy vulnerable a contraer el Virus de Inmunodeficiencia Humana (VIH), aseguran expertos citados por la prensa local.
Hao Yang, subdirector de la Oficina del Grupo de Trabajo para la Prevención y el Control del Sida del Consejo de Estado, dijo ayer aquí durante la inauguración de esa nueva acción frente al mal que se trata de un proyecto a largo plazo encaminado a impartir talleres sobre el tema y brindar herramientas a esas personas para su protección.
Se pronunció además por el derecho a su salud y a la necesidad de ofrecerles los conocimientos necesarios en relación con el citado agente infeccioso, que puede causar la muerte en la etapa más avanzada de la enfermedad.
De acuerdo con cifras oficiales, en la parte continental del país los portadores del VIH/Sida se estiman en 370 mil, de los cuales el 23 por ciento corresponde a emigrantes.
En los últimos años el número de casos entre ellos se incrementó debido a su pobre cultura sobre el asunto, por lo que Hao consideró de gran importancia esta campaña para la batalla nacional y global contra la referida pandemia.
Sin dudas, ese esfuerzo requerirá de la comprensión de los contratistas, por la cual abogó Zheng Kejian, de la Federación Nacional de Industria y Comercio, al instarlos, en especial a los del sector privado, a apoyar esta labor e incorporarla a los programas de capacitación del personal. mv/tjv

description.hltext_display: 经典触摸屏手机 诺基亚5800XM仅售1450元
邓华德备战稠州 调侃：圣诞不想家 上海就是家
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：最近的两连胜让大鲨鱼逐渐摆脱了赛季初的阴霾，尤其是上周日首个主场就惊险地击败广厦，更是令球队士气一振，接下来大鲨鱼还有3个连续的主场比赛，而这将是提高名次的良机。今晚大鲨鱼将主场对垒浙江稠州银行，而邓华德希望球队能延续之前的防守强度，并依靠防守拿下比赛。 对付浙江，主打联防 在昨天下午梅陇基地的篮球馆里，大鲨鱼的球员们进行着激烈的对抗训练，训练的重点并非尚不算流畅的进攻，而是防守。
前4轮打完，浙江队的外线是整个CBA中第二差的，三分球命中率仅高于广厦，而这成为邓华德研究策略的关键。在昨天的训练中，邓华德狠练球队的联防战术，在场边常常能听到他呼喊球员加快速度完成轮转防守的声音。而当有球员有出色的防守表现时，邓华德都会大声表扬。
邓华德在训练中多次强调内线球员保持呼应和沟通，“季祥，你要听MAX（张兆旭）的指挥，他在主防对方的内线进攻强点，你们俩要保持联系！每个人都要张嘴说话，呼应起来！”他的喊声让季祥连连点头。前一场对广厦，大鲨鱼一改之前篮板不佳的表现，而篮板上的优势在赛后被邓华德称作取胜的关键，而昨天的训练中，邓华德也多次强调对篮板球的保护，毕竟一个成功的联防体系，内线的防守与篮板非常重要。 斗牛犬对决：丁锦辉和孟令源 在浙江队中有两位球员与邓华德一起出征了夏天的世锦赛，他们是老将金立鹏和核心丁锦辉，尤其是丁锦辉，其作风颇得邓华德赏识，也在邓华德的麾下获得重用，被其称作“斗牛犬”。
这一次两军相遇，各为其主，邓华德已经想好了如何来招待故人，“我会在赛前给他们一个结结实实的大拥抱，然后在比赛中狠狠地踢他们的屁股。”邓华德笑着说。
不过邓华德毫不掩饰对丁锦辉的喜爱之情，昨天他又谈起了斗牛犬风格，“一支球队需要这样的球员，每一个教练都喜欢这样的球员。丁锦辉是国家队的斗牛犬，”随即邓华德又自豪地说起了另一个人，“在上海队里，孟令源就是斗牛犬。这一次他们俩将同场较量，可惜他们不是一个位置，看不到他们一对一的交锋。” 在上海过圣诞很好 时值圣诞期间，不少在CBA打拼的外援和外籍教练都会在这个时候想起美国的家，也算是人之常情。不过当记者问起邓华德，想不想远在美国的家，邓华德却笑着表示，自己的家就在这里。“如果接下来我们去吉林和辽宁打客场，我也许会想家，可现在我就在家里。”
显然邓华德已经把上海当做自己的故乡，亚运会期间，上海发生火灾时，邓华德也曾在发布会上说过自己的家乡受了难，感觉非常伤心。
“我就是个上海人。”邓华德说。

description.hltext_display: Mann nach Schuss von Lebensgefährtin gestorben
description.content: Ein 27-jähriger Oberösterreicher, dem seine Lebensgefährtin vor einer Woche im Mühlviertel im Zuge eines Streits ins Gesicht geschossen hatte, im Linzer Allgemeinen Krankenhaus (AKH) gestorben. Er erlag seinen schweren Gehirn- und Schädelverletzungen.

description.hltext_display: Matrimonio forzato, fugge di casa
description.author: redazione@tgcom.it (Redazione TGCOM
description.content:
Brescia, sposa bambina dalla polizia
Nuovo caso di una sposa bambina, costretta dai genitori a un matrimonio forzato. Questa volta però la 14enne originaria del Bangladesh residente a Brescia che era stata promessa in sposa dalla famiglia a un connazionale con il doppio dei suoi anni è scappata da casa per poter frequentare il suo amore, un 17enne pachistano, e ha chiesto aiuto alla Polizia, che ha denunciato i genitori della ragazza per violenza privata.
La studentessa, che frequenta il primo anno di un istituto professionale in città, era stata segregata in casa dal padre che, contrario alla relazione con il giovane di 17 anni, aveva anche sottratto il cellulare alla figlia. Approfittando di un attimo di distrazione dei genitori l'adolescente, con la complicita' di un'amica, è però riuscita ad allontanarsi e a contattare la squadra Mobile.

description.hltext_display: First International Sport Pilot Fly-In
description.content:
Dan Johnson, president of the Light Aircraft Manufacturers Association, is an expert on Light Sport Aircraft. ?Too much fun!? was a common exclamation of my Alaska ultralight friend Mike Jacober. His signature phrase ran through my head as 18 airplanes, mostly LSA, arrived at the Freeport, Bahamas, airport for the first International Sport Pilot Fly-in over Dec. 10-12.
For many this was their first flight over the ocean (including yours truly). It isn?t far — 85 nautical miles, less than one hour — and it isn?t hard (unless you go for a swim en route?none of us did, thank goodness!). But flying out of sight of land, even for a short time, is rather attention-getting.
A number of us gathered at at the Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport, getting first-class treatment and fuel discounts from this ?gateway FBO? to the Bahamas. Bahamas Tourism/Aviation Director (and fellow pilot) Greg Rolle gave a thorough presentation of the requirements to fly internationally. Each pilot had to complete lots of government forms but they weren?t too difficult and the great help made it go quickly. Then, we all gathered our resolve, fired up our engines, and took off across the Big Drink. Of course, this is nothing for those few LSAers who have crossed the Atlantic and Pacific, but it had me on my toes and I suspect most of us felt similarly.
An hour later, we landed one after another at Freeport to a warm reception by Bahamian authorities. We breezed through Customs and waiting taxicabs took us to a deluxe resort where we could all revel in our satisfaction of making the ocean-crossing voyage.
Thanks for this great experience go to Randy Hansen and David Oord of EAA, who worked with the Bahamas Tourism team to make the Sport Pilot certificate accepted at all airports throughout the islands.
Continuing Bahamas Fly-ins and other LSA activities are planned and, if you get the chance, be sure to take the opportunity. Special thanks to boss, Mike Zidziunas, who loaned me a Breezer, and who very competently helped me prepare for the flight. Mike?s enterprise plans regular Bahamas fly-outs and you should contact him for advice. He?s a wealth of knowledge, having lived on and sailed throughout the islands for five winters.
For more information: ByDanJohnson.com
Share and Enjoy: Categories : Splog Leave a Comment

description.hltext_display: Still has tea set Dad gave her
description.content:
ROCHESTER — Every year there would be one gift under the tree that my father took the time to go pick out himself, and that was the gift that meant the most to me.
I am 63 years old and still have the porcelain tea set he gave me.

description.hltext_display: New Renault Megane Hatch launched
description.content:
The newest addition to the Renault GCC lineup has arrived, with the new Renault Megane Hatch arriving in showrooms across the region.
From the original concept shown at the 2008 Geneva Motorshow, the new Renault Megane Hatch has been developed into the latest Renault vehicle to hit the roads, coming in as the manufacturer's new C-segment car after the Fluence. Renault GCC Managing Director, Mustansir Lakdawala, said, "The new Renault Megane Hatch is a great looking and high performing addition to the line up. The concept debuted at the Geneva Motorshow in 2008, and the end product is a superbly well rounded car, offering customers new levels of stylish comfort.""With the new Megane Hatch we are delivering yet more best in class performance in areas of comfort, with the 70 mm of height adjustment in the front seats being a segment leader. This type of detail helps passengers of Renault vehicles really enjoy the experience of driving or being driven. The Renault baseline is 'Drive the Change', and by having this type of innovation in our vehicles we are bringing new levels of comfort to consumers," he added.The stylish new hatchback is sporty in appearance, having taken its design cues from the world of sport and in celebration of all things automobile. This has led to a vehicle that is immediately eye-catching; the new Megane Hatch is a very appealing car, and one where its character and soul matches its looks.This character is one that exudes comfort and passenger experience, something that Renault instills in all its vehicles. Attention to detail, like widely adjustable seats, repositioned pedals for ease of use, best in class elbow room, easier to read dials and a raft of equipment from the next segment up, including keyless entry and ignition; all help to enhance both driver and passenger experience and truly make the new Renault Megane Hatch an inviting place to be.No detail has been overlooked in the search for a fantastic handling car, and the result is the new Renault Megane Hatch performs with exemplary road holding and precise driver input thanks to the all new power steering.The new Renault Megane Hatch is powered by a choice of three engines and three transmissions, catering to every driver's need. With a choice of a 1.6 16V 110hp with a 5-speed manual gearbox, a 1.5 16V 105hp featuring a 4-speed automatic gearbox, and a 2.0 16V 143hp with Renault-Nissan Alliance developed CVT gearbox, all tastes and requirements are covered. Renault has naturally profited from its engineering expertise and from the latest research carried out by LAB (the Accident Analysis, Biomechanics and Human Behaviour Laboratory of PSA Peugeot-Citroën and Renault) to develop a comprehensive range of safety equipment designed to perform in real-life driving situations. The new Megane Hatch benefits from Renault's knowledge in the realm of active and passive safety and has been designed for exemplary performance on both fronts. The result is a host of active and passive safety features, including include ABS, EBD and Emergency Brake Assist. Depending on the version, ESC (Electronic Stability Control) and CSV understeer control are also available to assist the driver in difficult or emergency situations.
About Renault:Renault is a group with an industrial and commercial presence in 118 countries. It designs, develops, manufactures and sells passenger cars and light commercial vehicles under three brand names: Renault, Dacia and Renault Samsung Motors. In 2009, the Renault Group sold 2,309,188 vehicles worldwide.France's number one car brand, Renault builds upon more than 112 years of innovation to bring customers top-quality, revolutionary products and services, that are ingenious, appealing, affordable and carbon efficient. Renault is also the only vehicle manufacturer with 12 cars awarded the maximum five-star Euro NCAP rating.Renault also pursues an alliance with Nissan, created in 1999. The uniting of both brands provides ultimate performance and for 11 years the Renault-Nissan partnership has been the most successful alliance in the automotive industry. The Renault-Nissan Alliance generates numerous synergies for both brands, ultimately benefiting the customer. Renault has also signed a strategic partnership with AvtoVAZ in Russia and a strategic cooperation agreement with Daimler. In 2009, the Renault-Nissan Alliance sold 6,085,058 vehicles [including AvtoVAZ sales].Renault is a people-centric and innovative company, offering sustainable mobility for all. This vision is the heart of the new Renault brand baseline, 'Drive the Change'. 'Drive the Change' is faithful to the brand's values - human, reliable and enthusiastic. It also expresses the ambition of Renault to pioneer sustainable mobility for all, as well as making the automobile a source of progress for mankind. At Renault, the belief is that it is no longer up to the world to adapt itself to the automobile; it is up to the automobile to adapt itself to the people and the planet. Sport Automobile is a major part of the Renault story, with Renault engines being a quality and reliable mainstay of motorsport for many years. Recently, the Renault F1 Team won the Formula 1 World Championship for Constructors and Drivers in 2005 and 2006.Renault strengthened its presence in the GCC in 2007 with the restructuring of its office and expansion of its distributor network in this region. Showrooms can now be found in main GCC cities offering an exciting line-up of Renault cars.Media contact:May Al-AlawiJunior Account Executive ASDA'A Burson-Marsteller P.O.X:18682, Manama , BahrainTel: +973 1 7582033Fax:+973 1 7582034

description.hltext_display: 上海男篮迎战浙江队 邓华德：请给格林多点时间
description.content:
接连两场迎战浙江球队，两个对手都与上海男篮“颇有渊源”：浙江广厦在去年揭幕战中，当着姚老板的面，硬是从源深带走了开门红；稠州银行队更是在本赛季开始前，与上海队外援哈里斯闹起了签约风波。
上周日加时逆转广厦，时隔一年，上海男篮算是解了口气。今晚，主场迎战浙江稠州银行，上海男篮可不会让三连胜的大好机会白白溜走。尽管稠州队阵中拥有火箭旧将詹姆斯，但开局1胜3负的表现让全队都饱受压力，此番面对士气正盛的大鲨鱼，要想全身而退，难度可不小。
即便是主场作战，对手实力也不算太强，但主教练邓华德可不会对球员们放松要求。在昨天下午的训练课上，老邓在防守上下足了功夫。通过五对五的半场演练，对于浙江队可能采取的进攻方式，布置了多套防守阵型。
整堂训练课，队员们是练得个个喘气，可就是没看到外援格林的身影。一提到格林，邓华德脸上就露出了一丝为难，“其实格林生病已经五天了，他发烧，还有高血压出现，还有拉肚子、胃抽搐。 ”或许是听到了一些有关质疑格林的言论，作为主教练，老邓昨天真的是有话要说。据邓华德透露，格林此前已去过医院，与广厦比赛前，医生更是不建议他上场打球，但他还是主动请战。
既然有客观原因，为何没有在当晚就告知大家？这一点，邓华德也给出了自己的解释。原来，正是格林自己要求教练，不要把这个消息告诉媒体。“周日赛后，格林和我说，不要和媒体说生病的事，自己打得不好，不要找任何借口。 ”格林的能力有多少，邓华德心里很清楚，而老邓更重要他的一点是，格林对于球队的一份心。 “明天的比赛，按道理格林是不能打的，但我知道他还是会坚持去打。 ”现在，除了期望格林尽快恢复健康，老邓也希望大家能对他多点包容，多给点时间。
格林因病缺席了训练，另一名外援哈里斯昨天也和往常不同，没有参加对抗训练，只是一个人在一旁做拉伸和投篮练习。“其实我也不想谈这个问题，但不可回避的是，哈里斯现在身上也有点伤。”尽管一再强调哈里斯的伤没有大碍，但昨天还是安排哈里斯单练，足见在目前球队磨合的关键时刻，老邓可不想又出现非战斗减。
