description.hltext_display: Broncos in position to draft elite player in first two picks
description.author: Mike KlisThe Denver Post
description.content:
Stanford's Andrew Luck is expected to be the first quarterback selected and could be the No. 1 pick overall if he's available in the 2011 draft. He has passed for 3,051 yards and 28 TDs this year. (Otto Greule Jr., )
Armed with tiebreakers, a quarterback with one NFL start and a defense that can't stop anyone, the Broncos are ready for the exciting event that is scoreboard watching for the No. 1 pick in the 2011 draft.
If the season ended today, the Broncos would have the No. 2 draft pick. Hello, Da'Quan Bowers!
"He's the best defensive player by far on the board. By far," Mel Kiper Jr., ESPN's draft guru, said of Clemson's star pass rusher. "He and (Stanford quarterback) Andrew Luck are the stick-out guys in this draft. You can debate three, four and five. You can't debate one and two. Luck is the best offensive player, and everybody's going to have Bowers as the best defensive player."
Well, then.
The Broncos need to finish the deal to finish No. 2 and get Bowers. At 3-11, they are tied with the Cincinnati Bengals for the NFL's second-worst record, one game behind the Carolina Panthers (2-12).
The Broncos' position at No. 2 is further bolstered by the fact that opponents' strength of schedule breaks any ties. In the draft, it's the team with the weakest schedule that gains the higher draft pick. The thinking is that a team with a 3-13 record against a patsy schedule needs more help than a 3-13 team that played tougher opponents.
The Broncos, by virtue of their combined opponents' record of 103-93, hold the tiebreaker over Carolina (106-90) and Cincinnati (113-83). Only when the strength of schedule is identical is the draft order settled by a coin flip.
That shouldn't be necessary. Neither Carolina nor Cincinnati can weaken their opponents' schedule enough to catch the Broncos in these final two games.
All the Broncos have to do, then, is tank their final two games. Lose out and they will be ensured of having the No. 2 overall pick. And they would get the No. 1 overall pick — No. 1! — if Carolina can somehow defeat either Pittsburgh or Atlanta.
But hold on there, draftniks. Don't get too excited.
View slide show of Stanford QB Andrew Luck .
The Broncos apparently will try to uphold the integrity of competition.
"We're playing to win these final two games," Broncos general manager Brian Xanders said. "There's no question about that. The players and coaches have a responsibility to each other and to the fans to finish the season on a positive note."
Has there ever been a case when a team purposely tried to lose the last game or two to get the No. 1 pick in the draft? Gil Brandt, the former longtime Dallas Cowboys scouting director and now the NFL's pre-eminent historian, doesn't think so.
He cited the 1988 season as an example. With two games remaining, the Green Bay Packers had the No. 1 pick locked up — until they won their final two games. The Cowboys lost their last game and wound up 3-13 to qualify for the No. 1 pick in the 1989 draft. The 4-12 Packers were left with the No. 2 pick.
The Cowboys drafted quarterback Troy Aikman, who led Dallas to three Super Bowl titles en route to a Hall of Fame career. The Packers selected offensive tackle Tony Mandarich.
As Homer Simpson would say: D'oh!
"I think that shows teams don't do what you're talking about," Brandt said. "I think the only thing that happens is teams like Indianapolis last year don't play their starters in the last game. But I have not heard of anyone tanking their games for draft position."
The Broncos don't really need the No. 1 selection, anyway, because they don't figure to draft Luck,
View slide show of Broncos-Raiders game Dec. 19 .
View more Broncos photos .
Find analysis, notes and buzz on the All Things Broncos blog .
Ask Mike Klis about the team or NFL in the Broncos Mailbag .
Find the latest Tim Tebow news .
Post photos of your team spirit .
Evaluate the latest team numbers on the Broncos Stats Page .
Scan Broncos 2010 schedule .
a junior who appears to be a no-brainer choice at No. 1 if he enters the draft. The Broncos already have heavy quarterback investments in rookie Tim Tebow, who will get his second NFL start Sunday against the Houston Texans, and veteran Kyle Orton, who not long ago received an $8.8 million contract extension for 2011.
Bowers, a 6-foot-4, 275-pound junior defensive end who leads the nation with 15 1/2 sacks this year, will become the most elite defensive player once he declares for the draft. Kiper, though, is among those who aren't sure he can convert to outside linebacker in a 3-4 defensive system.
If the Broncos stick with their 3-4 — their new head coach, whoever he is, will have something to say about that — and believe Bowers is a 4-3 defensive end, they would have other options at the No. 2 slot.
One, draft a cornerback, either LSU's Patrick Peterson or Nebraska's Prince Amukamara. Both are considered top five-caliber picks.
Or, two, trade back to a spot from, say, Nos. 7-10 and take Alabama's Marcell Dareus, who's considered the best 3-4 defensive lineman in the draft. Trading back would allow the Broncos to pick up an extra pick, perhaps as early as the second round.
"We do expect to have a high draft pick, unfortunately," Xanders said. "But right now our focus is on the draft preparation and the evaluation and the research. We're not forecasting where we're going to finish. We're focused on our process."
Unlike past years, money is not expected to be the obstacle with the top five picks in the 2011 draft. The next draft class won't be signed until a new collective bargaining agreement is reached and a new CBA probably won't be settled without a rookie salary cap being imposed.
Thus, the expectation is teams will be willing to trade into the top five to get the player they covet.
The Broncos, as they are stuck now, are in position to get at or near the top of the draft. For the first time in their history, the Broncos have a great chance to get the No. 2 pick and maybe the No. 1 choice.
Now that a certain rookie quarterback will be playing in the final two games, Broncos fans need a new chant to replace "Put in Tebow!" A possibility: "Lose two for Da'Quan!"
Mike Klis: 303-954-1055 or mklis@denverpost.com
First things first
For the first time in their history, the Broncos might be drafting No. 1 overall come April. A look at the NFL's first-pick contenders with their remaining games:
Panthers (2-12), at Steelers, at Falcons: Falcons can clinch NFC's No. 1 seed Monday by beating Saints, then resting starters against Carolina.
Broncos (3-11), vs. Texans, vs. Chargers: It won't be easy losing to a bad Texans team.
Bengals (3-11), vs. Chargers, at Ravens: Easier path to 3-13 than the Broncos.
Lions (4-10) at Dolphins, vs. Vikings: Tired of picking in the top two, Detroit has won two in a row.
Bills (4-10), vs. Patriots, at Jets: Buffalo has won four of its last six games.
Cardinals (4-10), vs. Cowboys, at 49ers: Win over Denver might cost Arizona the No. 1 pick.
Mike Klis, The Denver Post

description.hltext_display: Kobe Bryant Ejected as Lakers Lose Focus, Fall to Bucks
description.author: Chris Tomasson
description.content:
Filed under: Bucks , Lakers LOS ANGELES -- Lakers coach Phil Jackson said before the game that his players had been warned not to look past struggling Milwaukee on Tuesday night toward the marquee Christmas Day affair against Miami.
Turns out, not everybody was listening. Forward Ron Artest even admitted it.
"I didn't hear a warning,'' Artest said after his team's surprising 98-79 loss to the Bucks at the Staples Center. "Maybe they said that.''
According to Jackson, the players said it themselves after the morning shootaround.
"They did it on their own in the huddle at the walkthrough this morning,'' Jackson said before Tuesday's game. "It was mentioned, 'Don't mess around and let this game get away from you, and then ruin what we're trying to do on Christmas.'''
So what then happened? The Lakers (21-8) messed around.

description.hltext_display: EQT Partners: EQT V buys Hafslund Fibernett (BIZ)
description.content:
EQT V will accelerate Hafslund Fibernettâ€™s investments to expand network and customer base in the Greater Oslo area
Cable network veteran Gunnar Asp appointed new Chairman
EQT V has agreed to acquire Hafslund Fibernett AS (â€œHFNâ€ or the â€œCompanyâ€) from Hafslund Venture for an equity value of NOK 1,477 million. HFN is owner and operator of the largest independent optical fiber network in Norway covering the Greater Oslo area.
View More Ads| Disclaimer
HFN serves around 150 customers including Internet Service Providers (ISP), large corporate customers and municipalities. Sales in 2010 are expected to reach approximately NOK 180 million with an EBITDA of approximately NOK 127 million. The Company has grown more than 30% annually over the past three years. Internet traffic continues to increase rapidly and EQT Vâ€™s ambition is to substantially expand HFNâ€™s network.
Gunnar Asp will take the role of Chairman of the Board of HFN. Gunnar Asp is Industrial Advisor to EQT and Chairman of, among others, EQT-owned KBW, a leading German cable network operator. Gunnar Asp was also the CEO of StjÃ¤rnTV and ComHem, two former EQT investments in the cable sector.
â€œThere are many opportunities for developing HFN including continued build-out of the network around Oslo, geographical expansion, as well as potential add-on acquisitions. Our focus is to support management to accelerate growth and ensure the customers receive the best possible serviceâ€, says Gunnar Asp.
The transaction is subject to approval from the Norwegian Competition Authority.
EQT V has been advised by Nordea Corporate Finance, Arctic Securities, Bain & Company, PwC and BAHR.
About EQT
EQT is the leading private equity group in Northern Europe with around EUR 13 billion in raised capital and multiple investment strategies. Together with a superior network of Industrial Advisors, EQT implements its business concept by acquiring or financing good medium-sized to large companies in Northern and Eastern Europe, Asia and the United States, developing them into leading companies. Development is achieved by applying an industrial strategy with focus on growth. Since inception, EQT has invested EUR 8.9 billion in more than 80 companies and exited around 40. EQT-owned companies have more than 500,000 employees.
EQT V makes control investments in high-quality, market leading, medium-sized to large companies in growing industries in Northern and Eastern Europe with a potential for top-line growth.
EQT Partners, acting as investment advisor to the managers of each EQT fund, has more than 100 investment professionals with an extensive industrial and financial competence. EQT Partners has offices in Copenhagen, Frankfurt, Helsinki, Hong Kong, Oslo, London, Munich, New York, Shanghai, Singapore, Stockholm, Warsaw and Zurich.
More information can be found on www.eqt.no
About Hafslund Fibernett
Hafslund Fibernett (HFN) owns and operates the largest independent dark fiber network in Norway, covering the urban areas in central eastern Norway. HFN serves around 150 customers including Internet Service Providers (ISP), large corporate customers and municipalities with dark fiber. HFN is headquartered at SkÃ¸yen in Oslo and has 20 employees.
HFN was founded in 2004 as a part of Hafslund Tokom and has subsequently grown its infrastructure rapidly both organically and through acquisitions. In 2005 BredbÃ¥ndsfabrikken was acquired from Telenor and later Priority Telecom Norway and Nittedalsnettet were also added.
EQT V is part of the leading private equity group EQT (being existing EQT funds or any successor funds advised directly or indirectly by EQT Partners or its subsidiaries, collectively â€œEQTâ€).
This information was brought to you by Cision http://www.cisionwire.com
EQT Partners, investment advisor to EQT V
Christian Sinding, Head of EQT Partners Norway
+47 23 23 75 50
or
Johan HÃ¤hnel, Communications & PR
+46 8 506 55 334
Source: EQT Partners

description.hltext_display: 罗斯布泽尔同获两双 公牛45分巨大优势痛宰76人
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：芝加哥公牛队（17胜9负）在主场强势反弹。德里克-罗斯三节拿到22分和12次助攻，洛尔-邓得到22分，卡洛斯-布泽尔拿到两双，他们带领球队第三节打出31-11的单节攻击波，这让他们一举建立起38分的领先优势，他们在主场以121-76痛宰费城76人队（11胜17负），公牛队主场连续四次击败76人队。
公牛队的罗斯得到22分、12次助攻和5个篮板，邓得到22分，布泽尔得到16分、11个篮板和3次助攻，CJ-沃特森得到14分，科特-托马斯得到12分和8个篮板，他还有5次盖帽，凯尔-科沃尔得到10分，罗尼-布鲁尔得到9分。76人队的安德烈-伊戈达拉得到17分和4个篮板，泰迪斯-杨得到12分和7个篮板，朱-霍勒迪和约迪-米克斯各得到9分，埃尔顿-布兰德得到6分和9个篮板。
公牛队的七连胜被快船队终结，乔金-诺阿继续缺阵，泰-吉布森因为脑震荡缺席，老将托马斯首发出场；76人队客场击败魔术队，他们在联合中心已经遭遇三连败，场均净负17.4分。
伊戈达拉开场后突破扣篮，罗斯独得5分，邓也有4分入帐，公牛队以11-4领先。米克斯3分中的，布兰德两罚全中，76人队把差距缩小到2分。布泽尔突然找到感觉独得6分，邓也有4分贡献，他们带领球队打出16-4的小高潮，首节还有3分45秒时公牛队以27-13领先。杨、威廉姆斯和特纳各得两分，罗斯和邓合力得到6分，公牛队在首节过后以33-19领先。
76人队连追4分开始第二节，邓率队回敬8-4的小高潮，公牛队仍有14分领先在握。双方各得4分，威廉姆斯和诺西奥尼各得两分，76人队追至35-45。托马斯独得4分，科沃尔3分中的，一波9-2的小高潮让公牛队再度拉开差距。霍伊斯跳投命中，邓、罗斯和科沃尔又联手拿到7分，公牛队在半场结束时以61-43领先。
公牛队的邓上半场得到16分，罗斯得到13分和7次助攻，布泽尔得到10分和6个篮板，科沃尔得到8分；76人队的伊戈达拉得到12分，布兰德得到6分和6个篮板。
托马斯和罗斯各得4分，他们率队以10-2的小高潮开始第三节，公牛队以71-45领先。双方各打成两次进攻，罗斯独得5分，布泽尔和邓各得4分，他们带领球队打出15-0的小高潮，公牛队以90-50领先40分。杨、巴蒂和斯贝茨联手拿到4分，76人队前三节过后以54-92落后。
38分差距让最后一节比赛彻底失去意义，双方都换上替补阵容，在板凳对决中公牛队也胜出对手，他们最终以121-76获胜。
76人队首发阵容：霍勒迪、米克斯、伊戈达拉、布兰德、霍伊斯
公牛队首发阵容：罗斯、博甘斯、邓、布泽尔、托马斯

description.hltext_display: Malaysia Pacific Expects Nod For Incentives By Early 2011
description.content: KUALA LUMPUR, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- Malaysia Pacific Corp Bhd (MPCB) expects its application for tax incentives for the development of Asia-Pacific Trade & Expo City (APTEC) to be approved by early next year. Its chief executive officer, Datuk Bill C.P. Ch'ng, said the company was confident of getting the approval and hopefully, construction would start by the first half of the year. "Otherwise the project will drag on and it will tire our potential investors," he told a media briefing after the company's annual general meeting here Wednesday. Ch'ng said businesses and corporations in the APTEC zone would enjoy corporate tax-free status, while individuals classified as knowledge workers would pay an income tax of only 15 per cent. APTEC, billed as the largest trade exposition and distribution centre in the region is located within its flagship 277.2-hectare Lakehill Resort City. It will comprise a trade and expo centre, shopping mall, office towers, hotels and a halal centre, he said. He said APTEC would cost RM2.6 billion while the Lakehill project would add another RM2 billion. "The gross development value of the projects is expected to be between RM8 billion and RM10 billion," he said. Ch'ng said the development of APTEC, which was envisioned to be a major trading hub in the region for manufacturers and buyers alike, would not be undertaken on a piecemeal basis. "If we do it, it will take about 20 years for us to complete the project whereas we had set a target to complete it within five years. "We can benefit from the civil works that are already in place, as previous developments in Nusa Damai had set up the water, sewerage plant and electricity infrastructure," he said. Meanwhile, Ch'ng hinted at a restructuring exercise involving its partner, AmanahRaya Development Sdn Bhd, which has a 22 per cent interest in the said projects. Amanah Raya is a unit of AmanahRaya Bhd, a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Ministry of Finance. -- BERNAMA

description.hltext_display: Thoughts From the Gorilla Position 12.22.10: Would HHH Put Sheamus Over At WM In A Rematch?
description.author: Peter Hopey
description.content: Thoughts From The Gorilla Position If it's Sheamus versus Triple H in a re-match at Wrestlemania, will Hunter do the right thing this time? For anyone who has been keeping score, it would appear that a rather large nosed cerebral assassin is finally healed from his latest surgery (to repair a torn muscle tendon in his arm). While not near as injury prone as Batista, the superstar has had a couple of serious set backs over the years (he has already blown both his quads, the first in 2001, then again in 2007). One can only hope that he is able to stay healthy for a while given the current roster situation. Now that his imminent return from his latest injury is upon us, the rumours are circulating as to how the WWE will be bringing him back. I hear he has a nice new office at Titan Towers. Will this apparent move up the corporate ladder mean his time on TV will be reduced? If he does come back in an active wrestling role, will HHH be headed to RAW, or Smackdown? With the decrease in established veteran stars, does creative HAVE to keep him in the main event mix whether they want to or not? So many questions, so little time. So for this column, I am going to focus on his potential return feud which in my mind, is related directly to some unfinished business with an up and comer currently on the RAW brand. Now to help paint a picture of the landscape, the WWE has suffered a substantial setback in terms of the strength of their roster (especially the veteran presense they are used to having behind the curtain, which has diminished significantly). Just in the last year alone, we've seen quite a few big name superstars drop out of the spotlight for a variety of reasons (Undertaker recently to surgery, Jericho to "current endeavors", MVP and Batista seemingly to politics, Matt Hardy because he deserved to be let go, and Shawn Michaels to retirement). As we head into the holidays, the WWE creative team (the same thing happens each year) is furiously brainstorming on the storylines that will take the company into the spring extravaganza we call Wrestlemania. These feuds typically involve the centre pieces of the company (mind you there are supposedly three big ones festering, one which was to include the Next Big Thing, that UFC guy… although that seems pretty dead in the water after his recent loss). So guys like John Cena and Randy Orton are always going to be in the mix. And in any other year, if HHH were healthy, he would be smack dab in the mix with everyone else. But with the supposed youth movement that has been talked about for some time now, an opportunity is being presented to cement that change of the guard. And with HHH being the one of the oldest recurring main event talents on the roster, is it his time for him to begin stepping aside, or at least off of tv? Remember, the WWE has quietly (or maybe not so quietly) been laughing and pointing the finger at TNA as being the place where old used up WWE talent go to die. Do they want to start being painted with that same brush? This past weekend at the TLC event, we saw Sheamus lose to John Morrison. I suggest this is more to try and give Morrison a credible win for once given he has seemingly jobbed to everyone and anyone for some time now (and to even things up to one a piece dating back to King of the Ring). Morrison is one of those guys that purists have railed on since he gained some separation from MnM. They've been waiting for a push. Morrison is competent in the ring, but in my mind has struggled on the mic. Where he seems able to play off of someone else (Jericho, Santino, etc…) alone he's more lost like a deer in headlights. Confident yes. But believable in whatever he's trying to "sell us", not as much. The potential has always been there, but many wonder why he has not been used more effectively. Creative certainly hadn't been throwing him much in the way of bones. Had he been put over Sheamus on the heels of Sheamus' attack of Hunter (around the time that Hunter left tv in readying for his surgery) it would have meant so much more. So when creative gave Sheamus the win a few weeks back on Monday night RAW (the edition that was dedicated to crowning a new KOTR champion), it was almost like watching them write something on the wall. Something for HHH. At least that's the way I took it. Lemme see, Hunter went through a phase where he really pushed calling himself the "King of Kings", I think Motorhead even tweaked a version of his entrance music to reference the phrase, etc… All that coupled with fact that Sheamus was the guy who put HHH off tv (at least from a storyline perspective), and I started thinking it was a fairly safe bet that these two guys had some unfinished business to take care of. Add in this recent KOTR win, and I smell return feud. So if we presume (for the sake of argument) that I'm correct (and of course I think I am, or else there would not be much point to writing any more of this), is it also fair to presume that when HHH returns, one of his major goals will be to exact revenge on the apparent individual who gave him the pre-planned vacation in the first place? I tend to think yes. And because this still feels fresh (we haven't seen HHH and Sheamus to the extent we have been force fed Kane and Taker over the years), it's relatively safe to go to for a program. So again, if we assume this all makes sense then I propose the following. Creative has a feud that effectively writes itself. Returning wrestler looks to get even with the perpetrator of those heinous crimes that resulted in wrestlers summer vacation. And given the timing of everything, in my mind, the two could likely be on a collision course to meet again at Wrestlemania. And if this in fact does take place, the question on my mind is this. Will Hunter do the job at Wrestlemania? Last Wrestlemania, there were those who argued that Sheamus had gotten too much too soon. That he had not paid his dues. That he had not been accepted by his peers and that he had not been established enough through wins over top notch talent that he deserved the win. You could have perhaps even sold me on this, but for the following. To that point, HHH had supposedly been raving about him. My understanding is that they were training partners, and that HHH thought Sheamus was a star in the making. Everything smelled of high praise. Almost out of character… It sure sounded like he was saying all the right things. And heading into the biggest event of the year, I thought (as many) that he was set to put Sheamus over. I mean again, a win over a credible wrestler like Hunter after a relatively short title run would sort of re-establish him as an up and coming main event player for a long time. I'd like to convince myself that creative was thinking the same, and subsequently used this to somehow swerve us into thinking that Sheamus really WOULD win (only to give us the ending they did). But there's something in the pit of my stomach that says this was just backstage politics (and I have NOTHING to support that, just gut). I'll be the first to admit that I initially felt as if Sheamus was being shoved down my throat. His interviews were not coming off as being very organic, and to me, he didn't have any "it" factor yet. He looked nervous and scared in the ring. And in terms of solo promos, they felt very rigid and teleprompter oriented. Not the makings of greatness. So I thought that if he were to beat HHH, I may just start to see him as being more than a "roll of the dice champion" (who was given the belt just to test the waters with him, not because they felt he deserved the strap). But maybe I am being far too hard on HHH. I mean, Sheamus IS just a relative newbie to the sports entertainment world. And it's not like the Wrestlemania match was a squash either. Sheamus certainly got in his fair share of offense. I mean, I truly thought for much of the match that he was indeed going to pull off the upset. So was this creative being creative? Maybe… And looking at this further, post Wrestlemania, HHH seemed to give Sheamus a bit of spotlight. First, he let Sheamus take him out when HHH was giving his little Shawn farewell speech the night after Wrestlemania. He also went to the Extreme Rules PPV with the intent of dropping the match to him. And he delivered. We went on to lose that match to him and in the process, injured his biceps. Now I am not privy to where they were going with the angle at that point, but the injury allowed for Sheamus to tell everyone that HE was the one to take out HHH. HE was the one to put him on the shelf. And that in itself provided some pretty significant bragging rights. So if we DO assume that these two are headed on a collision course for a Wrestlemania rematch, will HHH take the loss this time? In my mind, it makes ALL the sense in the world for Sheamus to get the win. HHH is HHH. He needs another Wrestlemania win like he needs another father in law named Vince McMahon. He's done pretty much all there is to do in the world of wrestling. He'll NEVER be at the level of a Shawn Michaels. Sorry Hunter. You can't have 5 star matches with that many people. If you ARE having great matches, it's because of the guys you are fighting. You're competent, and you get a pop. No question. But it's almost like people who go to Grateful Dead concerts, or the thought's of one last appearance by Steve Austin. It's cool, but it wears off pretty quick. Sheamus has re-acquired mid to upper card floater status again. His recent loss to Morrison elevates the former Nitro (so great for Johnny), but in the process, made Sheamus appear less of a threat for any title any time soon. He might have gone over someone like MVP, but he is gone now. The climb to success that he was on seemed to have derailed (in my mind) after the Wrestlemania loss. If the program were meant to go on further to have him go over HHH in a few more matches, then we need to pick that feud up where it left off. Re-igniting this program could possibly stop the bleeding that Sheamus is currently suffering from. If you will notice, Undertaker took about 3 significant PPV losses in a row against Kane (regardless of whether that was the original plan or not) and you know what, he's fine? In fact, when he comes back in March to extend his unbeaten streak, no one is going to remember anything that happened back in the fall of 2010. His star power will go untarnished, and his aura will be as it always has been. He'll still draw, and everything will be fine. He's the Undertaker. Triple H needs to start getting comfortable with what he has built to date. As it's time for his sun to begin setting as well. Bottom line, these two guys have unfinished business and they need to take care of it at Wrestlemania. Instead of remembering Sheamus' last WM match against HHH as being the loss that never should have been, I'd like to see a 4 star classic. And I'd like it to have been one in which HHH did everything possible to make Sheamus look like a million bucks. Cause you know what? Sheamus needs the win, and HHH doesn't. HHH can still get a lick or two in with his sledgehammer in such a way that Sheamus still looks strong. If creative isn't creative enough to be able keep Hunter looking good and to make Sheamus look great, then they aren't all that creative after all. I'm clearly making a lot of assumptions here, but in my mind, when the KOTR tournament finished up with Sheamus as the winner, I think the seeds were planted. If they weren't, then I speculated about a lot of things, and I wasted a couple of hours of time documenting my stupidity (and you lost 10 minutes of your life reading it that you can never get back). Worse things have happened. In any event, Ho Ho Ho, and don't forget to watch for another edition of Thought's From The Gorilla Position next week.

description.hltext_display: Καιρός: Λίγες νεφώσεις, τοπικές βροχές
Danskar rekordnegativa till euron
description.author: TT
description.content:
Danskarna har aldrig varit så negativa till euron som nu, enligt Danske Banks kvartalsvisa opinionsmätningar. På ett kvartal har gapet mellan nej och ja vuxit från 5 till 13 procentenheter.
Nu säger 42 procent av danskarna ja eller kanske ja till att införa EU-valutan, medan 55 procent säger nej.
Mätningen gjordes under de två första veckorna i december. Aktivera javascript för att se

description.hltext_display: Met 'faces toughest period yet'
description.content: The Metropolitan Police is facing its most challenging period since Commissioner Sir Paul Stephenson took over, he has said. Sir Paul, who was deputy commissioner five years ago and took the top post last year, said a combination of violent disorder on the streets, budget cuts, and the forthcoming Olympics were stretching his force.And he acknowledged the student tuition fees protests were being driven by "a real passion about a cause".Sir Paul, interviewed on BBC Radio 4's Today programme, was asked how far the protests, cuts, and other events, were stretching his force.He replied: "When you put all the various challenges that face me and my colleagues in the Metropolitan Police service together, this is as challenging a period as we have ever faced."He stressed he did not doubt the operational capability of the force. But he said: "I think the challenges we are facing, that stretch we are facing, is not as we have known for a long, long time."We can make significant economy savings, but how far we can stretch those savings is a real issue. I am concerned about our current budgetary situation."On the student protests, Sir Paul said: "There's clearly a sense of anger out there that's led to a level of violence."He said some protesters were determined to breach police lines and had come prepared, and added: "I think we have got a sense of a real passion about a cause out there. Within that, there are various levels of passion that lead to extremism."Copyright (c) Press Association Ltd. 2010, All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: Nonprofit gets more time to sell tax credits: :Program lets businesses use tax payments for charities
description.content:
SOMERSWORTH — Avis Goodwin Community Health Center has received an extension until March 31 to sell tax credits to area businesses.
The credits are given to businesses in exchange for donations.
The company was awarded $600,000 in tax credits in late 2009 as a part of a New Hampshire Community Development Finance Authority program. Avis Goodwin originally had until the end of December to raise that amount through donations, and originally secured the credits to use them to ensure the company moves debt-free into its new $6.6 million, 29,000-square-foot facility on Route 108. The facility is due to be completed around May 1.
Company Communications Manager Lara Willard said an extended deadline will give Avis Goodwin a better chance at moving in debt-free because donating businesses now can make a pledge at the beginning of the new year rather than struggling to make one in 2010 because the year's finances are already tapped out.
"It allows us to make a greater impact on the amount of tax credits we can sell in the community," she said. "It allows people to go into their fiscal planning for next year and this year. It's a big decision for an organization to make a sizable donation, and the extension allows them to go more into the planning process for next year."
A total of $7.9 million was awarded in 2009 through tax credits by the CDFA to 19 state businesses, including $215,000 to the Somersworth-based Malley Farm Boys Home, a nonprofit. The credits let businesses make a contribution to one of the 19 organizations and in turn receive a tax credit worth 75 percent of the amount they pledge.
The credits apply to the business profits, business enterprise, and insurance premium taxes. The donations also can be deducted as a federal charitable contribution, pushing total reimbursement to about 85 percent and ensuring the tax money is invested into the local community, said Avis Goodwin Capital Campaign and Major Gifts Officer Susan Fitzgerald Reichert.
"It's finally one program that is a win-win for everybody," she said. "With the CDFA, it's a win-win for businesses because they pay taxes anyway and can devote their taxes into the community instead of the money just going to the general fund, and they can get 85 percent of their taxes back."
To date, Avis Goodwin has sold roughly $200,000 in tax credits through donations, which they also have received in exchange for naming rights for parts of the building, according to Willard.
One recent notable donation includes a $25,000 purchase by Federal Savings Bank, which Willard said the bank now can use to get $18,750 in state tax credit and "direct their taxes toward a cause they believe in — providing quality health care for the uninsured and underinsured population in our community."
Willard said Avis Goodwin expects more donations before the end of the year, and expects to reach out to even more to local businesses at the start of 2011.
The tax credit donation process hasn't been as smooth for the Malley Farm Boys Home, although Executive Director Mark Sipple said he is "still optimistic" more companies will get interested and the idea will "snowball" once the nonprofit increases awareness of the opportunity and how the credits work.
To date, the home has sold $18,000 of its $215,000 in credits, and Sipple said the reason they are "struggling" is because not many businesses know how the program works and because it's been difficult getting in touch with larger corporations' finance administrators, individuals he said are often based in offices in other states and beyond the grasp of small organizations like the home.
Sipple said the home is on a two-year cycle for its credits, and has until June 30 to sell its credits during the first cycle. He said more Web presence will also help his nonprofit sell its credits, which he said will hopefully be used to make capital improvements to the facility and program "to bring it up to the 2011 level."
More information about the tax credit program is available online at nhcdfa.org. Information about Avis Goodwin's credits is available by calling Reichert at 516-2556, and information about Malley Farm's credits is available by calling Sipple at 692-5479.

description.hltext_display: 17 Stunden in einem Minsker Gefängnis
description.content:
Nach der umstrittenen Präsidentschaftswahl geht die Regierung repressiv gegen Oppositionelle und Journalisten vor. Eine Journalistin berichtet über ihre Erfahrungen aus einem Minsker Gefängnis.
Minsk «Fasst Sie!», ruft ein Mann in Zivil mehreren Polizisten zu. Nur wenige Sekunden später kniet die Afp-Journalistin Maria Antonova mit hinter dem Kopf verschränkten Händen in einem Polizeitransporter, umringt von festgenommenen weissrussischen Demonstranten.
Die Reporterin berichtete am Sonntag über die Massenproteste in Minsk nach der umstrittenen Präsidentschaftswahl. Doch der Abend endete für sie in einem Gefängnis der weissrussischen Hauptstadt, das sie erst 17 Stunden später wieder verlassen konnte.
Eigentlich will Antonova am Sonntagabend nur zurück in ihr Hotel, doch Polizisten in Schutzanzügen blockieren die Wege. Direkt vor ihr schleudern sie ein junges Paar zu Boden, die Frau schreit, die Beamten prügeln mit Schlagstöcken auf den Mann ein.
«Was wollen Sie hier?»
Als Antonova selbst an der Reihe ist, hilft ihr auch das Vorzeigen der eigens vom weissrussischen Aussenministerium ausgestellten Pressekarte nicht mehr. «Sie sind doch von Afp, was wollen Sie hier? Gehen sie nach Frankreich!», wird die Reporterin stattdessen von einem Beamten angeherrscht - und ebenso wie das Paar zu dem Polizeibus geführt.
Gemeinsam mit neun weiteren Festgenommenen muss Antonova dann in kauernder Position auf dem Boden ausharren. Eine kleine Bewegung reicht, und die Beamten schlagen mit ihren Stöcken zu. Einer ihrer Leidensgenossen ist Asthmatiker. Er keucht, er braucht sein Atmungsgerät, das er jedoch nicht dabei hat. Die Antwort eines Beamten: «Wir werden dir deinen Inhalator mit ins Grab werfen!»
Dutzende Polizeibusse bringen in dieser Nacht nacheinander die Abgeführten auf Polizeiwachen in Minsk, auch lange nachdem die Massenproteste in der Innenstadt vorbei sind. Auf der Wache werden weder Fragen beantwortet, noch werden den Festgenommenen ihre Rechte erklärt.
Zufällig in Kontrollen geraten
Antonova harrt dort mit rund 90 Abgeführten aus. Schnell wird klar, dass viele mit den Protesten nichts zu tun haben, sondern nur zufällig in die Kontrollen geraten sind. Da ist ein Mann, der die Beamten nach einem Geschäft fragte, eine Frau wollte gerade ihren Friseursalon schliessen.
Die Nacht verbringt Antonova mit ihren Leidensgenossen in einem Keller der Polizeiwache. Erst, als nach zwei Stunden eine Frau fragt, weshalb die Festgenommenen eigentlich gequält werden, dürfen sie auf die Toilette.
Ein Mann blutet stark an der Hand, seine Mitgefangenen verarzten ihn notdürftig mit Tüchern. Eigentlich müssten sie nach weissrussischem Gesetz alle nach drei Stunden in Gewahrsam freikommen. Stattdessen werden Fotos gemacht und Fingerabdrücke abgenommen.
Herumgeschubst und beleidigt
Antonova weigert sich schliesslich, ein Protokoll zu unterschreiben, in dem falsche Angaben stehen und ausserdem vermerkt ist, dass sie an den Protesten teilgenommen hat. Sie wird von den Beamten herumgeschubst und beleidigt. «Sie hassen es, wenn man sie ignoriert», sagt eine offenbar erfahrene Beamtin zu ihr.
13 Stunden nach ihrer Festnahme wird sie mit anderen Gefangenen in eine andere Zelle gebracht. Draussen ist es längst hell, doch das Zeitgefühl geht verloren. Durch den Lüftungsschacht ist das Weinen eines Mitgefangenen zu hören.
Zahlreiche weitere Journalisten, vor allem russische und weissrussische Reporter, sind in der Nacht zum Montag festgenommen und inzwischen teils zu mehrtägigen Haftstrafen verurteilt worden, so dass sie Weihnachten und Neujahr hinter Gittern verbringen müssen.
Antonova entgeht einer Verurteilung. Nach 17 Stunden wird sie freigelassen - ebenso wie bei ihrer Festnahme ohne jede Erklärung. Für die Beamten scheint die Sache erledigt zu sein. Einer ruft ihr zum Abschied zu: «Ich hoffe, wir bleiben Freunde!»
(mrs/sda)

description.hltext_display: 汉密尔顿盼活塞将其交易 面具侠或因麦蒂生离意
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：北京时间12月22日，据《底特律新闻报》报道，活塞队知情人透露，理查德-汉密尔顿，这个活塞昔日曾连续6次打进东部决赛的核心，由于对自己现在在球队当中的角色不满意，希望自己能够被球队交易出去。
汉密尔顿并没有参加球队当地时间周六的训练，而且因为肚子疼痛也缺席当地时间球队周日的比赛。汉密尔顿十分不满意自己在球队当中的地位，他对自己在队中表现机会的不断递减也开始抱怨，这激化了他与球队之间的矛盾。
“他（汉密尔顿）已经抛弃了我们。”一位球队内部人士透露。而另一位内部人士则表示汉密尔顿现在太情绪化了，他应该做出相应的调整。
当地时间周日，活塞与黄蜂的比赛中，汉密尔顿就声称自己肚子疼而缺席了比赛，但在这场比赛之后，球队当中就有很多人认为汉密尔顿在说谎。球队总裁乔-杜马斯之前表示，由于球队在兜售，所以做交易并不容易，如果汉密尔顿与管理层的关系决裂的话，那么活塞势必也会做出相应的举动。要知道，魔术，太阳和奇才刚刚做完一笔大交易。
“如果需要我和他（汉密尔顿）好好谈谈的话，那么我会去做的，”杜马斯说道，“对我来说，他真的很不错，我会看看接下来的情况。”
本赛季，汉密尔顿的表现可以算是自2002年来到底特律之后的最糟糕的，如今他还剩下3年1260万美元的合同。本赛季至今，汉密尔顿场均可以获得26.4分钟的上场时间并贡献13.6分，但本赛季由于技术犯规的问题，汉密尔顿已经几次被驱逐出场。事实上，本赛季主教练库斯特给了汉密尔顿大量的表现机会，但是他却没有用表现来回报主帅的信任。本赛季，他的投篮命中率只有41%，为职业生涯新低。
是谁将汉密尔顿逼到了这个份儿上？在某种程度上，130万美元底薪合同的麦蒂或许是“罪魁祸首”。从活塞交易到艾弗森那个赛季，被打压的就是汉密尔顿，活塞当年的夺冠功臣给艾弗森让路打替补，今夏杜马斯又签下了麦蒂，而后者在新赛季的状态逐渐上升，麦蒂也逐渐受到活塞队的重视。事实上，在麦蒂的使用上，活塞队一直很小心，他们也为麦蒂设立了上场时间限制，但麦蒂找回昔日的状态后，他很有可能打30分钟的比赛，上一场对阵黄蜂的比赛麦蒂就代替受伤的汉密尔顿首发出场，虽然4分5篮板的数据很一般，但麦蒂确实打的很努力。
底特律当地媒体曾发表文章指出，麦蒂已经成为了活塞队新领袖，年轻球员都十分听从麦蒂的领导，在活塞战胜老鹰的比赛里麦蒂命中4个三分帮助球队获得胜利，这也让麦蒂在球队的地位稳固提高。从活塞内斗的趋势看，麦蒂会占据上风，而麦蒂也会得到更多的上场时间。或许汉密尔顿并不想再看到当年与艾弗森为出场时间暗战的局面，才有了今天希望自己被交易出去的意愿。

description.hltext_display: 没事换壳玩 HTC低端手机Tattoo报价1450元
NCKU Center for Teaching and Learning Development Inaugurated (BIZ)
description.content:
TAINAN, Taiwan--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- To elevate teaching quality and student learning efficiency and achieve academic excellence, the Center for Teaching and Learning Development (CTLD) of National Cheng Kung University (NCKU), Tainan, Taiwan, is inaugurated on December 22nd in 3rd floor, Yun-Ping Building, Kuang-Fu Campus.
â€œThe most important function of a university is education, cultivating talents, and then research and social service. It is a universityâ€™s mission to educate youth of the next generation. Education should include two aspects, teaching and learning. However, we mainly focus on the teaching of professors, neglecting the learning of students, which is allowing students to absorb as much knowledge as they can,â€ said President Michael Ming-Chiao Lai of National Cheng Kung University in his opening remark.
View More Ads| Disclaimer
President Lai also mentioned, â€œNational Cheng Kung University had established Center for Faculty Development which focused solely on the cultivation of teachers. Thus, I believe the newly inaugurated Center for Teaching and Learning Development must embody both aspects of teaching, developing teaching methods, and learning, discovering questions, raising questions and finding solutions. I believe this is the essence of education and the development direction of the future education of National Cheng Kung University.â€
NCKU Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung revealed, â€œI am pleased to see that Vice-President for Academic Affairs Tang has established the Center for Teaching and Learning Development. As I have often said, outstanding talents cannot be cultivated without excellent education, and universities cannot transform into top universities without outstanding talents.â€
Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung also explained, â€œAs graduates return to their alma mater, they do not recall how wonderful a professorâ€™s research is and they only remember how strict the teaching of a professor is. Studentsâ€™ parents also do not consider how renowned a professor is in the research field and they only care about how well their children can learn from the school. Therefore, a university, especially a top university, needs to take both teaching and learning into account.â€
Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung stated, â€œIn Taiwan, teachers often teach what they like and students often learn what they want. This is incorrect. As teachers devote themselves into teaching, they must observe the learning efficiency of the students from a different perspective. I hope the Center for Teaching and Development Learning can spread the concept for the teachers to realize the importance of education.â€
NCKU Vice-President for Academic Affairs Ming-Jer Tang said, â€œAfter four years of efforts, Center for Teaching and Learning Development finally inaugurated today. For the past years, under the goal set by President Lai, the Office for Academic Affairs has devoted itself to humanistic and innovative education and cross-disciplinary learning. We are excited that the Center for Teaching and Learning Development, established to truly integrate all the resources at NCKU and to promote NCKU to a top university, is finally inaugurated.â€
Vice-President for Academic Affairs Tang also said, â€œWe have visited research and teaching universities in The United States years ago, realizing that their centers for teaching and learning development have abundant resources, and we have also visited National Taiwan University and Chung Yuan Christian University, discovering that the former lacks integration and the latter lacks manpower. With the advantages of integrated resources and unified manpower as our foundation, I believe National Cheng Kung University can become an internationally top university in the future.â€
The newly inaugurated NCKU Center for Teaching and Learning Development is located on the 3rd floor of Yun-Ping Building, Kuang-Fu Campus, and NCKU President Michael Ming-Chiao Lai, Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung, Vice-President for Academic Affairs Ming-Jer Tang, Director of Center for Teaching and Learning Development J. J. Wang, Director of Center for General Education Wei-Yung Wang, Secretary General Woei-Shyan Lee, other directors, deans and dozens of personnel have attended the inauguration ceremony.
The NCKU Center for Faculty Development, established in 2006, aims to strengthen the professional teaching ability of teachers and teaching assistants; however, to achieve academic excellence and innovation and elevate teaching quality and student learning efficiency, the Center for Teaching and Learning Development (CTLD) is established.
National Cheng Kung University
News Center
Crystal Chen, +886-6-275-7575 ext. 50042
Fax: +886-6-238-9919
Source: National Cheng Kung University

description.hltext_display: India test raket, net als Pakistan
description.content:
NEW DELHI (ANP) - Een dag na een Pakistaanse proef met een kernraket, heeft aartsrivaal India woensdag een test gedaan met een soortgelijke raket. De proef is succesvol verlopen, meldde het Indiase ministerie van Defensie.
Het land schoot twee zelfgemaakte Prithvi II-raketten af vanaf een testcentrum in Chandipu-aan-zee in het oosten van India. De raketten kunnen 350 kilometer ver reiken en kunnen een gewone of een kernbom dragen. India had het wapen op 24 september voor het laatst getest. Toen ging de lancering echter niet door wegens technische problemen.
,,De Prithvi II-raket heeft zijn robuustheid en precisie bewezen'', zei het Indiase ministerie.
Pakistan testte dinsdag met succes haar Hatf V, die geschikt is voor een atoombom.

description.hltext_display: LOHAN'S ALLEGED VICTIM FIRED FROM BETTY FORD CLINIC
description.content: A woman who alleges she was assaulted by LINDSAY LOHAN at California's Betty Ford clinic has been fired for breaking the centre's strict confidentiality rules by speaking out about the incident. The Mean Girls star was moved from the rehab centre to another unit last week (begs13Dec10) to complete her court ordered treatment for violating her probation stemming from a DUI arrest. It was revealed on Tuesday (21Dec10) that officers in Palm Desert, California are investigating after a female member of the Betty Ford staff was assaulted during an altercation with Lohan and some pals. Cops reportedly received a call at 1.03am on 12 December (10) for "hand-to-hand battery", but sources close to the actress insisted she simply brushed the staffmember off when she was "unfairly" lectured about arriving at the home after her curfew and ordered to take a drug or alcohol test. The woman behind the allegations, Dawn Holland, revealed to TMZ.com that Lohan was aggressive and in a "very angry" state when she was caught sneaking back in to the clinic, and goes on to claim the star had been drinking. In a video interview with TMZ.com, Holland - who is wearing a cast on her wrist to help aid an alleged sprain - says, "She was very angry and out of control... She had alcohol on her breath. I did not touch the woman. I am not willing to risk my job over any patient." However, following her revelations, bosses at the clinic have decided to fire Holland with immediate effect. A statement from the clinic says, "Regrettably, on December 21, 2010, one of our employees violated strict confidentiality guidelines and laws by publicly identifying patients in a media interview and by disclosing a privileged document. "The employee has been terminated by the Betty Ford Center."

description.hltext_display: Danskerne vender ryggen til euroen
description.content:
Danskerne siger klart nej til euroen - og den danske euroskepsis er nu rekordstor.
Danskerne siger fortsat klart nej til at indføre euroen, viser en ny kvartalsmåling fra Danske Bank. I den nye måling er tilslutningen faldet kraftigt. Forspringet til nej-siden har aldrig været større, konstaterer banken.
Hvor forspringet til "nej" i den foregående måling lå på fem procentpoint, er man nu oppe på 12,9 procent. 42 procent siger ja eller måske ja til euroen, mens 54,9 procent afviser den europæiske valuta.
Fokuserer man på de vælgere, der er sikre på deres stemme, er forskellen endnu større. Kun 25,5 procent er sikre på et ja, mens 43,5 procent siger klart nej.
Set i forhold til den seneste måling er andelen af danskere, der føler sig sikre på et ja, faldet med næsten syv procentpoint.
- Traditionelt klarer nej-siden EU-valgkampe bedre end ja-siden. Man må derfor forvente, at en afstemning ville resultere i et klart nej, hvis der blev afholdt valg inden for den nærmeste fremtid, lyder bankens konklusion.
Målingen blev foretaget i de to første uger af december. Det vurderes, at gældsproblemerne i Irland og Europa i øvrigt spiller en vigtig rolle for nej-sidens fremgang.

description.hltext_display: Ν. Κορέα: Αρχισαν 3ήμερα στρατιωτικά γυμνάσια με πραγματικά πυρά
冲冠球队有意"租借"甜瓜 小牛老板垂诞安东尼
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：北京时间12月22日凌晨，据《丹佛邮报》报道，NBA联盟的几位消息人士透露说，在掘金球员卡梅隆－安东尼的交易问题一直悬而未决的情况下，现在联盟当中已经有几支球队有意采取“租借”的方式引进安东尼，让他为球队效力至本赛季结束。
NBA联盟消息人士所说的“租借”安东尼其实是指，有意引进安东尼的球队即使未能争取到让安东尼先续约再加盟，他们也愿意付出重大筹码与掘金队进行交易，引进安东尼之后让他帮助球队打完2010－11赛季的剩余时间，然后再争取与安东尼续签一份合同，安东尼实在不愿意续约，那他将会在明年夏天试水自由球员市场。
NBA联盟消息人士指出，那些愿意采取“租借”方式引进安东尼的球队大多都是那些有总冠军竞争实力的球队，他们明知道很可能无法与安东尼签订一份长期合约也愿意为了总冠军的目标而冒险一搏。消息人士并没有具体透露有意采取“租借”方式引进安东尼的球队都有哪几支，但是《丹佛邮报》分析指出，小牛队很可能会是其中的一支已经向掘金队方面提出询价的球队。小牛队老板马克－库班在早些时间接受达拉斯当地一家电台采访的时候曾经这样说过：“至于通过交易引进重量级的球员，那必须得取决于我们能否得到我们真正想要引进的球员，以及我们必须得放弃的是什么样的筹码，但是我们将会考虑租借一名球员，这一点是毫无疑问的。”
消息人士透露说，关于安东尼的交易并不会很快就发生，但是掘金队和篮网队最近仍然在继续磋商交易事项，篮网队方面目前是愿意拿出新秀中锋费沃斯、合同即将到期的特罗伊－墨菲和至少两个未来首轮选秀权来交换安东尼的。英文雅虎体育网站早些时间也报道称，掘金队有可能会把艾尔－哈灵顿搭进去作为交易筹码的一部分，以最终促成一项重磅的多方交易。
现在对于篮网队来说，他们的关键是努力想办法让安东尼答应续签一份为期三年、总金额为6500万美元的合同。上周安东尼告诉《丹佛邮报》说：“不管我去哪里，我都将会签署那份续约合同的。”不过随后记者问安东尼：“如果掘金队高层告诉你说，他们有一项交易方案决定把你交易给篮网队，那你会签约吗？”对此安东尼很犹豫地答道：“那我不知道，我真的不知道，一旦这样的事情发生，我也必须得处理。”

description.hltext_display: China's State Grid pays nearly $1 billion for Brazilian electricity assets, 30-year concession
逼近3000大关 HTC Desire现售3099元
即時國際: 美加州南部 暴雨成災
卡特放弃左膝手术表决心 太阳回应不抛弃不放弃
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：北京时间12月22日消息，今天早些时候《亚利桑那共和报》报道了刚刚交易到太阳的文斯-卡特正在考虑接受左膝关节镜手术，以期治愈膝盖的老伤。但是随后，太阳随队记者保罗-卡罗在自己的微博(Twitter)上面发表文章，表示卡特经过考虑，也咨询过太阳医疗队的建议之后，决定放弃左膝手术，而改用休息与保守治疗相结合。这样一来，他便不会因为预期的手术而缺席长达一个月的比赛，而只需要休养几天，预计只会缺阵本周五一场。
此前的报道声称卡特交易到太阳，其中有某种“阴谋”的成分。球员带伤完成交易，太阳似乎吃了暗亏。因此有媒体分析，卡特如果坚持手术，会导致与太阳之间还没开始蜜月，就直接跳到分居了。但事实并非如此，太阳的医疗队拥有非常好的声誉，仅是治好了老将格兰特-希尔就足以称霸联盟了。
而卡特在今天接受了队医的全面检查，发现他的左膝有肿胀现象，但经过双方讨论，最后决定采取保守治疗。就记者卡罗分析，卡特一方面是信任队医的建议，一方面也是基于对新东家表决心，自己不是来凤凰城来养老的，不是为了混最后一年的千万合同。而太阳方面也尊重卡特的决定，不手术就积极的保守治疗，希望他能在队医的妙手之下，找回当年之勇。有了老希尔做榜样，太阳对这个曾经的加拿大飞人绝对不抛弃也不放弃。

description.hltext_display: Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content:
A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said.
West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.
An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.

description.hltext_display: 全方位提升 摩托罗拉里程碑2疯降仅3399元
description.content:
您当前的位置 ：手机频道 > 手机行情 正文 订东北网彩信手机报，移动发TX到10628007，联通发DBWY到1065566600，电信发DBWY到10628999。东北网手机版 3g.dbw.cn
去年，摩托罗拉革命性地推出了Milestone(里程牌)，不仅是厂商，就连很多消费者也重拾起了对摩托罗拉这一老品牌的信心。在即将过去的2010年年底，Milestone2(里程碑2)的上市再次振奋人心。经典外形配合改进的QWERTY侧滑全键盘设计，1GHz的A8架构处理器，原声的Android2.2智能操作系统，Milestone2必将继续辉煌。
图为：摩托罗拉 Milestone 2 手机
Milestone2依旧采用了1代的经典外观，显示面板和按键周围的装饰做了微小改动，而按键区域增加了倾斜角度，更便于操作。QWERTY全键盘依旧四列键位设计，取消了蹩脚的导航键，改成方向键设计，输入体验更加舒服。整机三围尺寸116.3x60.5x13.7mm ，运用大量金属材质，重169克，极有质感。3.7寸1600W色480x 854像素超大电容式触摸屏，具备多点触控的特性，并无提升。
图为：摩托罗拉 Milestone 2 手机
性能提升是Milestone2最大的特点，1GHz德州仪器OMAP3630处理器，基于ARM Cortex-A8核心进行制造，多任务处理流畅自如。 同时RAM系统运行内存容量提升至512MB，性能极强。原生Android2.2操作系统本身性能提升就很多，配合Milestone2强势的硬件，能带给用户极速的体验。其他方面，Milestone2内置500W像素自动对焦摄像头，可以摄制720P高清视频，并且支持HDMI输出，这点也要比1代有所提升。

description.hltext_display: Deadline today for nearly all holiday requests
description.content:
There is still time to help a few local organizations make the Christmas holiday better by making donations before their deadline, and there are others who need help all year long.
Organizations seeking help on Foster's Daily Democrat's Donations list include:
Rochester Child Care Center: Donations needed: Participate in the "Adopt a Family" program. Items needed include toys and winter clothing for children and gift cards to supermarkets or other local stores to provide food and diapers. Be a Santa's helper and call 603-332-9333. Contact is: Christiane Casserly, Executive Director, Rochester Child Care Center Inc., 95 Charles St., Rochester, N.H. 03867, www.rochesterchildcare.org. Deadline for holiday donations: Dec. 22.
Seymour Osman Community Center (Dover): Donations needed: New pots and pans for kitchen, baking dishes, cookie sheets, chafing dishes, serving utensils, mixing bowls, buffet tables (which double as student work spaces), student chairs, gift cards to Staples, Wal-Mart and Hannaford, newer flat panel (can be used) computer screens, new or used 15 passenger van. Contact is Cindi Wiggins, 603-749-6692 ext. 3. Deadline for donations: Dec 22.
Our House for Girls (ourhouseinc@comcast.net) — Needs include gym memberships, Wii consoles and remotes. Wii Fit, Wii games, ice skates, snow pants, gift cards to local stores, book and music gift cards, movie passes, iPod shuffles or nanos, CD/Radio boom boxes, disposable cameras, headphones and ear buds, hair straighteners (1 inch wet to dry type), bracelets, necklaces and earrings, jewelry boxes, makeup kits, warm coats/jackets, warm hooded sweatshirts, Ugg style boots, socks, crochet and knitting needles, yarn, jigsaw puzzles, wooden dining chairs, stackable office chairs, metal storage cabinet, wooden wardrobe, metal futon loveseat, 8-foot by 10-foot rectangular rug (darker colors), twin blankets, twin sheets, pillows, bath towels, pop-up hampers, laundry baskets, vacuum cleaner, Corelle dishware set (for 12). Contact Susan Lavallee, 603-742-2933. Deadline for donations: Dec. 22.
Dover Adult Learning Center: Donations needed: Calculators (Casio FX260 solar), gift cards for groceries, crafts, gas, office supplies, baby swing, CD/cassette player, paperback dictionaries. DALC is located at 61 Locust St., McConnell Building, Dover, NH 03820. Contact is Judi Currie, 603-742-1030; judi@curriecreative.com. Deadline is: Dec. 23.
Strafford County YMCA: Donations needed: Preschool toys appropriate for 3, 4 and 5 year olds, Play Dough, markers, paper, glue sticks, pencils. Contact is Sharon Porter, 603-332-7334; Deadline for donations: Dec. 24.
New Generation, Inc (Greenland): Donations needed: Diapers, baby wipes, gift cards for car gas, nonrecalled cribs, car seats, pack 'n' plays, strollers, gift cards to Walmart, Babys R Us, Target, baby hygiene items, BPA Free bottles, baby first aid kits, new crib mattresses, crib sheets, bassinet sheets, baby laundry detergent. Contact is Jennifer Bisson, 603-436-4989; executivedirector@newgennh.org. Deadline for donations is Jan. 1, 2011.
Seacoast Family Promise: Donations needed: Laundry detergent, bleach, dish soap, large bar soap, toilet paper, tissues, shampoo, hair conditioner, body lotion, soups, vegetables, fruit snacks, cereal, milk, juice and juice boxes, bottle water, crackers and cheese, baby food, popcorn, diapers of all sizes, wipes, microwaveable or toaster oven friendly food, hand sanitizer, turkeys and hams and fixings for the holidays. There are also opportunities to adopt a family for the holidays. Contact is Pati Frew-Waters, 603-658-8448, sihnnh@comcast.net. Deadline for donations: Jan. 5, 2011.
Pampered Paws Sanctuary (for cats): Donations needed: wet/dry cat food, cat litter, litter boxes, cat dishes, cat condos, cat beds/pads, office supplies, web site designer, volunteers, toys, medical supplies, flea treatment,/shampoos. Contact is Johanna Chawziuk, 603-755-1091, 5 Deer Cove, Farmington, NH, 03835; pamperedpawssanctuary@yahoo.com. Donations needed year round.
Dover Children's Center: Donations needed: Baby wipes, chalk, crayons, toys, board games, markers, art supplies, copy paper, pencils, office supplies, envelopes, clear contact paper, construction paper, toilet paper, multifold paper towels, laundry detergent, floor cleaner, hand soap refills, medical supplies, gloves, thermometers, towels, pot holders, kitchen towels, coffee mugs, plastic cups, paper plates, school glue, baby dolls, trucks, car mats, train sets, stencils, stamps, flannel, stamps, napkins, plastic silverware, and thank you and blank cards. Contact is Melissa Fischetto, 603-742-7673, melissadcc@ gmail.com. Donations needed year round.
Dover's Children's Home: Donations needed: Books of postage stamps, Tri-City energy gift cards for heating oil, Walmart gift cards, gas station gift cards (Shell or Citgo), Market Basket gift cards, Staples gift cards, Regal Stadium passes, Cafe on the Corner gift cards, HP Desk Jet black (#96) printer ink, HP Office Jet Pro 8000 black (#940) printer ink, HP Office Jet Pro L7590 black (#88XL) fax machine ink, gift cards to local restaurants, powdered laundry detergent, vacuum cleaner, local activity and event passes, job opportunities for the children; and monetary donations in any form and amount. Donations can be mailed, dropped off, or scheduled for pick up. Contact is Donna Coraluzzo, 207 Locust Street, Dover, N.H. 03820; 603-742-4289 ext. 12; dcoraluzzo@doverchildrenshome.org. Donations needed year round.
Community Food Pantry (Serving Somersworth, Rollinsford and Berwick, Me.): Donations needed: Hygiene products, canned goods, pasta, etc. Contact is Dickie Shaw, 603-828-7071, 1foxelady@gmail.com. Donations needed year round.
A Safe Place Domestic abuse support services and emergency shelter: Donations needed include gift cards, especially gas and grocery cards in increments of $10-$25. For the holidays gift cards to stores such as Walmart, TJ Maxx, Marshalls, Kohl's, and any other retail stores throughout Strafford and Rockingham counties where clothing, shoes, haircuts and other basic necessities can be purchased. Cards collected beyond the holiday season will help all year long for birthdays, graduations, and other special occasions. Contact is Thea Shaw, 603-436-4819 ext. 13; theas@asafeplacenh.org; Donations needed year round.
Amystreat: Donations needed: Gift cards to local restaurants and Rite Aid, Walmart, Target and grocery stores. Also gas cards, monetary donations and heating oil. Contact is Lenore Rogers, 978-265-7126, amystreat@aol.com. Donations needed year round.
Strafford County Homeless Outreach: Donations needed: Hunters hand warmers, socks (men's white tube), warm gloves (work style, not knitted), tents — 2 person or larger, pop top canned goods, Gatorade or Powerade (no energy drinks); individually wrapped breakfast or protein bars. Contact is Susan Ford, 603-516-8153. Donations needed year round.
Dover Share Fund: Monetary donations are needed. The Share Fund helps with emergency household expenses and basic needs and is under the fiscal agency of the Dover Cooperative Ministry Committee. Send donations to Dover Share Fund, PO Box 385, Dover, N.H. 03821-0385; Contact is Carole Jaffee, 603-617-6942; doversharefund@ gmail.com. Donations needed year round.
Somersworth Share Fund: Monetary donations are needed. This holiday season the fund has been offered a dollar for dollar matching grant. The Share Fund helps with emergency household expenses and basic needs and is under the fiscal agency of the Strafford County Action Committee. Send monetary donations to Somersworth Share Fund, PO Box 372, Somersworth, N.H. 03878. Contact is Sr. Helene Higgins, CSJ, 603-332-7701; Donations needed year round.
Barrington Community Food Pantry: Donations needed: Food, personal hygiene products and cash. Also provided and needing donations are Thanksgiving and Christmas Baskets with gifts. Donations can be mailed to the Barrington Community Food Pantry, PO Box 617, Barrington, NH 03825 or by dropping them off at the Barrington police station, 774 Franklin Pierce Highway, (Route 9). Contact is Chief Richard P. Conway or Katie Perry at the Barrington Police Department 603-664-7679; richardpconway@gmail. cmp. The Pantry is a 501c-3 nonprofit organization. Continuous need of donations.
Cocheco Valley Humane Society: Donations needed: canned dog food, canned kitten and cat food, dry dog and cat food, rope toys for dogs, stuffed animal dog toys, litter boxes, large blankets and comforters, small cat beds, baby blankets, toys for cats, kittens and dogs; cat treats, Kong toys for dogs, peanut butter, milk bone biscuits, 6 foot leashes, rabbit food, hay racks, salt licks and toys for rabbits, bleach, laundry detergent, paper towels, Kuranda dog beds of all sizes, digital camera, cargo van to transport animals, copy paper, gas cards, Adobe InDesign CS4, restaurant gift certificates, gift cards to Michaels craft shops, grocery store gift cards. Contact is Sarah Keener, 603-749-5322 ext. 106. Deadline for donations: Continuous need.
Elder Pet (elderpet.org) — Needed are canned dog and cat food; small bags of dog and cat food, pet store or grocery store gift cards to purchase pet food (food is needed and delivered year round). Food may be delivered to Cole Hall, Thompson School, UNH or pickup can be arranged by calling. Contact is Jerilee Zezula, 603-767-6856; jerilee. zezula@unh.edu. (Year round needs.)

description.hltext_display: Η Κύπρος κατήγγειλε την Τουρκία στον ΟΗΕ για νέες παραβιάσεις του εναέριου χώρου της
description.content: Ο Κύπριος μόνιμος αντιπρόσωπος στον ΟΗΕ, πρέσβης Μηνάς Χατζημιχαήλ, απέστειλε επιστολή διαμαρτυρίας προς τον γενικό γραμματέα του διεθνούς οργανισμού, Μπαν Κι-μουν, με την οποία καταγγέλλει τουρκικές παραβιάσεις και παραβάσεις των διεθνών κανονισμών εναέριας κυκλοφορίας και του κυπριακού εθνικού εναέριου χώρου που σημειώθηκαν από την 1η Σεπτεμβρίου μέχρι και τις 30 Νοεμβρίο ...

description.hltext_display: Girard : « Un point inespéré »
description.content: Montpellier a ramené un point de son voyage au Moustoir mardi soir (0-0) en match avancé de la 19e journée de L1. Le MHSC peut remercier la fébrilité des attaquants bretons. Ce qui fait dire à René Girard que ce point est tombé du ciel : « C'est un point inespéré, on est tombés sur une équipe lorientaise qui n'a pas voulu marquer en première période. On a été moyens, on s'est accroché. La pelouse synthétique nous a aussi beaucoup perturbés. Je trouve ça anormal de jouer sur cette surface dans un pays qui n'en a pas besoin. Mais ça n'explique pas tout, on est professionnels, on doit s'adapter. »

description.hltext_display: ROBERTS RELISHES RELAXED TIME WITH GLAMOROUS BANDMATES
description.content: NICOLA ROBERTS' favourite time with her glamorous GIRLS ALOUD bandmates is when they all relax at home with "rubbish hair and no make-up". The group, which is currently on hiatus, is the biggest girlband in the U.K. and the singers are renowned for their coiffured locks and stylish fashion sense. But Roberts admits that when they get together at each other's homes the beauties prefer nothing more than to pig out on junk food in their most casual attire. She tells Britain's Company magazine, "Cheryl (Cole) and Kimberley (Walsh) are like my sisters. But we don't get to see Sarah (Harding) as much as we'd like because she lives in Buckinghamshire. "As soon as we're together, it's like we've never been apart. We'll have a night in dressed in trackies (sportswear) or PJs (pyjamas), with rubbish hair and no make-up. We stock up on oven chips, chicken nuggets, olives and sweets, and put on (British soap) EastEnders, which we then just talk over all night!"

event_or_fact.property: "Cheryl (Cole) and Kimberley (Walsh) are like my sisters

description.hltext_display: 一场惜败令奇才脱胎换骨 迎战公牛全队豪言争胜
description.content:
对于本赛季的奇才来说，失败或是连败早已屡见不鲜了，队员们似乎也接受了这一点，但在美媒体csnwashington.com看来，凭借着横扫山猫时的惊艳表现，奇才或许能在下场对阵公牛时拿到两连胜，而这一切，只因为主场对阵迈阿密热火时那场遗憾的失利。
“（输给热火那天）走出球场时，我们每个人都憋着一肚子火，你知道，谁都不想以那种方式输球，我们本以为可以赢下热火的，”奇才后卫尼克-杨说，“这样输球很让人沮丧，但这场比赛也让我们认识到了自己的实力，下一场我们都想赢。”
自从阿里纳斯被交易走之后，尼克-杨似乎打出了职业生涯的最佳表现，现在他是奇才雷打不动的先发得分后卫，在对阵山猫的比赛中他就拿下了21分，在他迄今为止的4年NBA生涯中，在进攻端还从未如此自由。
奇才现在的战绩只有7胜19负，而且本赛季还从来没有取得过连胜，下一场他们的对手是16胜9负的公牛，尼克-杨和他的队友们能否取得本赛季的首个连胜？对此主帅桑德斯十分乐观，“自从那天和新泽西打完上半场后，我们接下来的十节比赛打得都非常好。”
桑德斯的自信并非毫无缘由，108-75击败山猫的比赛，奇才得了108分，108分也是他们本赛季的第三高分，75分则是他们本赛季的最低失分。“我一直这样告诉球员，只要你们都忠实地执行战术，得分并不是问题，我并不是说我们可以场场得分破百，但我们真的可以命中那些必须投中的球。”桑德斯说，“另外我觉得我们的防守也比以前更好了，之前我们一直在练习这个，现在看来作用明显。”
本赛季由于状元秀约翰-沃尔频频受到伤病困扰，辛里奇在控卫位置上的出场时间一直居高不下，但他也用表现回报了主帅的信任，上场对阵山猫的比赛他拿下了18分11次助攻。下场比赛对阵自己的老东家公牛，科克・辛里奇认为是时候展示球队的真正实力了。
“我们应该磨合成型了，这赛季我们已经打了20多场比赛，但当时我们表现的并不好，最近几场比赛情况开始变了，我们打得越来越好，坚决的切入、细致的跑位还有分享球权，我们都做得很不错。”辛里奇说。
奇才前锋布拉彻则表示，在球队之前的7连败期间，自己一直夜不能寐，直到最近情形好转，他的负罪感才稍有减轻，“我们一直在努力成为一支更好的球队，我知道我们离这个目标正越来越近，”布拉彻说，“现在我们有机会取得连胜，我希望我们可以把握这个机会。”

description.hltext_display: 即時體育: 麥斯盧比斯妻子 當眾餵人奶
man gets prison for tax evasion church scheme
description.content:
The Salt Lake Tribune
Updated 3 hours ago Updated Dec 21, 2010 10:16PM
A federal judge has ordered a Tremonton man to spend 42 months in prison for tax evasion, after he transferred property deeds to a “private church” called The Order of Tranquility as a way to avoid paying taxes from 1995 to 2001.
U.S. District Judge Clark Waddoups imposed the sentence on John Gauruder, 54, Monday. He ruled Gauruder must pay $409,685 to the IRS as a penalty for tax fraud.
Gauruder, a former Marine, was a licensed chiropractic physician at Tremonton Chiropractic Center before his arrest, according to records from the Utah Division of Occupational and Professional Licensing.
His wife, 57-year-old Jana Gauruder, and RulonDeYoung, of Salt Lake City, 68, were also charged.
According to a September 2008 indictment, the Gauruders avoided paying $336,843 in income taxes when Jana Gauruder transferred the title of the couple’s home to The Order of Tranquility, which is controlled by DeYoung.
DeYoung was charged with aiding the Gauruders and others to transfer their properties to his “church” to conceal their property ownership and to avoid paying taxes. He pleaded guilty in May to four counts of tax evasion and one count of corrupt interference with the due administration of Internal Revenue laws. Prosecutors said his actions cost the government $1.4 million in taxes. Waddoups in August ordered him to serve a three-year prison term.
Jana Gauruder pleaded guilty to a lesser tax evasion charge and was sentenced earlier this month to 36 months of probation. In a sentencing memorandum, her attorney said she’d been duped into participating in her husband’s scheme.
John Gauruder put his wife in charge of a trust he created in 1997 called High Teton Trust just after she gave birth at age 44 to their ninth child, an 11-pound baby who caused her health problems, according to court documents.
She followed her husband’s direction to transfer their property and the trust to The Order of Tranquility, court documents state. A judge granted her probation so she could care for her children, including one child who is disabled. The IRS seized the family’s home.

event_or_fact.property: aiding the Gauruders and others to transfer their properties
corrupt interference with the due administration of Internal Revenue laws

description.hltext_display: 易建联称大交易不影响自己 阿联：大将军很随和
description.content:
阿里纳斯走了，虽然他“抢”了易建联的9号球衣，但短短3个月的相处，“大将军”还是给阿联留下了很好的印象。“他是一个比较随和的人，也是老爱开玩笑，很活跃。”阿联说。
阿联并不比记者们更早知道交易的发生，他也是在赛前来到球馆之后才得到的消息，就在这天上午，他还在训练场上看到了阿里纳斯。
已经是在NBA打球的第4个赛季了，交易在阿联眼里早已是家常便饭，他说：“见惯不怪了，也不是第一次了。NBA的球队交易很多，特别是这几年的动作也是越来越大，很多强队都瞄着总冠军，只是各取所需嘛，这也是常事，毕竟是商业嘛。”
阿里纳斯的离开也是奇才重建的一部分，而年轻队员也将获得更多的机会，对此，阿联说：“现在打球的很多都是年轻队员，这个球队最主要不是因为年轻就怎么样，不管年不年轻都是要在场上打好球。重建不代表我们去放弃比赛，至关重要是把成绩提高上去。”
奇才在交易中得到了刘易斯，谈起刘易斯的到来对于球队可能产生的影响，阿联说：“他也是打过好几年季后赛，甚至是具备总决赛经验的球员，对我们来说，在经验上、场上的一些处理球上，会给我们带来更好的经验吧。”
而刘易斯近几个赛季在魔术打得最多的位置是大前锋，有人担心他的到来会对阿联的上场时间产生影响，被问到交易对自己的影响时，阿联笑了：“对我没影响啊，又没有交易我，我现在还在受伤，等几个星期养好伤后，回到场上打球啊。”

description.hltext_display: Friedrich von Metzler: "Wir stehen vor fünf bis zehn Jahren Wirtschaftswunder"
description.author: Peter Köhler, Robert Landgraf
description.content:
Friedrich von Metzler: "Vermögen erhält Unabhängigkeit."
Herr von Metzler, Ihre Bank ist seit 336 Jahren im Bankgeschäft. Hat es überhaupt schon einmal so eine Finanzkrise gegeben, wie wir sie jetzt erleben?
Oh, ja, sogar noch viel schlimmere. Denken Sie an den Beginn des letzten Jahrhunderts Die 20iger Jahre, die 30iger Jahre, die Hyperinflation.
Also waren Vermögen schon immer gefährdet?
Ja, denken Sie nur an den Ersten Weltkrieg, da haben wir und unsere Kunden viel Geld verloren, weil Auslandsvermögen enteignet wurden. 1923/24 war die Hyperinflation, viele Stiftungen, die damals nicht in Aktien und Immobilien investiert waren, haben mit vermeintlich mündelsicheren Anleihen ihr komplettes Vermögen verloren. Dann gab es die Weltwirtschaftkrise 1931/32, da wurden die meisten Banken vom Staat gestützt, wir übrigens nicht. Dann kam die Währungsreform 1948, durch die klar wurde, dass die Nominalvermögen vorher schon durch Inflation verloren gegangen sind.
Hätte man sich schützen können?
Aktien haben überlebt, die fielen zwar im Wert, haben in den 50iger Jahren ihren Wert wieder aufgeholt und dann deutlich steigern können.
Das passt zur Diskussion um die Schuldenkrise in Europa und um die Beteiligung der Anleihegläubiger an der Haushaltssanierung. Aktien wären dann ja auch heute die sicherere Anlage?
Wir sind der Ansicht, dass Aktien heute sicherer sind als manche Staatsanleihen und mehr Perspektive bieten. Bundespapiere sind natürlich sicher, aber manche Staatsanleihen sind es nicht.
Was halten Sie von Euro-Bonds?
Also, Deutschland ist, seit es die EWG gibt, immer Hauptszahler gewesen, das war auch gut für uns. Und wir werden auch Hauptzahler bleiben, weil wir wirtschaftlich stark sind und am meisten vom Euro profitieren. Die Entwicklung in den letzten Monaten hat der Öffentlichkeit erst bewusst gemacht, wie stark die einzelnen Länder verschuldet sind. Daher wollen wir keine Euroanleihen, weil der disziplinierende Effekt der Märkte künftig nicht mehr existieren würde. Da hat unsere Regierung unter Merkel und Schäuble durchaus Recht.
Aber fehlen nicht die Sanktionen für Verstöße?
Verstöße gegen den Stabilitätspakt bleiben ein Problem. Die jüngsten Maßnahmen der Europäischen Einrichtungen im Zusammenhang mit der Griechenlandhilfe setzt die Regierung in konkreten Sparmaßnahmen um. Da wurden Gehälter gesenkt, Pensionen gekürzt, da ist ein Maßnahmenkatalog entstanden, der ohne den Druck der Märkte undenkbar wäre.
Und die Euroanleihe würde alle Bonitäten einebnen …
Aber natürlich, den Regierungen würde das Heft aus der Hand genommen, große Strukturreformen könnten die Staatschefs nicht mehr verlangen. Die Disziplin, den Haushalt in Ordnung zu bringen, würde schlagartig wegfallen.

description.hltext_display: 100 CLUB OWNER IN TALKS WITH POTENTIAL SPONSOR
description.content: The future of London's iconic 100 Club is looking bright after a potential sponsor offered to help save the venue from closure, according to the owner. The tiny underground concert hall is at risk of going out of business because of the U.K.'s rising rent prices. Superstar rockers including Rolling Stones Ronnie Wood and Mick Taylor have lent their support to a campaign to save the concert venue and performed as part of a benefit show earlier this month (Dec10) to raise cash for a campaign to keep its doors open. Sir Paul McCartney chose the 100 Club over stadiums to perform a small lunchtime gig last Friday (17Dec10), throwing more support behind the cause. And now club boss Jeff Horton has revealed he's in talks with an unidentified donor who is willing to offer cash injections to ensure the venue remains open. He tells London's Evening Standard, "We are actually in talks now with somebody who's stepped forward who wants to sponsor the club. I can't tell you any more than that because I've signed terms so I'm tied to a confidentiality agreement. "I'm hopeful that something positive can be announced in the next week or so. It would involve the club keeping going - it would remain with me. "It's someone who knows we need a bit of support financially because it is more and more difficult to be independent in this day and age. If we're going to keep going and the club's legacy is going to continue, we need some support."

event_or_fact.property: "We are actually in talks now with somebody who's stepped forward who wants to sponsor the club

description.hltext_display: 刘易斯完成奇才队首训 迎战公牛队即将上演首秀
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：北京时间12月22日凌晨，据《华盛顿邮报》报道，北京时间12月21日至22日间，奇才队最近刚刚从魔术队交易得来的拉沙德－刘易斯首次参加了球队的训练，但是强度并不是很大，而在接下来奇才队对阵公牛队的比赛当中，刘易斯将会披挂上阵。
在刘易斯参加奇才队的首次训练当中，奇才主帅桑德斯并没有给他加量，目的只是想让刘易斯适应一下奇才队的战术体系，按照奇才队的战术体系，桑德斯将会让刘易斯兼打小前锋和大前锋两个位置。刘易斯的到来无疑将会对中国球员易建联在奇才队的位置和出场时间造成一定的影响，易建联由于膝盖受伤目前正处于养伤状态当中，在球队经历了此前重磅交易的巨变之后，易建联复出之后的前景更加难以预料。
“奇才队的战术打法与魔术队有着很大的不同，我几天之前还在打魔术队的进攻套路，而现在要从头开始学起，所以我必须得抓紧时间记一些东西。”刘易斯在接受采访的时候说道，“不过我是一名喜欢了解各个位置情况的球员，从一号位到五号位的打法我都很愿意去了解，虽然我一直是打的三号位和四号位。我希望通过了解各个位置的打法去熟悉自己的队友们在什么时间会出现在什么位置上。所以，这是需要一定的时间去学习这一切的。”

description.hltext_display: Törölte a WikiLeakset az Apple
description.content: A WikiLeaks App december 17-től volt elérhető az AppStore-ban, a titkos kormányzati iratokat és feljegyzéseket, felvételeket kiszivárogtató szervezetről elnevezett alkalmazás a cég szerint megsértette a fejlesztői irányelveket, ezért aztén eltávolították. A hivatalos álláspont: egy alkalmazásnak minden helyi törvénykezés előírásainak meg kell felelnie.Az app 1,99 dolláros árából egyébként csak nem sok maradt a fejlesztőnél, egy dollárt ugyanis a WikiLeaksnek utalt át a bevételből a programozó. Így az alkalmazás vásárlásával tulajdonképpen a szervezetet lehetett támogatni, másra nem is igen volt alkalmas, a programban megtalálható dokumentumok ugyanis ingyenesen megtalálhatóak a weben. Nemrég a PayPal is megszüntette az adományok kifizetését a WikiLeaksnek, és úgy tűnik, az Apple sem vesz részt a szemét mocskos mocskosszemét terroristák támogatásában.Az Apple mondjuk visszamondhatta volna ennyi erővel a forgalmazást arra a szabályozásra hivatkozva is, hogy az adományozásra létrehozott alkalmazásoknak ingyenesnek kell lenniük.

description.hltext_display: El sorteo de Navidad reparte más de 2.320 millones de euros
description.content:
EUROPA PRESS
El total de la emisión asciende a 3.315 millones de euros siendo Madrid la que cuenta con una cifra superior de consignación, 527 millones y un 70 por ciento de esta cantidad irá destinada a premios (2.320 millones de euros, en total). Cada serie distribuirá 11,9 millones en premios, hasta alcanzar una cifra total de 26 millones de euros.
Los premios se mantendrán igual que en anteriores ediciones, con el 'Gordo' de tres millones a la serie y un segundo y tercer premio de un millón y 500.000 euros a la serie respectivamente. Además, habrá dos cuartos premios de 200.000 euros a la serie y ocho quintos premios de 50.000 euros a la serie.
El sorteo de este año mantendrá el sistema tradicional de un bombo para el número y otro para premios. Asimismo, habrá 195 series, cada una de ellas de 85.000 billetes y a un precio del número completo de 39.000 euros (200 euros por cada billete, 20 el décimo).
La gran novedad de este año en el sorteo está relacionado no con los premios, sino con la manera de cobrarlos. Los participantes del sorteo del próximo miércoles con números premiados con más de 3.000 euros (conocidos como los 'premios grandes') podrán cobrarlos al día siguiente por primera vez desde la celebración de este evento. Hasta ahora, estos 'premios grandes' únicamente podían cobrarse nueves días después de la celebración del sorteo.
Otra novedad es el cambio de sede al Palacio de Congresos de Madrid tras 50 años de sorteos en el edificio de Guzmán el Bueno. El nuevo edificio tiene capacidad para 2.000 personas, mientras que el anterior sólo podía albergar a 500.
Asimismo, LAE estrena este año una web específica que incluirá noticias sobre el sorteo, además de una opción que permitirá a los usuarios consultar los números premiados. Asimismo, habrá una comercialización del décimo a través de terminales distribuidos en distintos puntos de venta.La Lotería de Navidad llega como cada año cargado de premios y reparte en esta ocasión más de 2.320 millones de euros. El bombo ha comenzado a rodar por lo que se da por iniciado el sorteo a la espera de que empiecen a salir los primeros premios importantes.
