description.hltext_display: The 411 Wrestling Top 5 12.22.10: Week 106 – Occupational Gimmicks
description.author: Michael Bauer
description.content: Hello everyone and welcome to 411 Wrestling's Top 5 List. What we are going to is take a topic each week and all the writers here on 411 wrestling will have the ability to give us their Top 5 on said topic, plus up to three honorable mentions. Most of our topics will be based on recent events in the Wrestling World, looking at those events that make us think of times past. So, on to this week's topic… Top 5 Occupational Gimmicks What did our group of writers select? Let's find out… Ryan Byers HONORABLE MENTIONS Men at Work - The team was short-lived, but I always got a kick out of this WCW trio of Chris Kanyon, Mark Starr, and Mike Wenner decked out as construction workers. My favorite match of theirs was one in which Kanyon spent the entire bout measuring the ring with a tape measure, only to overshoot a moonsault at the finish. The Gambler - Another entry on my list which makes it clear that I spent entirely too much time in the mid-1990's watching WCW Saturday Night, Main Event, and }. The Gambler, who apparently made his living outside of wrestling on the pro poker tour, was a hell of a jobber. 5. The Blacktop Bully - I've always had a soft spot for this character, which was played by Barry Darsow, the same guy who has also been known as Krusher Kruschev, Demolition Smash, The Repo Man, and Mr. Hole-in-One. The Bully was a wrestling trucker who showed up in WCW in 1994 and, for reasons that I'm not entirely clear on, started harassing Dustin Rhodes. One of my favorite things about Darsow in this persona was that he was incredibly vocal and incredibly loud, always shouting great over the top wrestling taunts like, "I'll break your stinkin' arm!" That feeds into one of my other favorite aspects of the Blacktop Bully, which was his finisher, at times referred to as the "Barely Legal" and at other times referred to as the "Breaker 1-9." It was a submission hold which involved Darsow doubling over his opponent's arm and shoving it into his chest, which looked horrifically painful. Of course, there was the bit where he had one of the worst matches I've ever seen in his "King of the Road" bout against Dustin, but we'll put that aside for now . . . 4. Dusty Rhodes - Speaking of Dustin Rhodes, here's his daddy Dusty. Of course, when I place Big Dust on the list of Top 5 Occupational Gimmicks, I'm not putting him on the list for the the work that originally made him famous in various NWA territories. I'm putting him on the list for his early 1990s run as a wrestler for the WWF, where, in addition to wearing polka dots and being matched with an out of nowhere valet, was portrayed as a "common man" working hard with his hands. Rhodes' pre-debut vignettes featured him in a variety of blue collar jobs, including plumber, garbage man, and pizza delivery boy. Dusty's WWF persona was a bit absurd in that he was a proven draw as a serious wrestler and probably could have been used at a significantly higher level in the company than he actually was. However, at the same time, Dusty has such natural charisma that he took what would otherwise be lousy material and turned it into a gimmick that brought about more than its fair share of laughs. In short, Dusty probably should've gotten a better run that he did, but at least he was very entertaining in the run that he got. 3. The Mountie/The Quebecers - I've gone back and watched a fair amount of footage of him recently, and I have to say that Jacques Rougeau was maybe one of the most underrated heels of the early 1990's. In addition to being a fine performer in the ring, he also had boatloads of charisma and was one of those guys who you could always count on to do and say the "little things" to add a little bit of extra entertainment value to the segments in which he was involved. He was going to be able to make anything that he did work, and, when he became DA MOUNTIE~! he turned it into a very memorable midcard heel act, complete with delightfully off-key entrance music, legal threats from the real RCMP, and a slightly hokey "shock stick." Of course, the only thing that could have been better than one Mountie was two mounties, and that's what we got when Carl Ouellet joined the act as "Pierre." Though not as charismatic as Jacques, he brought more size and power to the ring along with an uncanny agility, adding to the act greatly. 2. The Godfather - When you write it down on paper, the phrase "wrestling pimp" sounds ridiculous, perhaps just as ridiculous (if not moreso) than "wrestling garbage man" or "wrestling dentist." However, no matter how odd the concept sounds, when the former Papa Shango actually became a wrestling pimp, the man was OVER. He may not have been a main eventer by any stretch of the imagination, but the remarkable popularity of the gimmick lead to him receiving some of the loudest crowd reactions of any wrestler aside from the Rock and Steve Austin during the Attitude Era of the World Wrestling Federation. Many memorable angles were born of the Godfather's opponents being offered a ride on the "ho train" in lieu of having a wrestling match, and the unusual character combined with the fun-loving personality of the man behind the character lead to this being one of the best remembered acts of the late 1990s, even if it is one that we will probably not see on WWF nostalgia shows for some time given the company's current "PG" direction. 1. The Big Bossman - Let's face it, the majority of Occupational Gimmicks are jokes. Nobody really cared about Tony Anthony running around as T.L. Hopper, and WCW's wrestling pianist the Maestro was a pretty huge joke. However, if there is one person who has been able to transcend what could have been a lousy Occupational Gimmick and turn it into a very successful career, it's been one Ray Traylor. Traylor, from Cobb County, Georgia, had been in wrestling for several years before he made his debut with the WWF, where he was repackaged as wrestling cop the Big Bossman. Originally the character was a heel who actually got very good heat in a program against Hulk Hogan thanks to an angle in which the Hulkster was handcuffed to the ring ropes and brutalized with the Boss' nightstick. Before long, the Bossman had turned babyface, and he wound up hanging out at around the top of the company's cards for many more years, all the while cutting appropriately themed promos on opponents about how he was going to put them behind bars, make them serve hard times, make them respect law/order/justice, and so on down the line. In fact, the gimmick was so popular that, when the Bossman jumped to WCW after finishing up his WWF run, his new employers tried as hard as they possibly could to keep the gimmick alive, first calling him the Boss and then the Guardian Angel to keep Traylor using nightsticks and handcuffs. Intellectual property lawyers (real lawyers, not wrestlers doing lawyer gimmicks) prevented that from going on for too long, but they couldn't keep fans from thinking of Traylor as the Big Bossman for the rest of his career, no matter what name he was actually going by at the time. LARRY CSONKA 5. The Gambler - With Pokerstars being all the rage and professional poker players making more and more money these days, The Gambler left a promising career in the ring to continue on his true and given professional as a professional card shark. We will never know how great this man could have been, thanks to his love of playing Texas Hold'Em. 4. Isaac Yankem, DDS - Who do more than 20% of Americans admit to being afraid of and avoid going too? The Dentist! Who better to freak out kids in a era of gimmickty than an EVIL Dentist? Isaac Yankem, DDS, who would go on to later have a very long WWE career as Kane, was brought in as Jerry Lawler's maniacal dentist, and as a foil for Bret Hart. Who knew back then that he would go on to such a long, and successful career? 3. The State Patrol - The Big Bossman in all incarnations may get all the love for law enforcement, but in WCW, Sergeant Buddy Lee Parker and Lieutenant James Earl Wright were The State Patrol. They were a great jobber in the fact that they were good enough to be a threat when needed, and could just work with anyone in a believable match. 2. Arachnaman - You know, Spider-Man always gets the credit when it comes to being a webslinging crime fighter. But why doesn't Arachnaman get the love? It it because he wore purple and yellow? DAT'S RACIST! 1. The Repo Man - With the economy being in the dumper and people looking for jobs, the one thing that we can all agree on is that we fear repossession. From 1991-1993, Barry Darsow was the sneaky heel known as "The Repo Man," and would do his job, repossessing items such as cars from people when they were late on or unable to make their payments. Darsow was solid in the ring, and had great over the top mannerisms, that made the gimmick work. When I think back to guys like this, I do miss silly characters in wrestling. When properly used, they work well. When overused or just thrown around, they are like cruel abuse. Marc Elusive HONORABLE MENTIONS T.L. Hopper - Remember the turd at the bottom of the Summerslam pool Duke "The Dumpster" Droese - Any gimmick list needs him 5. Big Bossman - Whether it be a Cobb County prison guard or Mr. McMahon's corporate head of security; the Bossman was the law order and justice of the WWF/E. A wrestling policeman that fits the description of occupational gimmick; especially in 1991, Bossman was one, if not the, best big man in the business for many years. The gimmick lasted as well; time is a good barometer of determining if the gimmick is good. 4. Bob "Spark Plug" Holly - I'll give ol' Bob Holly some love. The character was a wrestling racecar driver, granted Holly was more over as Hardcore Holly, but he tried and actually acquired a tag tea title with it, one day but still, titles did not go from person to person those days. The promos were funny as well and he was an actual good wrestler as well. 3. Henry Godwinn/The Godwinns - Hog farmers, that's an occupation, I'm sure Mike Rowe has done it (when not plugging Ford). Henry debuted as a nasty hillbilly when all hillbillies were faces prior to him and The Godwinns (who I also preferred as heels) were a decent tag team. Anytime they were faces they were not as entertaining. I guess all good hog farmers are heels. 2. Repo Man - I loved this over-the-top character played by Barry Darsow. I find him as sort of a guilty pleasure of mine; the gimmick was wrestlecrap worthy but the way he was portrayed it was a thing of beauty. He was not Ric Flair in the ring or The Rock on the microphone but he could work a decent match and his promos were hilarious. 1. Undertaker - The occupation was a dead mortician but it morphed into one of the most legendary characters in all pro wrestling history. The character did not look like it was going to last due to the suspended belief inherited in the character; the guy is a zombie who is impervious to pain. However, the character stayed popular and has become one if not the greatest characters on of all time. Greg DeMarco 5. The Godfather - The man played a pimp. Not a "Pimp!" but an actual pimp. His "Supple & Demand" team with Val Venis was a great idea, and his interruption of the Billy & Chuck Wedding lead to some great lines. And we all learned that "Pimpin' Ain't Easy!" 4. The Goon - In hockey, a goon is more than just a myth. Goons exist all over the sport, designed to go in there and be the enforcer--or to draw a penalty from the opposition's top player. What better professional athlete to transition to the world of professional wrestling? And when he does transition, he still keeps all of his hockey gear and equipment? Perfect. 3. Gregory Helms, Mild Mannered Reporter - With crime fighting superhero The Hurricane flying all over RAW, his alter ego couldn't be far behind. Completing backstage interviews, Gregory Helms did his best to hide his secret identity, but we all knew better. 2. Val Venis - The attitude era brought us a product universally praised by many wrestling fans. The storylines and characters, for the most part, were perfectly targeted to the audience that grew out of the cartoon era. Val Venis was the perfect character for that generation. Val was a porn star, and played the role perfectly with his attitude, promos and mannerisms. As mentioned, his pairing with The Godfather was a great match, but only after both characters had been long established. While he also played assistant commissioner and Right to Censor goon for a while, anytime Sean Morley shows up on camera he will immediately be remembered as Val Venis. With him back in the fold as a backstage agent, Morley should work with young wrestlers (both on the roster and in FCW) on how to sell their characters from a 360 degree perspective. On the mic, in the ring, every little aspect of what he did was porn star, and that's why it was such a memorable gimmick. 1. The Repo Man - Of the many gimmicks Barry Darsow had, this was by far my favorite of his, and easily my favorite occupational gimmick of all time. I'm not sure if it was the way Darsow played it, or the look, but this just worked for me. I thought it never reached its full potential, either. Imagine the heights The Repo Man could have ascended to with the proper push. Imagine a modern day Repo Man, repossessing Vince McMahon's limo backstage, or even repossessing the WWE rig off of the arena lot so part of the stage is missing. I have a two year old daughter who religiously watches Dora The Explorer. There's no way in hell those creators who came up with Swiper The Fox didn't see some Repo Man when they were younger.

description.hltext_display: Hallan muerto a un ex concejal de IU relacionado con el caso de la menor secuestrada
description.content:
EFE
Según ha indicado el portavoz municipal de esta formación, Miguel Antonio Fernández Cangas, esta persona, que fue concejal hace 18 años y que actualmente estaba desvinculada de la política, había prestado declaración por este caso, aunque desconoce en calidad de qué lo había hecho.
Sin embargo, la Delegación del Gobierno en Extremadura no confirma ni desmiente la vinculación que algunos medios de comunicación han establecido de esta muerte y la operación policial en la que han sido detenidas doce personas por retener ilegalmente y explotar sexualmente a una menor española. Apuntan a que el exconcejal habría sido detenido y puesto en libertad por, presuntamente, con la niña. Fuentes de la Delegación gubernativa han explicado que al estar el caso bajo secreto del sumario no pueden ofrecer más datos que los dados a conocer esta mañana por la delegada del Gobierno, Carmen Pereira, cuando informó de la operación de la Guardia Civil. Según la información facilitada por Pereira, cinco de los detenidos son rumanos por la retención ilícita de una menor cuya desaparición había sido denunciada en Madrid semanas antes.
La menor fue obligada a mantener relaciones sexuales a cambio de dinero en un domicilio del municipio pacense de Arroyo de San Serván, situado a unos 25 kilómetros de Mérida y que cuenta con una población de unos 4.000 habitantes. Los otros siete detenidos lo fueron por mantener relaciones sexuales con la menor.
Fuentes de la familia han confirmado la muerte del ex concejal y aunque señalan que había estado detenido "por una movida que ha habido en el pueblo" y posteriormente puesto en libertad, no se pronuncian sobre si estaba relacionado con la retención y abusos a la menor.
Daniel Cangas, soltero y de 55 años, fue concejal de Izquierda Unida hace 18 años, era cazador y actualmente no tenía ya ninguna vinculación con la formación política. "Nadie podía esperar un desenlace como este", ha señalado el edil, que ha agregado: "Alguien por la presión o por lo que sea ha decidido quitarse la vida por un tiro de escopeta".Un ex concejal de IU en Arroyo de San Serván Daniel Cangas, una de las personas que ha prestado declaración ante la Guardia Civil en la operación llevada a cabo por la retención ilegal y abuso sexual de una menor, ha sido encontrado muerto este martes en su domicilio con dos disparos en la cabeza.

description.hltext_display: 火箭承认已正式申请伤病特例 补强中锋迫在眉睫
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：北京时间12月22日凌晨，据美联社报道，火箭队已经正式向NBA联盟申请关于姚明脚踝应力性骨折而赛季报销的受伤球员薪资空间特例（伤病特例），这样火箭队如果申请成功的话，他们将可以利用这个伤病特例争取再签一名中锋球员补强内线。
姚明自从11月10日扭伤脚踝之后一直缺阵，上周五火箭队方面突然宣布姚明左脚踝出现应力性骨折，宣布本赛季报销。美联社指出，伤病特例将可以允许火箭队到自由球员市场上去签约一名自由球员，或者是通过交易引进一名薪资与这个伤病特例相匹配的球员，伤病特例的总金额可以达一份中产合同的金额，大约为575万美元。
火箭队的新闻发言人尼尔森－路易斯于美国当地时间周二确认了火箭队方面的决定。本月早些时间，NBA联盟已经因为格雷格－奥登遭遇令其终结赛季的膝盖伤情而给了开拓者队一份伤病特例。在2009年，由于姚明出现伤病而赛季报销，NBA联盟当时也给过火箭队一份大约为570万美元的伤病特例，当时火箭队是用那份伤病特例签入了阿里扎，后来在用了阿里扎一个赛季之后又在一桩四方交易当中把他交易给了黄蜂队，换回了康特尼－李。

description.hltext_display: 全球销量第一触屏街机 诺基亚5230售价990元
description.content:
诺基亚5230和前作5800XM相比只是摄像头缩水，去掉了wifi功能，而售价却只需 便可搞定，并且还有一堆后壳可以换对追求时尚跟性价比的朋友来说相当不错，追求性价比的朋友可以去看看。
诺基亚 5230搭载了Symbian9.4操作系统和S60第五版触控操作界面，且搭配换彩壳、GPS导航、WCDMA 3G网络等丰富功能，一上市价格也是非常的低廉，性能表现出众，以及靓丽的外观，完全符合年轻朋友追求时尚的潮流;在硬件配置上诺基亚 5230还选配了一颗有效运行频率达到434MHz的处理器，内置58MB用户存储空间，支持Micro SD卡的扩展。
图为：诺基亚 5230 手机
在多媒体方面，诺基亚 5230手机内置方便易用的音乐播放器，支持长达33小时的播放时间并配备3.5毫米耳机插孔，为了提供更加强劲的音乐体验，任何支持3.5毫米音频接口的耳机都适用于诺基亚 5230。此外，诺基亚 5230所提供的媒体栏(Media Bar)，可以帮助人们快捷地访问所喜爱的媒体及应用，如音乐、照片、YouTube或Ovi全分享(Ovi Share)等。
图为：诺基亚 5230 手机

description.hltext_display: Dead Space - Visszatekintő
description.author: nightwolf
description.content:
Kapcsolódó játékok: Dead Space 2
Akik lemaradtak az első rész borzalmairól...
A tegnapi napon megjelent a Dead Space második rész demója, amit a mai naptól már mind a két konzolra - Xbox 360-ra és PlayStation 3-ra - már lelehet tölteni.
Az alkotók voltak olyan kedvesek, hogy gondoltak azon „felelőtlen" személyekre, akik még nem játszottak az űrben zajló túlélő horrorral. Hogy kellő tudással felvegyék majd a történet fonalát - az ilyen gamerek -, készítettek egy kis összefoglalót, amely bemutatja, hogy Isacc Clarke milyen bonyodalmakon ment eddig keresztül. A videó enyhe SPOILER veszélyt jelent azoknak, akik tervezik, hogy visszamenőleg fejest ugranak az első rész viszontagságaiba. A mozgókép kellően meghozza a kedvet a január 28-án megjelenő Dead Space 2-höz.

description.hltext_display: Motín en Chile
description.content: Al menos 36 reclusos, seis guardias y un carabinero resultaron heridos en la prisión de Antofagasta, al norte de Chile, durante un motín. Un grupo de reclusos llegó hasta el techo del centro penitenciario, donde quemaron colchones. Tras el motín de la prisión de San Miguel, el pasado 8 de diciembre, donde murieron 81 reclusos, varias prisiones del país han registrado incidentes graves.

description.hltext_display: HUSSAINY DISPELS SPLIT RUMOURS AS SHE JETS TO COWELL'S SIDE
description.content: SIMON COWELL's fiancee MEZHGAN HUSSAINY has dispelled ongoing rumours the pair's relationship is in trouble after jetting out to Barbados to join the music mogul for a luxury festive break. The music mogul proposed to the make-up artist earlier this year (10) and rumours were rife they would wed within months. However, split rumours quickly surfaced after they spent most of 2010 apart due to Cowell's filming commitments in the U.K. and her job in Los Angeles. Hussainy was quick to dismiss the reports and told reporters the pair was still "engaged - as far as I know". Reports the pair had ended its romance refused to go away - and gossip reached fever pitch when Cowell jetted off to his beloved Caribbean resort to start his Christmas holiday without his lover last week (ends19Dec10). But Hussainy happily refuted the reports after she was snapped stepping off a private jet in Barbados on Monday (21Dec10) and was chauffeured to Cowell's side at the island's luxury Sandy Lane resort.

description.hltext_display: 火箭官网：验证团结就是力量 休城终于找回自信
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：北京时间12月22日凌晨，火箭队官方网站发表一篇文章，对火箭队的近况进行了评述：
五大于一，这似乎听起来很简单，而且也是数学当中不可反驳的一个现实。然而，在篮球场上，这一点并不是每支球队都能够做得到的。我们在这里所说的是球队如何催化化学反应、形成球队整体战力的问题。
火箭队在本赛季曾经经历过球队未能捏合成型而战力低迷的日子，而在昨天对阵勇士队的比赛当中，现在已经凝聚成一个战斗集体的火箭队真正体会到了“五大于一”的道理。勇士队的蒙塔－埃利斯曾经在赛季之初对阵火箭队的比赛当中表现神勇，全场一人独得46分，那场比赛火箭队遭遇失利，而昨天火箭队再次碰上勇士队时，埃利斯继续上演个人英雄式的表现，但是这一回火箭队凭借的是他们球队的整体配合与发挥，团队的力量最终战胜了个人英雄式的表现。
在昨天的比赛当中，看到埃利斯前三节的神勇表现之后，火箭队决定采用团队的力量对死掐对手的最强点，最终火箭队当然做到了这一点，以出色的表现最终121－112战胜勇士队，这样火箭队就在最近11场比赛当中获得了8场胜利，也取得了他们本赛季的首个三连胜。
“勇士队在第四节真的对我们发起了强有力的冲击。”火箭主帅阿德尔曼在谈到球队顶住勇士队冲击这一点时说道，“他们曾经一度一切进展顺利，但是我们在最后六分钟时间里抵挡住了对手的冲击，执行好了一些战术之后终于取得了胜利。我对于我们球队没有放弃的精神感到自豪。我们的转移球做得很好，我们的球员们在场上的跑位也很好，这才是我们真正在进攻端需要做的事，我们的人员跑起来之后，我们会获得更好的机会，会打得更好。”
事实上，火箭队现在已经找到了自己的身份定位和成功的模式，那毫无疑问就是漂亮的转移球，拉开空间，然后把阿德尔曼在战术板上所画出来的战术打法到球场之上加以实施。现在的火箭可以说是遍地英雄，凯文－马丁是得分机器，巴蒂尔和海耶斯是防守机器，斯科拉表现稳定，可以算得上是现在火箭队的全能战士，本赛季截止目前斯科拉打出的数据是场均20分和9个篮板。凯尔－洛瑞则是火箭队的发动机，康特尼－李堪称火箭队的板凳匪徒，他登场之后经常能够用自己的强悍防守扼制对方箭头人物的发挥。
最终的结果就是，火箭队又得到了一场他们急需的胜利，同时继续接近五成的胜率。这样一场胜利来自客场是很重要的，因为此前火箭队的客场战绩一直很糟糕，他们需要这样的客场表现来进一步提振士气。
但是，最重要的一点是，火箭队现在打得很有自信，而且他们找到了他们在赛季之初的第一个月里最缺乏的化学反应。现在的火箭队可以说是终于找回了迷失的自我，找到了令自己感到最舒服的“皮肤”。对于火箭队来说，他们的力量可以在数据当中体现出来。只要火箭队继续做出真实的自我，那他们是可以继续安全的前进的，因为数据不会说谎，“五大于一”这样的说法也不会出卖他们。在比赛场上打得有纪律性、有团队精神仍然是走向成功的必经之路。

description.hltext_display: PSD exige explicações do Governo sobre transferência de fundo pensões da PT
description.content:
O líder parlamentar do PSD exigiu, esta terça-feira, que o Governo preste explicações sobre a avaliação, as condições e as implicações futuras da transferência para o Estado do fundo de pensões da PT.
Este conteúdo necessita do Adobe Flash Player. Obter aqui
Enviar por email Link
Durante o jantar de Natal do grupo parlamentar do PSD, que decorreu no Centro de Congressos de Lisboa, Miguel Macedo acusou o Governo de não ter dado «nenhuma explicação sobre esta matéria», assinalando que «esta operação tem de consumar-se até ao fim do ano».
O líder parlamentar do PSD considerou que será ilegítimo «que uma operação destas se faça sem nenhuma explicação pública, porventura entre o Natal e o Ano Novo, quando os portugueses estão em família a comemorar esta quadra festiva e, sobretudo, quando o Parlamento está fechado».
«Isto não é forma de tratar aspectos muito relevantes da nossa vida colectiva e daqui o PSD lança este repto, este desafio e esta exigência: o Governo vai ter mesmo de explicar tudo sobre esta matéria. E nós queremos saber tudo sobre esta matéria, porque não queremos ter surpresas no futuro», declarou.
Segundo Miguel Macedo, não se sabe «em que termos foi avaliada esta transferência, quais as condições que rodeiam esta transferência e quais as implicações futuras para o sistema de Segurança Social que decorrem desta transferência».
«E estas são perguntas que não queremos deixar de fazer e são exigências que fazemos a partir daqui ao Governo», acrescentou, alegando que o PSD tem «tanta ou maior legitimidade» para exigir explicações por não se opor à operação.
«Mas uma coisa é termos a posição de princípio de não oposição, outra coisa é aceitarmos sem conhecermos os fundamentos, as razões, tudo aquilo que significa transferir o fundo de pensões da PT, ou seja, 2,8 mil milhões de euros, para a Segurança Social. Fica feita esta exigência pública ao Governo», reforçou.

description.hltext_display: Pedophile-book author in court
description.content:
A man who wrote a controversial book considered a "how-to" guide for pedophiles is expected to have a first appearance in a Florida courtroom Wednesday afternoon.
The appearance comes a day after Phillip Greaves held court in front of reporters and tried to defend the book.
Greaves, who was arrested in Colorado on Monday, said the book, "The Pedophile's Guide to Love and Pleasure: A Child-Lover's Code of Conduct," can be used as a guide to rehabilitating pedophiles. And, instead of teaching them how to avoid arrest, it teaches them to avoid illegal actions, he said.
Greaves has been charged with the distribution of obscene material depicting minors engaged in harmful conduct, Florida authorities said.
Asked if he is a pedophile, Greaves said, "I only have sex with grown-ups." He said he has no children and "I don't keep children around my house." Polk County, Florida, Sheriff Grady Judd has said his detectives were able to establish jurisdiction in the case by conducting an undercover operation, buying the book through the mail.
Greaves protested Tuesday saying he is the target of entrapment, but Judd disagreed. "He wrote this book, he published this book, he put it on Amazon to sell," Judd told reporters as Greaves was being booked into the Polk County Jail, "and he freely responded to our desire to purchase it." Greaves and his book gained national attention earlier this year after Amazon.com defended selling the book on its website despite angry comments and threats of boycotts from thousands of people. The book was removed from the website in early November.
Officials said the book talks about safe sex and avoiding injury to children, grooming and preparing children for sex and teaching children how to lie to their parents.
Judd said Greaves' book outlines a "code of ethics" that shows pedophiles how to look for the most vulnerable children.
Greaves told reporters Tuesday he wrote the book to exorcise his own childhood. He said he was introduced to sex at the age of 7 by a 10-year-old friend and began having sex with other children. This continued, he said, until he was about 15, when he stopped and did not have sex again for years. "Once I got into adolescence, I suppose you could have identified me as an adolescent pedophile," he said. But now, he said, he is an example of the fact that people can reform. "I think all speech should be protected," Greaves said. But "I was not the one who solicited the material to be sent to Florida. I think Florida law is for Floridians and Colorado law is for Coloradoans." He told reporters he will not be able to make bond: "I'm actually quite poor." CNN legal analyst Jeffrey Toobin said on CNN's "AC360" Monday night that prosecutors may have a hard time convicting Greaves, and maintained his arrest was unconstitutional. "I don't think they can go forward because the book is clearly protected by the First Amendment," Toobin said. "This book, as awful as it is, it is only words." Judd vehemently disagreed with Toobin's assessment of the case and the two sparred on the program. "This has nothing to do with free speech and everything to do with obscenity," Judd said. "We had a law in Florida that applied. We only needed jurisdiction." Loading weather data ...

description.hltext_display: Greeks go on strike before austerity budget vote
description.content:
22/12/2010 08:23
ATHENS (Reuters) - Greek unions called a general strike on Wednesday and Athens was paralysed by a 24-hour public transport stoppage in protest against the government's 2011 budget, set to pass later as part of an EU/IMF bailout.
The budget, meant to help stem a debt crisis that has shaken the euro zone, includes further tax hikes and wage cuts in state-run enterprises, especially in public transport.
Fitch said on Tuesday it may cut Greece's credit rating next month to junk as both other major rating agencies have done.
"Even though this news was expected, it will go down badly with the markets, there is widespread fear about downgrades coming," said Ioanna Telioudi, analyst at HSBC in Athens.
Greece's main public and private sector labour unions have called a 3-hour strike from 10 a.m. to 1 p.m. British time in Athens. Thousands are expected to rally outside parliament.
Athens bus and subway drivers have been holding on and off strikes for two weeks, keeping Christmas shoppers from the city centre, adding to the strain of recession-hit retailers.
The government threatened on Wednesday to break the public transport strikes, invoking emergency legislation it used earlier this year to dissolve labour action by truck drivers and other transport workers.
"Everyone has to show responsibility ... the state has all the powers it needs to protect the public interest," government spokesman George Petalotis said in a television interview.
Analysts have warned the additional measures will hurt the economy even more without providing guarantees that the country will avoid a debt restructuring to cope with ballooning debt.
The government has a comfortable majority of 156 seats out of 300 in parliament and the budget is expected to be approved despite growing discontent among the ruling PASOK party ranks.
"I am giving the government a last chance," said PASOK deputy Thomas Robopoulos during the budget debate on Tuesday. Since the EU/IMF bailout agreement was signed in May, Prime Minister George Papandreou has expelled four deputies for disagreeing publicly with his austerity policies
The socialists, who revealed a gaping budget deficit after coming to power last year, have braved public discontent and taken draconian measures to meet the bailout terms.
The government has cut public sector wages by about 15 percent, increased the retirement age, frozen pensions, cut public spending but has failed to boost tax collection as much as targeted, despite a hefty VAT increase.
Greece's lenders have said that the country was broadly on track with its fiscal program but needed to step up reforms and spending cuts next year.
Partly as a result of the measures, the economy is seen shrinking by 3 percent next year after a 4.2 percent drop in 2010, with unemployment jumping to a record 14.6 percent from an estimated 12.1 percent this year.
Greece targets a deficit of 7.4 percent of GDP next year, from about 9.4 percent this year.
Greek protesters clashed with police last week and set fire to cars and a hotel in central Athens earlier this month, as some 50,000 marched against austerity in the biggest and most violent march since three died in protests in May.

description.hltext_display: Στραγγάλισε τον τρίχρονο γιο της διότι την ενοχλούσε ενώ έπαιζε στο Ιντερνετ
廉价兼智能!Android手机亚洲热卖TOP5
description.content:
12月21日 虽然这头传出诺基亚和微软联合推出智能机的消息，那头的苹果iPhone4卖得依旧火爆，但是谷歌Android操作系统在广大消费者心中所占有的比例绝对没有些许消减。尤其是Android系统的亲们方式，让这样的开源系统在得到了广大用户认可的同时还能得到更多其他系统所无法比拟的好感。
日前，asia.cnet给我们带来的最新排名，Android操作系统手机性价比榜，在这个前五名的榜单中大家可以看到最具购买力以及最具用户认可的廉价Android操作系统手机排名。虽然它们的硬件规格未达到最优，但是在性价比的考量上它们绝对过关。
索尼爱立信X8是一款新近推出的Android智能机，它是继X10、X10MINI，X10mini pro之后的第三款索尼爱立信Xperia系列机型，其主要面向中低端智能手机用户。
索爱Xperia X8的外观设计与X10、X10mini等机型十分相似，机身采用了大量的曲线元素，灵动流畅。它采用一块3英寸的电容式触控屏幕，搭载了Android 1.6版本系统和跟X10 Mini一样的用户操作界面。机身的三围尺寸为99x54x15mm，机身重量仅为104克，其体积在谷歌智能机中非常小巧。
索尼爱立信Xperia X8采用主频达600MHz的处理器以及128MB的机身内存。配备了320万像素的摄像头和3.5mm的耳机接口，支持FM收音、WiFi无线局域网接入和A-GPS导航等功能。支持地理标记功能，支持WiFi、蓝牙、GPS、3.5mm耳机插孔、USB、条码扫描、Google手机应用等功能。提供了纯白、蓝白渐变等多种颜色供消费者选择。该机搭配一块1200mAh电池，采用了Android 1.6版本的系统和跟X10 Mini一样的用户操作界面。

description.hltext_display: Indonézania si odniesli valašku a zmluvu o spolupráci
description.content:
Vysokoškolskí učitelia z Indonézie navštívili zasneženú Nitru. Univerzity budú spolupracovať pri výskume.
NITRA. Študenti poľnohospodárstva v Nitre majú nových partnerov - Indonézanov, ktorých početná delegácia pricestovala na návštevu. Pre Indonézsku výpravu je Slovensko malá neznáma exotická krajina. Na spoločnom stretnutí jeden z pracovníkov Univerzity Gunadarma s úsmevom poznamenal, že u nich nikdy nepadá sneh a preto sa im vraj u nich cestuje oveľa ľahšie. Ich cesty budú mať možnosť vyskúsať naši študenti onedlho, v januári sem pôjdu niektorí na skusy.
Vysoké školstvo v Indonézii za posledné dekády prudko napreduje. Dôkazom je aj nový partner nitrianskej SPU. Univerzita Gunadarma v Depoku mala pred 30 rokmi iba 92 študentov. Dnes ich má vyše 30 tisíc. Je najlepšia spomedzi súkromných škôl v krajine a patrí medzi stovku najlepších univerzít v Ázii. V Indonézii žije okolo 250 miliónov obyvateľov na takmer 18 tisícoch ostrovov. Tvoria pestrú zmes najrôznejších náboženstiev, prevažujú moslimovia. Hovorí sa tu vyše 700 jazykmi.
Rektor dostal domček
Slovenská poľnohospodárska univerzitaje štvrtá najlepšia univerzita na Slovensku, Gunadarma je tiež štvrtá najlepšia vo svojej krajine. Akurát v Indonézii je univerzít okolo tisíc, kým u nás len dvadsať. Ázijský partner má dobré meno v oblasti poľnohospodárstva. Rektor SPU Peter Bielik navštívil Indonéziu pred časom, boli tu aj zástupcovia z Hardvardu či austrálskych škôl.
Bielik a jeho indonézska partnerka rektorka E. S. Margianti si sľúbili, že budú spolupracovať v oblasti informatiky, strojárstva a výskumu biodiverzity. Indonézsky veľvyslanec Harsha Joesoefa poznamenal, že otázka potravín bude v 21. storočí hrať veľmi dôležitú rolu a preto treba podporovať vedecké inštitúcie, ktoré sa touto oblasťou zaoberajú. Delegácie si vymenili aj darčeky. Bielik daroval Indonézanom malú valašku a slovenskú rurálnu drevorezbu. Na oplátku dostal tradičnú indonézsku košeľu a malý model exotického roľníckeho domu.

description.hltext_display: 赢球代价榜火箭仅列第16 姚明受伤严重拖累休城
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：北京时间12月22日，美国著名篮球专家大卫-博瑞，撰文对联盟30支球队的赢球性价比进行了评比分析。结果显示，热火是全联盟赢球代价最小的球队，奇才最差，火箭列第16位，湖人第15。
博瑞的评比规则很简单明了，那就是用各支球队本赛季的薪水总额（奢侈税考虑在内），除以（截至目前）他们所赢球的场次，然后得出各支球队的赢球单价。当然，他还考虑了各支球队的进攻效率和防守效率，并将其糅合到了统计的公式中去。这种统计方法很直观，虽然不算太复杂，但很具科学性。ESPN等多家权威体育网站，也经常使用这种评比方法。
评比的结果显示，热火是全联盟赢球单价最少的球队。他们本赛季的薪水总额是6536万美元，考虑了他们的进攻效率和防守效率后，博瑞得出结论，迈阿密人平均每场胜利需要花费96.2万美元的代价。如此类推，马刺排在第2，为103.9万美元，公牛位列第3，赢球代价为110.4万美元。
结果显示，将奢侈税考虑在内，全联盟本赛季平均每场胜利所需要的经济代价，为171万美元。由此可见，热火的赢球代价远远超过联盟的平均水平。
从榜单可以看出，火箭本赛季的赢球单价为181.4万美元，高出了联盟的平均数值，排在NBA的第16位。值得一提的是，姚明因为受伤无法出战，这在很大程度上拖累了球队。姚明本赛季的薪水高达1768万美元，占火箭薪水总额的23.7%。可以想象，如果将姚明的薪水部分剔除，那火箭在榜单上的排名将直线上升。
卫冕冠军湖人的表现也很一般，他们比火箭略胜一筹，排在第15位。湖人本赛季的薪水总额为9156万美元，加上奢侈税，他们的成本高达1.12亿，为全联盟最高。但他们目前只赢了21场，输掉了7场，场均的赢球成本为177万美元，也高出了联盟的平均值。
此外，奇才是全联盟赢球成本最高的球队，他们的场均赢球代价为312万美元，骑士场均303万美元排名倒数第2，他们是仅有的单场赢球成本超过300万美元的球队。
本赛季一共有7支球队需要缴纳奢侈税，分别是湖人、魔术、小牛、凯尔特人、掘金、爵士和火箭。其中，魔术是这7支球队中赢球代价最大的球队，他们的单场赢球成本高达210万美元，排在倒数第7位。正因如此，他们在前天进行了两笔惊天交易，对阵容进行大幅重组。
博瑞在文章中专门表扬了热火。热火今年夏天孤注一掷，引进了詹姆斯和波什，和韦德组成了三巨头，但他们却很好的控制了薪水总额，使球队无需缴纳奢侈税。与此同时，为三巨头配备了还算不错的援手。尽管热火开局不佳，但他们低开高走，目前的战绩为21胜9负，排在东区的第2位。博瑞认为，热火能排在榜单的第1位，着实令包括他在内的很多人感到意外。

description.hltext_display: Jahresbilanz 2010: Diese Fonds machten Anleger reich
description.content:
Anleger, die ihr Geld in Aktienfonds steckten, konnten 2010 beachtliche Renditen einfahren. Die ertragreichsten Produkte stiegen um mehr als 50 Prozent im Wert. Vor allem Fonds aus Schwellenländern überzeugten. Am besten schnitten aber Rohstoff-Produkte ab.

Insgesamt hat das Fondsmanagement, das mit einem qualitativen Ansatz vor allem in potenzielle Wachstumswerte investiert, mehr als 40 Prozent des Fondsvolumens von 113 Millionen Euro in Technologiewerte gesteckt. 4,7 Billionen Euro haben die Deutschen an Geldvermögen. Gut ein Viertel davon liegt in den Händen von Vermögensverwaltern. Ihre Dienste lassen sich die Finanzexperten gut bezahlen. Doch welche Verwalter sind ihr Geld wert? Das Mag...
Jährlich investieren deutsche Anleger Milliarden in geschlossene Fonds, die oft mit hohen Risiken verbunden sind. Auch Betrüger tummeln sich am grauen Kapitalmarkt.

description.hltext_display: Runcorn & Widnes Local News: Runcorn man in critical condition after nightclub incident
description.content:
by Laurie Stocks-Moore, Runcorn and Widnes Weekly News
A RUNCORN man is fighting for life after an incident at a nightclub.
Stuart James Pointon, 22, of Runcorn, remains in a critical but stable condition at Walton Neurological Centre in Liverpool after allegedly being punched to the floor.
For the full story, see this week’s Weekly News.

description.hltext_display: Police: Four-vehicle Dover crash may be due to distraction Icy roads cause other crashes throughout region
description.content:
John Huff/Staff photographer Police said a multicar accident at the Dover tolls on the Spaulding Turnpike's southbound side may have been caused by driver distraction.
DOVER — Area police responded to several accidents Tuesday morning, attributing most to slippery road conditions.
A distracted driver caused the most serious crash, a four-car pileup during the morning commute.
Around 8:45 a.m., state troopers were dispatched to a multivehicle accident with minor injuries on the Spaulding Turnpike southbound near Exit 6 outside Dover.
The accident occurred when a 2004 Chevrolet van, driven by East Wakefield resident David Anderson, 46, collided with a 2008 Honda Odyssey, driven by Dover resident Nancy Weik, 40, which was slowing down due to heavy traffic flow, police said.
Weik's vehicle then collided with a 2001 Subaru Impresa, driven by Danis Chamberlain, 38, of Berwick, Maine. Chamberlain had reduced the speed of his vehicle before the collision, but then collided with a 2005 Chevrolet pickup driven by Philip Morrill, 60, of Wolfeboro. Morrill's vehicle was stopped at the time of the collision, police said.
One driver involved in the collision was examined at the scene by medical personnel and refused further treatment. No one was severely hurt and traffic was not drastically affected, according to police.
A preliminary investigation reveals the accident occurred because Anderson was distracted, and the crash remains under investigation by State Police Troop A.
Icy roads Tuesday morning caused several cars in other areas to swerve off the road. While no one was seriously harmed, police say it was a reminder that winter is here and driving conditions have changed.
Route 11 in Farmington saw two accidents before 7:30 a.m. Farmington Police Lt. Kevin Willey said icy conditions were factors in both accidents.
At 7:15 a.m., Joni Van Gelder, 55, of Middleton, was traveling east in her 2003 Jeep Liberty when, just west of Cardinal's Gifts from the Heart, her vehicle rolled off the road into a grassy area and landed on the driver's side.
Willey said Farmington EMS took Van Gelder, who had minor injuries, to Frisbie Memorial Hospital. She was released from the emergency department at 10:03 a.m., according to hospital spokeswoman Michelle Landry.
Earlier at 6:05 a.m., John Babcock, 56, of New Durham, was driving his 2002 Toyota Tundra Pickup east toward Rochester when Willey said he slid off the road between the Holy Rosary Credit Union and Family Care of Farmington.
The vehicle sustained moderate damage, Willey said, and was towed away.
Babcock was evaluated by the Farmington EMS and did not have to be taken to a hospital.
"Winter is here regardless of how much snow is on the ground," Willey said. "The road conditions are going to change quickly. People need to slow down and use caution ... I can't say either accidents could have been prevented, but when people reduce their speed, it reduces their involvement in accidents."
Rochester also saw early morning accidents because of icy road conditions — three before 8 a.m.
At 6:44 a.m., a car swerved off the road on Lowell Street by Old Dover Road. The vehicle struck a utility pole, but the driver was not injured.
Fire Lt. Bruce Barker said there was "quite severe damage" to the man's car, and the pole would need to be replaced.
At 7:27 a.m., a medium-sized pickup truck spun out and hit a guard rail. The driver appeared to be fine, Fire Capt. Mark Avery said, but EMS crews took the man to Frisbie "just to be safe."
Almost an hour after the first crash, a car slid on ice and hit a boulder on the side of the road around 7:48 a.m. The accident took place on Estes Road by Howard Brook Drive. The driver was unhurt, but her car received minor damage.
"They were all just, I think, not used to the conditions and misjudged the roads," Barker said of the drivers involved in the accidents.
Barker added it appeared the cause of the accidents was snow becoming packed down on untreated roads and turning to ice in spots. He said early in the morning the main roads were treated, but some sides ones had yet to be.
By Tuesday afternoon, Police Sgt. Stephen Burke confirmed that all roads were now treated.
"The roads are really good now," he said. "We're in good shape."
Mia Lyons, a dispatch supervisor for Wolfeboro, said the town only had one minor accident, before 8 a.m., when a car swerved off the road, but there were no injuries.
She advised drivers to use caution in the winter and to "drive for the road conditions."

description.hltext_display: 价格为王 3000元以下超值智能手机推荐
description.content:
订东北网彩信手机报，移动发TX到10628007，联通发DBWY到1065566600，电信发DBWY到10628999。东北网手机版 3g.dbw.cn
很多朋友选购手机的时候，都会将目光投向3000元以下的手机，这是因为3000元以下的机型比较有性价比，而且如果手机的价格高出了3000元的话，那么就会触动很多消费者的价格底线，并不是很多朋友都能忍受3000元买一个手的。
今天为大家推荐几款近期性价比超高的智能手机，都是普通人们能买的起的机型，喜欢的朋友不妨关注一下。
推荐产品：索尼爱立信X10
动力报价：2899元
索尼爱立信X10采用了主流的直板触屏设计，拥有一块4.0英寸的AMOLED材质屏幕，分辨率为480×854像素，显示效果非常不错。该机采用了 810万像素摄像头，支持自动对焦，16倍数码变焦同时还可以点触对焦，具有面部识别、笑脸快门和防抖功能，拍摄效果异常强大。该机采用了 android1.6系统，配置了高通QSD8250主频为1GHz的处理器，可以流畅无比得运行各种扩展软件。
其次在网络方面手机还支持WCDMA/HSDPA/HSUPA网络，并且也可借助WLAN无线局域网功能连接上网。而除了支持蓝牙V2.1技术，电子邮件收发、Android应用程序下载以及全面的Google应用等功能之外，该款手机还拥有3.5毫米耳机接口，内置GPS导航功能和支持A-GPS，可实现定位导航与 LBS 位置服务等功能。
而功能上，采用着Android1.6系统的索尼爱立信X10，同时还配备了一枚810W像素摄像头，并且支持专业相机才拥有的微笑拍摄和手机中常见的防抖功能。除此之外，该机还加入了主流的WIFI、GPS功能，表现相当全面。
编辑点评：Android系统状态如日中天，粉丝众多，但最让人感觉欠缺的一点就是Android的娱乐多媒体功能偏弱。而索尼爱立信 X10在硬件配置方面足够强悍，而索尼爱立信的特色UI很好的依靠强大的性能表现出优秀的多媒体娱乐体验，预算比较宽裕的朋友不妨考虑一下。

description.hltext_display: 7名中国主裁获FIFA国际级资格 张雷入精英名单
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：北京时间今天，据《体坛周报》报道，日前，中国足协已经受到了关于国际足联(FIFA)国际级裁判申报的批复。中国共有16名男子裁判被批准为国际级裁判，其中7人为主裁判。
据悉，被中国足协批复的7名主裁判为别为：王哲(32岁)、马宁(29岁)、张雷(27岁)、范琦(39岁)、赵亮(37岁)和谭海(40岁)。
去年，国际足联也曾经批准数名中国籍裁判成为国际级裁判。此后，黄俊杰因反赌扫黑落网，孙葆洁则已经到了国际级裁判年龄的上限(45岁)。虽然万大雪和陶然成在资格上没有问题，但是由于两人在足球界中有些争议，因此足协计划将两人像裁判监督方面培养。
此次入选的7名国际级主裁判中，王迪和张雷还入选了国际足联的精英裁判名单，有资格代表中国吹罚国际比赛。两人也将是中国足协未来的重点培养对象。
女裁判中，4名国际女主裁和4名女助理裁判获得国际足联批准，四名主裁判分别是林世琴、秦亮、王佳和顾盈，其中林世琴有望进入“精英裁判名单”。

description.hltext_display: 让“圣旦”飞 圣宝便携音响陪你疯狂一冬
description.author: CBSi中国・ZOL
description.content: 姜文导演的《让子弹飞》让举国上下正在经受寒冬的各位看客们是热血沸腾，电影院也几乎变成了“热情的沙漠”，葛六亿、周润发、姜文，三大纯爷们齐齐献映让即将“冒火”的贺岁档电影市场着实疯狂了一把，于是期待近在眼前，双节开始变得令人“鸡冻”。只是让小编激动的是，双节各类型电影大放异彩、各显神通，让我们这一干人大饱眼福之外，送礼物或者收礼物恐怕是令我们最合不拢嘴了吧！在这两个时尚又温馨，浪漫又传统的节日里，小编就给大家推荐几款性价比极高的圣宝数码便携音响吧，保证你在这双节里乐得能飞起来。，史上最全能音响。拥有黑、蓝、绿、桔四种搭配，箱体外壳采用了高光注塑材料，防腐蚀不掉色。加上独一无二的时尚仿皮革手柄，整体手感都非常到位， 舒适便携。前面板配备了一个具有炫蓝背光效果的液晶显示屏，像一颗会说话的眼睛，不仅提供了多国语言菜单，而且能支持LRC歌词显示。不仅如此，液晶显示屏也具备了万年历、时钟、闹钟、定时开关机、复读等多种功能集于一身，可以满足不同用户的使用需求。传统的整体设计、强大的整体性能、完美的音质、无可挑剔的性价比赢得了消费者的一致赞誉。元旦节，送给我们的爷爷奶奶们，吼吼，让他们在公园里晨练一定很美吧！

description.hltext_display: 卑怯な夫に報復したいのですが - 元ご主人様，素晴らしい
description.content:
2010年12月21日 15:03
夫に裁判離婚されましたが、未だにやり方に納得がいきません。
だいぶ前から夫とは別れて暮したいと思ってそれなりの準備を進め、後は夫の定年退職を待ち、なるべく波風立たないようにしていましたが、4年前に夫から突然に離婚を言い出されました。
調停にかけられましたが、私の反対で不調におわり、結局は裁判に進みました。
ところが、初めは性格の不一致や浮気の疑い（メールの更新記録で）を離婚理由にしていた夫側が、裁判の時点で急に私の不貞の証拠を出して攻撃してきたので、最終的には離婚の判決が出てしまいました。
確かに、離婚の話の出る数年前から心を寄せていた男性と会っていましたが、体の関係はありませんでした。
ところが、夫は調査を詳細に入れて、車の中でのキスなどを証拠写真、日帰りの小旅行の電車内の写真、料理屋への出入り写真などを付き合っている期間にわたって詳細に確保していました。
私の方としては、不貞はしていないと反論しましたが、相手の弁護士の戦略に負けてしまいました。今でも判決には納得できませんが、私の弁護士さんのアドバイスもあって上告しませんでした。
その結果、退職金は資産分与の対象から外れ、預金や不動産の分与も3割程度になりました。年金の分与割合も低いものでした。
裁判になり相手の奥さんにも知られ、相当な慰謝料を払わされましたし、夫も容赦なく慰謝料を取りました。
のんびりして鈍感な夫の性格から考えられない仕打ちですが、男性でも妻の心変わりは気づくものでしょうか。
それにしても悔しくて仕方ありません。相手の男性は妻に許してもらい、去って行きました。
子供いなくてもう楽しみもありません。ただただ、夫に仕返しをしたくてたまりません。私はどうなっても構いませんので、何とかする手立てはないでしょうか。
よろしくお願いします。

description.hltext_display: Som taká hlava dubová, na všetko musím prísť sám, vraví Pavel Bosák
description.content:
v tejto sekcii v celom SME
diskutujteVYTLAČIŤ UPOZORNITE NA CHYBU Pošlite: E-MAILOM na facebook VYBRALI.SME | ďalšie Zlý chlapec slovenských basketbalových paluboviek zatiaľ v drese Nitry vcelku seká dobrotu a zviditeľňuje sa hlavne svojou hrou. Pavel Bosák sa ako otec dvoch synov upokojil, zatiaľ má iba jednu technickú chybu. Zhovárali sme sa na rôzne témy, nevynímajúc tie vianočné.
Ak sa nemýlime, s basketbalom ste začali ako 12-ročný, hrali ste v Plzni, Prahe alebo Prostějove. Ako ste sa dostali na Slovensko?
Vlastne som začal ešte neskôr, možno keď som mal 13 alebo 14 rokov a dodnes sa mi ľudia čudujú, že prečo tak neskoro. Predtým som pretekal v cyklokrose, basketbalu som prišiel na chuť až neskôr a nikdy som mu nevenoval špeciálnu pozornosť, že by som hral profesionálne alebo za peniaze. Prišlo to tak, ako to malo, začalo sa mi to páčiť. Až potom som hodil všetko za hlavu a bol iba basket a basket. Mama bol nešťastná, že som nechodieval na obed domov, ale ja som bol v kuse s chalanmi na ihrisku. Mal som kamaráta, ktorý hral extraligu v Plzni a spýtal sa ma, či by som nešiel hrať tam. Práve som sa rozhodoval, kam po základnej škole, a tak som išiel do Plzne. Odtiaľ ma do Prahy vytiahol Miroslav Marko, za čo som mu nesmierne vďačný. Tam som hrával päť rokov, potom sa stali nejaké blbosti, ktoré nebudem komentovať, a sezónu som dohral v Poděbradoch. Zhodou okolností v tej dobe trénoval Prostějov zase pán Marko, ktorý vedel, že basketbal milujem. Tak mi povedal, nech makám a nerobím somariny, že v ďalšej sezóne pôjdem na skúšku do Prostějova, ktorý je jeden z top tímov. Sám som tomu neveril. Nakoniec ma naozaj zavolal, s tým, že ma berie ako náhradníka, ale behom troch mesiacov som sa dostal do základu. Potom ale prišiel nový tréner, ktorý ma od začiatku, neviem prečo, nemal rád. Tak som v Prostějove skončil. Neskôr prišla ponuka z Prievidze, ktorú mi dohodol opäť Miroslav Marko a bol som na Slovensku.
Viackrát ste sa vyjadrili, že v Prievidzi sa vám pozdáva. Z Talianska ste však prišli do Nitry. Čo sa stalo?
V Prievidzi sa nám darilo. Po dvanástich rokoch sme získali medailu, skončili sme tretí. Veľa sa toho po úspechoch nahovorilo, v klube boli veľké plány do ďalšieho ročníka. Po dvoch mesiacoch mi prestali platiť, dostával som iba polovičný plat. Po nejakom čase z toho bola už poriadna suma. Tak som odišiel do Talianska, kde bolo super, žiaľ, vypadli sme zo súťaže. Takže som sa napoly dohodol s Prievidzou, ale nakoniec to nedodržali. Týždeň predtým mi volal pán Polák, aby som mu dal vedieť, či som podpísal alebo nie. Tak som mu teda zavolal a dohodli sme sa, že pôjdem do Nitry.
Týždeň pred začiatkom súťaže ste však odišli do Talianska, ale nakoniec ste sa do Nitry vrátili. Ako to bolo?
Športový život je krátky a ja by som chcel ešte niečo dokázať. Lega Due je naozaj kvalitná a je tam krásne prostredie, haly. Basketbal je tam sviatok. Hrá sa tam hlavne v nedeľu a vtedy to žije. Určite však z toho tréner Urban s Polákom nemali radosť. Ale nakoniec to nevyšlo, pretože agent mi povedal, že je to skúška na mesiac, že keď sa im budem páčiť, môžem podpísať do konca sezóny. Bol to však iba záskok na mesiac, takže to nevyšlo.
Ako ste tu spokojný? Ako si zvykla rodina?
Všetko je v poriadku. Akurát ma trochu hnevajú zranenia. Proti Handlovej som si zranil koleno, mal som opar na tvári a problémy s ramenom. Hlavne som však rád, že keď sa pozriem na tabuľku, vidím, že sme prví alebo druhí, aj keď do play-off je ešte dosť kôl. Zatiaľ mám z toho dobrý pocit, sú tu super chalani.
Ste známy svojím emocionálnym prístupom k hre, často diskutujete s rozhodcami. Je to stále rovnako intenzívne, alebo si myslíte, že ste sa v Nitre upokojili?
Už to ani zďaleka nie je také, ako to bývalo. Určite som sa už upokojil, pretože už mám dve deti a prišiel som na to. Ja som taká hlava dubová, že na všetko musím prísť sám. Aj na to, že si ubližujem. Stále však niečo budem komentovať, veľakrát to nevydržím, ale určite to je už lepšie.
Čo na to tréner?
Prízvukuje celému mužstvu, že nechce, aby sme s rozhodcami debatovali. Určite sa mu to nepáči, ale v zápale boja jednoducho musím niečo povedať. Ako som už povedal, za trinásť zápasov mám jednu technickú chybu, takže je to dobré, ale musím sa krotiť.
Ako vidíte perspektívy tímu prakticky po polovici súťaže, aké sú ambície?
Jediné kluby, ktoré ma zaujímajú, sú Pezinok a Spišská. Iné celky nás ohroziť nemôžu. Keď sa dobre vyspíme a v šatni si s chalanmi všetko rozdiskutujeme, Pezinok zdolať dokážeme. Ale zo Spišskej Novej Vsi mám rešpekt, pretože má kvalitných hráčov, ktorí hrajú ako tím. Všetci ale chceme finále a titul. To by bola paráda.
Vianoce sú za dverami, čo pre vás znamenajú?
Vidím sám na sebe, že starnutie sa nedá zastaviť. Viac to prežívam, najmä teraz, keď mám dve deti. Snažím sa im viac venovať a ukázať im pravú tvár Vianoc. S bratom máme super rodičov, určite to s nami tiež robili. Na Vianoce sa veľmi teším.
Kde strávite Vianoce?
Dúfam, že sa dostanem za rodičmi do Ašu. Záleží od toho, koľko dostaneme voľna. Určite však chcem ísť do Čiech, aj kvôli partnerke a deťom.
Ako u vás prebieha Štedrý deň?
Myslím si, že Vianoce sú také, aké si ich sami urobíte. Takže chceme ísť čo najrýchlejšie do Ašu, tam sa stretneme celá rodina, deti, rodičia, príde priateľkin otec. Dáme si pivko a bude pohoda. Klasický vianočný stromček s kopou darčekov pre deti, ja nepotrebujem nič. Budeme mať rybaciu polievku, kapra a zemiakový šalát. Raz za rok jednoducho ten kapor musí byť.
Detstvo ste strávili v Aši? Aké ste boli dieťa?
Do 15 rokov som býval v Aši. Potom som šiel na učňovku do Plzne. V detstve som bol taký, aký som teraz hráč. Nebol som žiaden anjelik. Mám brata dvojča, úplne rovnakého ako ja. Sme Peter a Pavel a poriadne sme sa vybláznili (smiech). Ale mali sme neskutočné detstvo vďaka rodičom.
Prehľadávali ste pred Vianocami skrine a hľadali ste, kde rodičia ukryli darčeky?
Niekoľkokrát sa to stalo. Máme síce veľký dom, ale stalo sa, že darčeky pred nami neskryli. Boli sme aktívne deti, to máme po otcovi. Ale väčšinou to bolo tak, že pri večeri mama odbehla, zazvonila zvončekom a potom sme išli rozbaľovať darčeky.
Kupujete darčeky v poslednej chvíli alebo máte všetko dopredu zaobstarané?
Ešte nemám nič kúpené. Ale na poslednú chvíľu to určite nechcem nechávať, pretože je to blbosť. Nenávidím, ešte teraz s dvomi deťmi a s priateľkou sme na to sami, chodiť do týchto preplnených obchoďákov. A čo to bude tesne pred Vianocami, nechcem ani pomyslieť. A to je všade na svete rovnaké. Deťom sa to páči, ale ja nakupovanie neznášam. Aj v potravinách som nervózny po piatich minútach.
Pamätáte si vy na nejaké výnimočné Vianoce, možno keď ste boli dieťa?
Až do svojich 26 rokov som každé Vianoce strávil doma s rodičmi, dvakrát bola so mnou aj priateľka. Posledné sviatky sme však strávili sami spolu v Prahe a veľmi sa mi to páčilo. To boli prvé Vianoce bez rodičov. Mali sme svoj byt, priateľka prvý raz uvarila štedrovečerné jedlo, Kevin bol ešte malinký. Na to asi nezabudnem. Ale inak by som povedal, že Vianoce, ktoré som prežil, boli stále rovnako dobré.
Chodíte do kostola? V čo veríte?
Čomu môžeš veriť v tomto zlom svete? Ak niekto verí, nech si verí. Ja sa mu ale divím, že čomu. Kretén v Bratislave vybehne na sídlisko a začne strieľať po ľuďoch. Tomu nerozumiem a stáva sa to pomaly každý deň všade na svete. Alebo 13-ročný chlapec ubodá svoju sestru, pritom chodí do kostola. Ja naozaj neviem, čomu takíto ľudia veria, načo sa chodia modliť.
Plánujete sa s priateľkou aj zosobášiť?
Určite áno. Mám skvelé dievča, ktorá ma má veľmi rada aj po piatich rokoch a máme dvoch krásnych synov. Nesmierne si to vážim. Obaja to plánujeme, ale zatiaľ nevieme kedy. Možno toto leto, možno neskôr.
Na klubovej stránke máte okrem Rytmusa ako obľúbenú osobnosť Michaela Jordana. Prečo? Skôr by sa k vám hodil Dennis Rodman.
Rytmus je kráľ, toho počúvam stále. Nech hovorí, kto chce, čo chce, pre mňa je dobrý. Trafil tú správnu dobu a zarába na tom. Trochu mu to aj závidím. Ale nie som žiaden Dennis Rodman. Ten iba poskakoval a rozhadzoval rukami. Ja chcem byť a dúfam, že budem, strelec, dávať koše. A aj Jordan mal svoje chvíľky, že vyprskol. Akurát NBA sa hrá v takom tempe, že o niekoľko zápasov sa na to zabudlo. Podľa mňa je to najlepší športovec všetkých čias. Pre niekoho Mu- hammad Ali, Mario Lemieux, pre mňa Michael Jordan.
Koľko máte tetovaní? Plánujete zbierku rozšíriť?
Asi pred piatimi rokmi sme si spolu s bratom nechali na ruku vytetovať keltský uzol, čo znamená narodenie, život a smrť. Ten, čo nám to robil, sa nás pýtal, či nechceme pokračovať. My, že nie, to stačí. On na to: „Chalani, to je ako choroba, to bude pokračovať.“ Mal pravdu, takže teraz mám päť tetovaní, ale do ďalších sa mi už veľmi ísť nechce, pretože to aj bolí.
Čo prajete fanúšikom pod stromček, do nového roka?
Fanúšikovia v Nitre sú na úrovni. Pozdáva sa mi to tu, hráme o najvyššie miesta v tabuľke, mne sa tiež celkom darí. Takže nech fanúšikovia chodia, ako chodili doteraz.
PAVEL BOSÁK
* narodený 27. 4. 1982 v Aši
* doterajšie kluby: Plzeň, USK Praha, Prostějov, Poděbrady, Prievidza, Latina, Nitra
* reprezentoval ČR v kategórii do 20 rokov
* najväčšie úspechy: 3. miesto v českej lige s Prostějovom, 3. miesto v slovenskej lige s Prievidzou
* má priateľku Veroniku z Prahy, deti Kevin (2,5 r.), Samuel (5 mesiacov)
Pavel Bosák je na palubovke impulzívny „srdciar“, v súkromí starostlivý otec dvoch synov.

description.hltext_display: Fiberweb Launches New Website to Showcase Defencell Force Protection Systems
description.content:
Web 2.0-based DefencellUSA.com highlights how this high performance, 100% fabric ballistic and blast barrier can help improve logistics and safety for all US military branches.
Old Hickory, TN (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
Fiberweb, Inc.'s new website, http://www.DefencellUSA.com, showcases Defencell Force Protection Systems, a lightweight ballistic and blast barrier solution that offers weight and space savings over existing protective barriers. Created exclusively for US military personnel, DefencellUSA.com provides performance data that highlights how the Defencell system can effectively reduce the number of containers necessary to transport and construct ballistics fortifications in both combat and training.
This lightweight, 100% fabric system features a self-stabilizing honeycomb design that eliminates the need for heavy metal wires or hard plastic that can take up space during delivery. The new website provides an interactive catalog and product comparisons that demonstrate how these weight savings can translate to safer delivery capabilities and reduced risk of secondary fragmentation.
“Unlike traditional wire gabion baskets, the Defencell Force Protection System is compact, lightweight and durable, providing a smaller logistical footprint,” said Kim Tully, Defencell Field Engineer. “The website provides comprehensive resources that clearly outline the delivery benefits of the Defencell system. Whether air-dropping, sling loading, driving over rough terrain or hand carrying, the system is ideally suited for mission critical deliveries to every corner of the battlefield.”
Site visitors can view detailed product information, videos, product applications, and technical specifications. The site also allows commanders and field engineers to download detailed CAD models and installation guides, view side-by-side barrier system comparisons and performance data, order product samples and schedule on-site product demonstrations.
Made in the USA and extensively field tested worldwide, the Defencell Force Protection System is available in four interlocking units that provide effective ballistic, blast, and crash protection. Defencell units meet the testing requirements set forth by the Army Research Laboratory (ARL) as determined by the Engineer Research and Development Center US Army Corps of Engineers (ERDC).
For more information on Defencell Force Protection Systems or to request detailed product test results, visit http://www.DefencellUSA.com.
About Fiberweb
Fiberweb, Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of Fiberweb plc, is one of the world's largest and leading suppliers of high performance, specialty nonwoven fabrics. With its vast experience in nonwoven geotextiles, Fiberweb has long been regarded as a technological innovator with a strong portfolio of intellectual property, a preferred partner for customers focused on high-quality and reliable supply, and a consistent investor in a global network of competitive manufacturing assets. With revenues approaching $1 billion and over 1,800 employees worldwide, the company has a strong global position with major operations in North America, Europe and Asia.
Defencell is a trademark of Terram Ltd. An affiliate of Fiberweb, Inc., and J&S Franklin Ltd. ###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4918404.htm
