description.hltext_display: 不莱梅最佳射手续约谈崩 阿尔梅达遭炮轰将离队
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：德甲上半程比赛已结束，上赛季季军不莱梅17轮后排在第14位，仅比降级区多出4分。更糟糕的是冬歇期不莱梅也面临着人员流失问题，经理阿洛夫斯证实队内头号射手阿尔梅达续约谈判破裂，葡萄牙人很可能被甩卖。
阿尔梅达上半赛季联赛共为不莱梅攻入9球，是队内最佳射手。不过他的合同还有6个月就将到期，而续约谈判没能达成一致。周二不莱梅总经理阿洛夫斯证实道：“距离太大了，他想要的是在我们这里不可能得到的薪水。”同时，阿洛夫斯透露已收到了转会报价：“他们关注他很久了，报价摆在桌子上，接下来我们就会处理这一问题。”
阿尔梅达自今夏起就不断传出转会传闻，甚至一度传出他将加盟皇马的消息。而据《踢球者》的报道，土超劲旅贝西克塔斯对阿尔梅达很有兴趣，他们目前已落后联赛领头羊特拉布宗体育队14分之多，急需在冬季加强阵容。一旦阿尔梅达离队，那么秘鲁老将皮萨罗以及两位小将阿瑙托维奇和瓦格纳将挑起为球队摧城拔寨的重任，而换回的转会费很可能用于改造后防。
本赛季阿尔梅达还在与圣保利的联赛中因恶意报复，吃到红牌被停赛三场，一度导致了球队锋线无人可用。对此，阿洛夫斯也是非常生气，他说：“我们付他工资，但他却不能够帮助我们，三场重要比赛他都无法出场。我无法专门安排个日程去告诉他这是个愚蠢的行为，但我现在仍然感到很恼怒，我想主教练甚至会更气愤。”
此外，阿尔梅达2006/07赛季起就开始为不莱梅消息，算起来本赛季已是他来到德国的第5个赛季，然而这位葡萄牙国脚至今不会说德语，如此态度同样让不莱梅方面感到恼火。阿洛夫斯就抨击道：“阿尔梅达来这很长时间了，然而他还不能说德语，他对我们完全没有认同感，，并且说：‘学德语？事实上我想要离开，没有必要这样。’”而今年冬天，阿尔梅达很可能就将彻底告别不莱梅。

description.hltext_display: Ask 411 Wrestling 12.22.10: Rebooking Wrestlemania, Coughing Fits & Ass Turkey!
description.author: Mathew Sforcina
description.content: This is Ask 411 Wrestling. And the first rule of Ask 411 Wrestling is to tell as many people as you can about it, it's a fun little column, and the more people we can get reading it, the better! The second rule of Ask 411 Wrestling is repetitive. This week, due to the season and my day job and a few other boring facts that you don't care about, I'm getting into the spirit and giving! Specifically, giving my opinion, as this is an opinion-focused week. Some fact questions may or may not slip in, but for the most part, we're all about what I think. So there. Did I do well predicting TLC? Find out by going and listening to the podcast. Now, let's see, is the Banner still awesome? Yep. 411 on Twitter! http://www.twitter.com/411mania http://www.twitter.com/411wrestling http://www.twitter.com/411moviestv http://www.twitter.com/411music http://www.twitter.com/411games http://www.twitter.com/411mma Backtalking Submission Based Main Eventers: … Well don't I look silly? But then I'm used to that. So, to add to the list of Flair, Bret, Ted and maybe Malenko, you can add Sgt Slaughter (when he did change out of the Cobra Clutch, he still used a Submission hold), Iron Sheik, Roddy Piper and guys like Bruno, Fritz Von Erich, Killer Kowalski and so on. There were a bunch of guys who would qualify, if you give them ‘main event status', which I'm hesitant to do with regional superstars and/or WWF midcard acts. Guys like Sting, Owen and so forth don't count since at some point they used a non-submission move, the Scorpion Death Drop, The moonsault etc. If you want to construe the question as being "only used a submission WHILE in the main event", go ahead, but I didn't read it like that. Hart V Hogan: Things get filmed, shot and made up all the time but never used in Wrestling. The photo of them playing tug o war doesn't prove the match was planned, and Hart himself in the book says that he was played with by Vince on the subject. Confusing The Ruskies: OK, so I skimmed slightly and got the wrong Russian there. But the point still stands, at the time, the AWA couldn't trust anyone not to bail who wasn't tied there by blood or marriage. X-Mas: Last week, with my "doing…something" comment, I meant the column. I toyed with a few ideas but eventually decided to stick with the usual thing I do when I don't really have time for a column, do an Op-focused one. Xmas itself I have covered with the family and then a Jonathon Creek marathon since my present to myself was the box set. Xmas as it's currently celebrated, with everyone worshiping the almighty dollar I'm fine with. Your Turn, Smart Guy… Who am I? I worked for my most famous employers for 15 years, during which I held one singles title several times and a set of tag titles three times (although I did have an unrecognized reign as a more prestigious champion with the company, thanks to a foot on the ropes and then a rematch later on). A guy discussed earlier on in this column had his PPV debut against me. I've suffered several injuries in my career, many in the ring, two of them at the hands of main eventers in TNA and UFC. My last televised match for my long term employees saw me lose a title, I am who? Devil Child (who apparently didn't get the memo, in that I don't answer questions in the Comments section, only by mail. That said, the answer is WMXII, since I HATE the Iron Man match) laid it out for us. You are Bob Holly. You've wrestled with the WWF, later WWE, from 1994 to 2009. You've had six Hardcore Championships, three Tag Championships in the WWE, and won the Intercontinental Championship, although due to Jeff Jarret having his foot under the ropes, the IC title was vacated. Your shoulder was injured by Kurt Angle and your neck was broken by Brock Lesnar. Your last appearance with the WWE involved you losing the tag title when Cody Rhodes betrayed you. Who am I? I was once managed by Jim Cornette, Ted Dibaise and Jimmy Hart (not at the same time, obviously). I was part of two important stables, getting kicked out of both (although one time was just a ruse). I helped McMahon pin Austin, and the McMahon boys screw over Austin. I've been pinned in under 10 seconds, and been a dual champion. I've passed on and my last match in WWE saw me job to Tommy Dreamer. I am who? Questions, Questions, Who's Got The Questions?/My Damm Opinion So, if you don't like my opinion, or my reasoning, this is not your week, I'll see you all next week. But if you do stick around, we have some controversy straight up, thanks to Richard. Hey, I'm still a weekly reader and I have to ask about Paul Heyman. Where did the notion that he was a "creative genius" come from? If you look at his history with the company, he only ever truly put over 2 people - Rhino and RVD. Take the RVD/Lynn feud for example - RVD goes over Lynn every time, the only time Lynn gets a win is through 3 finishers, and interference from both Scotty Anton and Rhino. How is that putting over Lynn? Another example - Kid Kash winning the TV Title. How did Kash win the title? Because RVD interfered. Then, when RVD was out of the picture, they had Rhino steamroll over Kash. That hardly makes Kash look good. RVD was bigger than the company, by a long shot, but never even came close to being considered as a world champion. Heyman would push on commentary that "the biggest injustice in wrestling was that RVD was never world champion". There's a reason for that - Heyman never gave him the shot. Instead he had subpar wrestlers like Justin Credible and The Sandman as the #1 guy in the company, neither of which could wrestle for **** and, in the case of Justin, wasn't over. Look at the 3 tag teams he would push - The FBI(A fully gimmick oriented team), The Dudleyz(who also couldn't wrestle) and RVD and Sabu(one of which is one of the worst wrestlers ever. I'm sorry, but Heyman is far from a creative genius, so how did he get the moniker of one? OK, obviously some people agree with you, many people do think Heyman is vastly overrated, and has helped to cause a lot of problems in Wrestling. Jim Cornette, for instance. Still, I think you are selling ECW somewhat short, in that you're ignoring the first few years, back when it was really good. The Raven/Dreamer War, the Raven/Sandman feud, the Man in The Box angle, Austin and Foley's work… Heyman gets the credit for a lot of stuff that he technically didn't do, but had a hand in. A good percentage of the IWC thinks that Heyman lets good talent do it's thing, he let guys like Austin and Foley talk, he uses talent well. The Smackdown Six run, for instance, sure, telling those 6 guys to go out there and put on good matches is something of a no-brainer, and yet a lot of guys wouldn't do it. Heyman is great at taking a guy and focusing on the positives, hiding the negatives. He's a horrible businessman, sure, but he can, supposedly, write a good storyline. He repeated himself somewhat, but he could use talent damm well. Taking your examples in turn though… RVD V Lynn: He was copying the Raven/Dreamer thing in a way, in that the two had superb matches, and he had one guy just unable to find the way to get the win. Injuries ruined it, but Lynn did get over thanks to those matches, that's the argument. RVD not being Champ: That one's easy to explain, and it falls back onto last week and the AWA, in that Heyman knew/suspected that if he did put the belt on RVD, the second that happened, WWF and/or WCW would pull up and offer truckloads of cash to take him away. By keeping him on the side, where he drew just as well as if he had the title, he was able to protect himself somewhat. Sandman and Credible being Champ: Sandman was over as hell in ECW, and Credible would not be leaving. He knew Justin would stick around, so he could safely put the belt on him without fear of him being signed away. Tag Team Division: I'm not about to defend him on that front, save for saying that the Impact Players was the best possible use for Credible. Overall though, the reason Heyman is seen as a creative genius comes down to two simple concepts: Kool-Aid and Fanservice. All the wrestlers and insiders who sing Heyman's praises tend to be guys who have worked for him and got a break, or got to reinvent themselves under his watch. So they are more likely to think he's a genius since he listened to them and took what they said under advisement and wrote them well. Plus, as a rule, the fans who like Heyman and call him a genius tend to be the fans that like the sort of wrestling Heyman gives them. There is a chicken and the egg issue there in that did they want the wrestling style first or did they learn to like it from him, but when you give a segment of the fanbase what they want, they tend to like you. But it's all subjective, for every wrestler and fan who loves Heyman, another hates his guts. But that's why he has the reputation, it seems to me. Jorge wants some more. Love the column. Best on the whole 411 site. I enjoyed hearing your take on re-booking Wrestlemania 9. You made a few minor, logical switches to the card that produced some very interesting matchups (Heel Doink vs. Taker would have had an awesome build). I usually dont like reading fantasy booking on the web but that was realistic and subtle enough to be enjoyable. Given the circumstances at the time, how would you have booked WM 18 and WM 25? In my opinion, those are the two worst manias since WWE bought out WCW and really expanded their roster. 18 had the nWo involved, a returning HHH, and some solid mid card workers. 25 had two disappointing title matches (& title feuds), and their top performer (jericho) was in a throwaway midcard match despite the fact it was the most built up match on the card. Looking forward to hearing your thoughts. Keep up the good work Thanks again. Hmm. Well, X8 has a huge elephant in the room, in that do you rebook it with Austin/Hogan or not? IX had an obvious political move involved, but X8 has a more fundamental problem then a simple heel winning the main event issue. If I had been booking in a perfect universe, Hogan/Austin is your main event. But that's a bridge too far for me, so I'm going to assume that Hogan/Austin can't happen due to ego. So, Rock/Hogan remains, although it goes on last. Jericho/HHH also remains, but the build up is totally different, with the focus not on HHH and Steph's divorce, but rather on Steph telling Jericho everything, so that every week, every show, Jericho is one step ahead of HHH, because he has Steph, he has the woman who knows HHH inside and out. So HHH wins all the matches with Jericho's allies (Regal, Christian, Booker T and so on) but Jericho keeps getting the edge, keeps getting the mental victories, with the leg being a target in the last couple of weeks. That way, when HHH wins the match and the title in the 3rd to last match, it's less an anti-climax as HHH proves his intelligence and outsmarts both Jericho and Steph. I'd make the Tag match one fall to a finish to make it shorter, and then add in Mr. Perfect and Lance Storm into the IC title match and make it elimination, have RVD go through all 3 men to win the title by pinning Regal last, to really drive home the achievement. I'd merge two of the midcard matches, with Booker T and Angle both being Vince McMahon approved, so when Booker begins to target Edge at Vince's request (after Edge makes fun of Vince backstage), Angle comes out to help, then they challenge Edge to a tag match at WM, if you have anyone who is willing to tag with you… Pyro, Kane comes out. Those 4 guys could easily pull off a 20-30 minute classic tag match, and given the 4 way is over in a flash, that's your workrate match of the evening. So, leaving the women's match as is (save for maybe making it a 4 way with Molly, and/or putting Trish over), that leaves Taker/Flair and Austin/Hall. Given where they were going, and the supposed goal in the Flair ownership angle, I switch them. Flair V Hall, with Flair's ownership on the line vs. the nWo's, in an I Quit match. Basically they came in to get rid of Flair, so do it. Then when they beat Flair via Nash threatening to Powerbomb David through the set, Flair saying it to save David, then Nash does it anyway, that drives home how evil the nWo is, and then gives the Board a reason to say that yes, Vince won the stock in that match, but the Board then decides that Vince cannot be trusted with the company any more. They try to remove him from power, but then that ends up evolving into the brand split, with him owning Smackdown and Flair controlling Raw, with the board's backing. That leaves us with Austin/Taker, which is hardly a new and/or exciting match, I'll give you that. But at the time they had begun to recognize and acknowledge the Streak, so make it a #1 contenders match, with Taker constantly harping on about how he's undefeated at WM, and Austin won't beat him. He doesn't, Taker wins, but he gets visible pinfalls and such during it. And finally, the Hardcore Title thing through the show is kept, but with one proviso. After Maven wins the title back off Christian at the end (who had just won it off Might Molly with mace and a roll up), he doesn't get in the taxi, instead he runs off, until the half door slams in his face, and a pair of unknown boots pins him with one foot, the ref handing the unknown man the title belt. Who is the Hardcore Champion? Tune into Raw to find out, perhaps. Now, Wrestlemania XXV. Yeesh. OK obvious stuff first, ditch the Kid Rock thing from the show, make THAT the pre-show to get the fans in the mood. Second, make Taker/Shawn the final. Now, the 25 Diva battle royal becomes instead Melina V Beth for the title with Sunny as the guest ref. As much as it pains me, the whole Miss Wrestlemania thing was stupid, so Victoria doesn't get a payday, alas. If we can keep it under wraps, we set up Mickey Rourke V Jericho, but we don't tease it until after the Oscar nominations are announced, and we don't officially set it up until after the ceremony, in the hopes of him getting the Oscar and thus giving us the end of the Oscar shot. If not, then have Jericho V Steamboat straight up. There is again an issue of how far in are we going, in that if I get in early enough I don't worry that people have picked it and I go with Christian being Jeff Hardy's attacker and doing Jeff V Christian (Matt gets in MITB). If it's post Matt Hardy reveal, keep it. Mysterio/JBL is again something I can't really fault, given that JBL was retiring, so it makes sense. Santino I would use in a match with Swagger for the ECW title. Santino would come out, discuss WM, then get interrupted by Swagger, who complains that as ECW champ he's not booked. Santino offers him a match and then… Swagger wins quickly, unless you wanted to go off the wall. Which I would, but I'm fairly sure I'd be overruled. Now it comes to the two title matches. I'd keep them as is, mostly, in terms of participants, just change the booking leading into it and the match stips. Cena V Edge V Big Show comes about when Vickie sets up Cena V Big Show for #1 Contendership on SD, with Edge paying Big Show off to just destroy Cena, not win, just punish. Big Show then wins the match via cheating, and goes tweener, beating up everyone, deciding that, actually, he wants the title. Edge then begins to furiously back pedal, as Big Show just starts knocking out and/or beating up everyone, Edge then has to turn to Cena to help him, he's scared of Big Show. Cena laughs at him, and then throws Edge to the wolves, Edge gets beat up by Big Show a bit… And then Big Show beats HIM up as well. Cena wants revenge, and so Vickie makes it Edge V Cena V Big Show, with Cena looking for blood from both, Edge looking to keep his title, and Big Show just big angry giant knock out type. As for HHH/Orton… Keep it simple. Orton's IED keeps flashing out at inopportune moments. Whereas Big Show is somewhat controlled, he only attacks wrestlers, and only in matches, Randy attacks anyone and everyone. Wrestlers, refs, announcers, agents, (planted) fans… All with the legal impunity that he has a medical condition, and he has a title shot at WM that is iron clad. So, eventually, in order to protect the fans and everyone else, HHH/Orton is… See, I want to say Hell in a Cell, or a cage match at the least, but the logistics of this are fairly hard. So, we make it a dog collar match. You want to act like a rabid animal, then we'll treat you like one. And since he's attached by a steel chain to HHH, he can't hurt anyone. No tapping corners, just an all out brawl. So here's Daniel Bryan's theme. Nothing wrong there, right? Well, it's interesting to go back and find the last time that song was used in anything WWE related… Syrox wonders how I know stuff. Reader for a long time.. I look forward to this column every week. The question I have is this: I'm often astounded at your deep insight into the politics of wrestling. your ability to deg into stuff that happened over 20 years ago and explain the political thinking for pushes, firings, buisness deals etc from many federations. No I understand your personal experience as a wrestler in to how things work, moves, the buisness at present etc, but apaprt from google, I was wonderingif you could briefly explain how you get your insghts, Do you have friends in most of the feds? or is it a lifetime of reading dirt rags etc? Unfortunatly I wasnt reading the site when you started this column, so I dare say you covered all of this Waaaay back, but still would be usefull to read again for those of us newer to the site. Thanks for taking the time to read this and I hope you can take the time to answer it. I don't wish to make it seem like what I say is the gospel truth, in that I cannot categorically say that anything is totally accurate when it comes to backstage stuff and/or thinking. What I can do is make logical guesses. I have source material, in shoot interviews, memoirs, and scuttlebutt (all wrestlers gossip like fishwives and/or fishhusbands), which are all taken with certain grains of salt. I have the rumor mills online/dirt sheets, which are also taken with salt. I tend to find as many different sources as I can, then make a logical conclusion, based on what I know about how wrestling works. I can get it wrong, and/or I can disagree with conventional wisdom. But I take my best shot at giving you what I think the answer is. I do try and toss in the occasional proviso, but most of my answers are arrived at with my internal logic. Which is why I tend to write them out in a certain way, involving ‘thus' and ‘hence' and the like, since that is how I'm working through the problem. But again, to clarify: I am in no way shape or form implying I know everything about wrestling. I'm just trying my hardest to answer the questions given to me. Speaking of which, Jonberg has one. Hey chief, So what's the deal with all the grief Cena gets for his Superman recovery? Have the internet never watched a Hogan match? Or a Sting match? Or a Lawler face match? Or even an Austin match during 98? Faces have made huge money off ridiculous "crowd inspired" or "adrenaline rush" comebacks. And they don't sell a drop. I just don't get the hatred from something that has been done so many times with such success... Is there anything I'm missing that makes him different? People criticise his punches whilst wishing that the Rock would return. Now that's a comical right hand right there... But that's a whole other kettle of fish. Have a good Christmas mate Well, for starters the IWC is a huge, mysterious entity, with a million voices and 3 million opinions. Some people will love Cena's stuff, I'm sure, and will defend his recoveries from here to the end of the earth. Mostly on youtube. That said, there are a few common threads I've found. Some people hate the ‘Boring Invincible Hero', that wrestling trope in general, and bitch about it no matter who is doing it, be it Cena, Hogan, Sting, Austin. Santino, anyone. Some people HATE faces who are dominate all the time. Some people dislike Cena in general or for reasons they can't articulate, so they focus on his matches because it's something tangible to they can rag on. This is also why people who hate the PG era, or who hate the WWE targeting families will target Cena as a scapegoat, since he's the poster child. Workrate fans dislike it because he tends to use the same moves every time, and they dislike that, they want variety, they want wrestlers who can wrestle and do so in new and exciting ways. This has a sub-thread of people who think Cena can't or won't sell properly. And for some, it's part of the overall problem with Cena being far too powerful and not losing enough, and not losing to their favourites. I mean, there's no one reason why Cena, or anyone, gets ragged on. I'm sure someone hates on Cena's style because the little gnomes in his head tell him to. But they all tend to orbit in some way the idea that the Boring Invincible Hero is boring, and Cena does it too much, too often. Especially in this day and age, this isn't the 80's, when Hogan could work the same match for a month. Mike asks about the Dead Man. Hello, I was looking back on some Undertaker matches and I came across his first one on wweclassics.com. I couldn't figure out exactly what the first part of his name was till I looked it up today. He was called Kane the Undertaker. Now my question is Why? Was Undertaker going to originally be Kane? Imagine how the WWE would look like if Undertaker were Kane, it would be messed up. It would, yes. But they had no ideas or thoughts about Taker having a long lost half brother who was burnt in a fire giving him psychological scars that would be exacerbated by a foster family dying in another fire and a college girlfriend dying because the mental home living scarred burn victim freak didn't know how to drive a stick shift. It was simply a case of them working the gimmick out, and then deciding that him having a name would be too humanising, so they dropped the Kane bit. But then in a dozen or so years, when they decided that they did want him to have a brother, they remembered a name they thought would work well… Miguel asks about an infamous moment from Attitude. Hi 411, Thanks for a great column. Here's my question, it's been bothering me for a long time. I remember in mid 1999, when Stone Cold and The Undertaker were feuding, WWF ran an angle about a "Higher Power", a mysterious and powerful figure, for whom Taker and Shane McMahon claimed they were working for. Turns out the Higher Power was Vince McMahon. However, as I recall this development made zero sense in terms of storylines and was quite a letdown in general. I remember the live Raw crowd went totally silent, when it was revealed. So my question is, was Vince supposed to be the higher power all along, or was he just an emergency solution? If so, who was the WWF originally planning on being the Higher Power, and why did that plan fail? I'm not sure, but I think this was right around the time, when Ric Flair'c contract with WCW was coming up, and there were strong rumors that Flair would be going to the WWF. So I've always wondered whether the Higher Power was originally conceived as an angle to bring Flair in? Regards, No, the Higher Power was never going to be Flair, at least he wasn't thought of seriously or anything. At the time, there were 4 names being floated about online. Shane playing a double bluff was some people's idea. Steph being it was another idea floating about. But the two most common names that people were plumping for were Foley and HBK. HBK was what people want, Foley was the plan, originally. But Foley, who did want to turn heel, felt that such a sudden turn would be bad and, more importantly, that at that point in time, he was too broken down to do the feud justice, so they went with Vince instead. In an ideal world, but it was never Flair. Foley was the plan, Vince the back up. Hugh is up next with some more questions about the Calloway family. Hey there, long time reader first time question asker. Just a few things that I've been wondering, I was watching Summerslam 2002 last night and I started wondering, who come up with the idea to change the Undertaker from "The Deadman" to the "American Bad Ass." I never did get why they would so radically alter his gimmick to such an extent. On the same note, who decided to change him back again? Taker in both cases, pretty much. He went from Deadman to Biker because in his time away the WWF had shifted. It was no longer cartoonish, it had developed a more serious edge, with guys like Jericho, Benoit, Angle and the like now in the mix, the Deadman persona would be a relic, a dinosaur, it would stick out. Plus, Taker wanted to change up the moveset slightly, and the switch allowed them to do that. Then, when Bikertaker had run it's course, and the WWE was now heading back into more family friendly territory, the gimmick could be brought back and not be quite as glaring had it been around in 2000, 2001. Another question and keeping it in the family, how many different tag team partners has Kane been tag champ with? I was straining my brain and all I could come up with was The Undertaker, X-Pac, The Hurricane, The Big Show and R.V.D. has there been any more. He had two runs with Mankind, and a Smokey Mountain Wrestling tag reign with Al Snow. And finally since we're on the subject who has held the tag titles with the most different partners? Thanks for answering if you do, if not thanks anyway, Well now that's a can of worms. If you only count big leagues, like the WWF, WCW and so on, if you include ECW and WCW, Mick Foley has seven. Edge has had 6 in WWE alone. So one of those two, depending on how you count it. I think. Paul asks about kayfabe. Great read as always. Knowing that wrestling is "fake", are guys involved in current fueds still strongly advised against being seen together in public? I know after Boston Garden shows a very popular Chinese restaurant up north always host a post show meal. Would Vince flip out if a fan had a picture of The Miz & Daniel Brian and himself posing that hit the web? No, the days of kayfabe to that degree are long dead. And even if they did and it somehow became a problem, they can just easily have Miz say he was drunk or that there was a cop there and they didn't want to cause trouble or something. But there's enough photos of the current crop of guys like Sheamus, Dolph and so on parting and drinking that it's really not a big deal. Although Sheamus has a damm fine Herringbone Hat. Ijuanzee is up next, and he's asking about kicks. Sup dude, long time reader/first time sending a question. How in the HELL do wrestlers pull/fake/gimmick moves like sweet chin music/buzzsaw kick/sick kick? My friends and I are absolutely baffled as to how HBK/Tajiri aren't breaking people's jaws. Thanks, you rock! There's two ways to do it. One is to miss, and to just kick up in the general area and then slap some part of your body for the noise. Watch Shawn's right hand here. The slap is what causes the noise. The other way is to do it, but do it safely. You can either aim for a safer body part (I've been superkicked in the chest dozens of times) or it is possible to kick a guy in the face, like it is to punch him, and do is safe, it's a trick/technique that is hard to get, but basically comes down to getting it on the cheek and getting as much surface on there as possible. But that's risky. Most of the time, it just comes close and the smack makes the noise. Renje is confused about something. Why does Justin Gabriel grimace after doing the 450? He appears as if he's in genuine pain. If he's in that much pain, why do it? Because it looks awesome. No, he's just selling really well there. It's the same logic as when RVD flops about holding his stomach after a ***** Frog Splash, the idea is to put over how much it hurt you to do the move, so the other guy must be dead since you put your full weight behind it. He's fine, he wouldn't have permission to do the move unless he could prove he could do it all day every day and be fine. Rob has a bunch of questions. Hey Mathew! Ive got a few questions for u that have been on my mind, and im sure u can help! 1 - I always wondered about Yokozuna's bonzai drop, and how dangerous this move can be, considering Yoko's size. I remember seeing a clip of him in a botchamania video where he completely dropped all his weight on some jobber (i believe he was a jobber) and sat on him for what seemed like an eternity! It looked somewhat awkward and i was like "damn!". I know Yoko would usually hold on the ropes and land on his feet to offset the impact a bit, but being a wrestler yourself, how would you rate his finisher in terms of danger? Also i was wondering if you know of the video footage and the jobber i am referring to? I believe this is the one in question, but until someone creates the Botchamania wiki, I can't confirm, but I believe this is it. The poor man's name is Dan Dubiel, and this was a non-title match on the 3rd of January, 1994 edition of Raw, filmed December 13th the previous year. As bad as it looked, the guy was back in the ring the following night, losing to Crush, so either he was selling very well or the injuries weren't that severe. And the Banzai is a dangerous move if you don't protect the other guy. Thing is, if you protect the other guy, it looks bad. I've not done it in a long time, I wasn't able to get the timing right to make it look good, I tended to err too much on the side of caution. But if you go the other way, it can mess you up, like anything involving big guys jumping on you. It's perhaps not quite as bad as a piledriver or anything like that, in that if it starts to go wrong you have a chance to move, but it's still up there. 2- Very odd question, but I had a weird thought come to me about wrestlers having a sneezing/coughing fit either during a match or during a live interview/promo. Wrestlers sometimes mess up their lines or whatever, but I dont think ive ever seen a wrestler have a nose or throat malfunction on camera, but maybe you have. Well no. If they are taping it, they'll stop and restart, and if it's live, if they can, they'll pass off to someone else. I recall The Rock's voice breaking up repeatedly in a promo aganst Mick Foley in an early 1999 Raw that was on Botchamania, although I can't find the video. Perhaps the promo one night after St Valentine's Day Massacre, but I'm not sure. 3- I know uve answered countless questions and given many opinions on the Montreal Screwjob, but i have a very quick and direct question about it. Bret seemingly contradicts himself a lot (in his book and in countless interviews) in saying that it wasnt about losing the belt in Montreal, and losing it to Shawn, but then he said (in his book) hed willingly lose it to anybody other than Shawn, for example someone like the Brooklyn Brawler Steve Lombardi (wtf?), and would lose it anytime either before or after the Survivor Series. So then what the hell exactly WAS it all about? I love Bret but hes never seemed to say specifically what the issue was. If he has, maybe i just havent heard it. It was about losing the belt to Shawn, in Canada, in his last match in the company. He would, supposedly, have put anyone over for the belt, just not in Canada (since he was beloved) and not to Shawn (whom he hated). It was just bad timing that it was set up like that. But then, thanks to that, WWF managed to survive, but still… 4- Last one. Speaking of Bret, are any of his children involved in the wrestling business in any capacity? Are any of them aspiring wrestlers that u know of? I know he has family (Natalya and DH Smith) but what about his own kids? Do u think he has discouraged them from entering the business in any way? Thanks for answering, 411 rules!!!!! Not at the moment, no. Bret has 4 kids, and Dallas, his elder son, did start some training at Lance Storm's school, but he decided it wasn't for him and he quit. But then again, never say never. Bret has neither helped nor hindered his kids, it's their choice. But so far, the only one who showed an interest quit. And on that downer note, I bid you all a Happy Holidays regardless of which festival you celebrate, and hope you have a safe time until you tune in next week. Bye for now!

event_or_fact.property: he was drunk or that there was a cop there and they didn't want to cause trouble or something
he was played with by Vince on the subject.

(in his book) hed willingly lose it to anybody other than Shawn, for example someone like the Brooklyn Brawler Steve Lombardi (wtf?), and would lose it anytime either before or after the Survivor Series

description.hltext_display: UK & World News: Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content:
A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said.
West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.
An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.

event_or_fact.property: Man and boy killed; man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left
man and a young boy have died; a chip pan left

description.hltext_display: KELIS' REP HITS BACK AT TALENT AGENCY SUIT
description.content: A representative for KELIS has hit back at a lawsuit alleging the singer failed to pay a talent agency more than $11,000 (7,300) - insisting bosses at the company spent the money without the star's "approval". The Milkshake singer and her management hired staff at Drive Talent Inc. to provide "goods and services" for a variety of performances on U.S. TV shows, including Today, The Tonight Show with Jay Leno, and Late Night with Jimmy Fallon. Bosses at the company filed suit against the star earlier this month (Dec10) claiming she failed to pay $11,817.91 (7,878.61) for services between March and July (10). However, Kelis' publicists insist the star is not worried about the claim, because Drive Talent executives spent the money without asking her or her managers for permission. A statement from the rep to AllHipHop.cop says, "Drive Talent has been paid in full for services rendered for the assistance in production for various TV performances. Any claims stating otherwise is clearly an effort to gain press attention. "The amount claimed to be owed is not for services rendered, which Drive Talent would like the public to believe, but over a dispute stemming from a European promotional run in which Drive Talent authorised the spend of close to $11,800 of the artist's money to a vendor they hired without approval from either the artist or management. We look forward to presenting our case in court and are confident once a review has been made of all evidence we have to support our argument that it will be clear Drive Talent has absolutely no ground whatsoever to stand on."

entity.property: The Tonight Show with Jay Leno

description.hltext_display: 首日单店售出600余台 爱国者平板电脑N700震撼上市
description.author: CBSi中国・ZOL
description.content:
刚一露面便“遭遇”抢购，上市首日单店就卖出600多台；支持3G，成为国内首款能打电话的平板电脑；有自己的在线应用商店（app商店）……作为备受期待的一款平板电脑产品，爱国者平板电脑N700一上市便表现不俗。12月11日，这款堪称国产平板电脑“王者”的产品刚一亮相，就点燃了众多消费者的热情，也引爆了“平板元年”最强劲的一股“冲击波”！
“时尚又实用，这样‘炫’的东东，当然要第一时间拥有。”最早购买到爱国者平板电脑N700（以下简称“N700”）的小郑这样表达自己的心情，小郑在丰台区从事设计工作，她坦言N700的风格跟自己很“搭”：“压力与我无关，我喜欢轻松、愉悦的生活节奏，这样的生活才使我有创意的灵感！N700超强的娱乐功能和开放的系统设计会让我的生活更愉悦，对办公软件的支持还方便我及时记录迸发出的灵感。”
像小郑一样，N700首发当日，便有数百名“发烧友”赶到活动现场——中关村海龙电子城爱国者官方旗舰店。不少人都表示，早就从媒体的介绍中了解到N700的超强功能，在得知N700预售的消息后，便早早交了预订金，今天的首发自然是不容错过，“虽然今年号称是‘平板元年’，但其实真正好用的平板电脑并不多，iPad虽然一直呼声很高，但是仔细分析一下就会发现它的尺寸、功能什么的其实并不太适合中国人使用，我预计N700这么一款‘实力派明星’肯定会遭到疯抢，所以早早就交了预订金，以免买不到货。”一名在现场排队的小伙子这样道出了大家的心声。
消费者热情高涨，备受期待的N700也没有让大家失望，首发现场，爱国者电子的工作人员现场展示了N700的独特设计和超强功能：自主创造的超炫界面Freedom River，最适合中国人使用习惯的7英寸宽屏，380克的超轻便携重量，使之真正做到了时尚便携，显得精致又不失大气；支持3G通话功能，使N700成为国内首款能打电话的平板电脑；采用Android的超强操作系统，支持12万个应用程序，并植入多核处理器，则赋予了N700无限开放的系统和同时支持多任务处理的功能，使“一边看新闻，一边语音通话；一边看电子书，一边听音乐”的移动互联梦想成为现实；现场展示的 “植物大战僵尸”、“疯狂的小鸟”等多个经典3D小游戏，画面清晰又流畅，更是让众人赞叹不已。据爱国者电子的工作人员介绍，N700在支持语音通话、多任务处理、512内存容量、380克精巧外形、60天超长待机（飞行模式）等方面都超过了iPad，在国内平板电脑中处于领先地位，是全球Android平板电脑的旗舰产品。
据了解，N700上市当天，仅海龙店就售出了600多台，火爆程度让现场的爱国者电子工作人员也连称“出乎意料”，不过他们表示，已经紧急从总部追加订货，从12月11日开始，N700已在全国各大城市陆续开卖。

description.hltext_display: Brookstone Law, PC, Predicts More Foreclosures in 2011
description.content:
Top Law Firm Sees Aggressive Wave of Foreclosures Re-Starting First Quarter
Newport Beach, CA (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
Despite a significant reduction in the number of foreclosures in November that was the biggest decline ever recorded, a new wave of foreclosures in 2011 is predicted by Brookstone Law, PC.
Brookstone is involved in active investigations of the banking crisis including cases throughout the nation where clients are taking the banks to task for unlawful lending practices including robo-signing.
"We would prefer that the November decline was good news but it's not – it's an artificial drop that for most borrowers in foreclosure will not even achieve a temporary reprieve for them,” said Vito Torchia, Jr., managing attorney of Brookstone Law. “Robo-signing is a huge problem and as banks, lenders and the courts address it, we predict there will be a return to aggressive foreclosures by banks and lenders in the first quarter of 2011.”
Brookstone and industry experts, including RealtyTrac, the Irvine, Ca.-based online foreclosure marketer, attribute the November decline to fallout from the robo-signing controversy and discount economic factors as a major factor in the drop. While December will show a continued decline in foreclosures, they predict it will be followed by an acceleration of activity in the first quarter of 2011 as the robo-signing controversy is addressed.
Robo-signing exposed sloppy industry practices that critics charged violated state laws and regulations throughout the nation. Some lenders recently froze the foreclosure process for all their loans until they could check whether their procedures were flawed and make any needed corrections. The moratoriums forced lenders and servicers to delay many foreclosures while they revised procedures surrounding questionable paperwork. Many foreclosures are being challenged in court because of allegations that banks evicted people without reading the documents.
Banks seized more than 816,000 homes through the first nine months of 2010 and are on pace to seize 1.2 million by the end of the year. Lenders seized more U.S. homes this past summer than in any three-month stretch since 2006.
“It is no coincidence that states where courts are involved in foreclosures and banks are faced with scrutiny of their foreclosure practices that filings dropped substantially compared to states where courts do not usually participate in foreclosure actions. There were nearly five times fewer auctions in judicial states, compared with non-judicial states,” said Torchia. “But that will change in 2011 as banks have already begun restarting the foreclosure process, as evidenced Bank of America's announcement last week that it was phasing out its moratorium.”
ABOUT BROOKSTONE LAW, PC Based in Los Angeles, with offices in Newport Beach, CA, and Ft. Lauderdale, FL, Brookstone Law, PC, is a law firm comprised of attorneys with experience and success in business, corporate and personal finance, employment, entertainment & media, art & museum, intellectual property and real estate law. The firm has a network of more than 40 affiliate attorneys nationwide and employs highly trained specialists, paralegals, paraprofessionals and administrative staff dedicated to serving our clients. For information, call (800) 946-8655 or visit http://www.brookstone-law.com.
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4918414.htm

description.hltext_display: 知人がDV男と婚約しました。 彼の過去を知らせるべきか - 逆恨みは恐ろしい、けれど
description.author: kiri
description.content:
そのDV男性(A男とします)は今から10年以上前に私の友人B子と結婚し、その後離婚しています。
離婚に至る前にB子は一度、A男の暴力から逃れて私の所に避難して来ました。数週間後に私の住所を突き止めたA男がB子を迎えに来て(二度と暴力を振るわないと約束)B子は帰宅したものの、結局暴力は繰り返され、今度B子はC子の所に逃げ、そこでC子の知り合い(離婚問題に強い専門家)の助けを得て離婚しました。
B子は今、別の男性と再婚し幸せに暮らしています。
そんなこともすっかり忘れていた私でしたが、昨年から一緒に仕事をしているD子から忘年会の席で婚約相手を紹介された時は驚きました。A男だったからです。一緒にいたC子も気付きました。
あれから私は結婚して職場も名前も住まいも変わっていたため、A男は私に初対面の挨拶をしました。A男は営業職で物腰が柔らかく礼儀正しいので外見はとても優しそうに見えます。
私はA男がもう暴力をふるうことなくD子と幸せな結婚生活を送ればいいと思いましたが、C子によると忘年会が終わり彼女がトイレに行って出てきたら、そこにA男がいて
「D子に余計なことをしゃべったらぶっ殺すぞ」
と肩を壁に押し付けてC子を脅したと言うのです。
その時のアザもC子は見せてくれました。C子は現在も独身で当時と全く変わっていません。A男も全く変わってないようです。
C子はA男とB子のドロドロの離婚劇を知っているだけにD子に結婚を思いとどまってほしいと言います。
私も同感ですが、C子に相談されても良い案が浮かびません。
C子と私は所属が異なりますが同じ職種で10数年来の親友。
D子はC子のアシスタントでC子が他社から引き抜き、とても可愛がっていて、現在取り組んでいるプロジェクトでは私と一緒に仕事をしています。A男はD子の前の会社の取引先の営業担当という関係です。

description.hltext_display: 拜仁天王敲定回归日期 冬歇期后首战或打20分钟
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：明天凌晨与斯图加特的德国杯是拜仁冬歇期前的最后一场比赛，不过德甲巨人欧冠淘汰赛抽签抽中国米，联赛又落后领头羊多特蒙德14分，他们下半赛季的任务同样艰巨。而好消息是罗本自恢复有球训练来情况良好，范加尔认为冬歇期后首战小飞侠便可出场。
想要在欧冠赛场走得更远，想要在联赛中上演绝地反击，显然拜仁需要罗本伤愈助阵。上赛季无论是联赛、欧冠还是德国杯比赛，罗本都多次凭借一己之力拯救球队。而经过5个多月的修养，罗本终于在上周四恢复了有球训练，这无疑是给拜仁注入了一阵强心剂。
谈到罗本这一周来的情况，主帅范加尔说：“重新归来他充满了热情，这是自然的，他休息了6个月时间。”按照罗本的恢复计划，他会参加球队1月2日起在卡塔尔的冬季训练营，届时便可以与全队合练。而下半赛季首轮（1月15日）拜仁客场挑战沃尔夫斯堡的比赛，范加尔认为罗本视恢复情况可能会出场“20分钟”，这将是小飞侠本赛季首次亮相。
明天凌晨与斯图加特的德国杯后，拜仁全队就将开始圣诞假期，他们有10天的休整时间，然后就会前往卡塔尔开始冬季训练。冬季训练对于拜仁将士来说将不会轻松，因为范加尔已宣布：“在卡塔尔会是非常艰苦的。”正因如此，他希望全队都能利用冬歇假期彻底放松：“我希望球员们好好休息，没有任何规定，只是休息。”范加尔一直强调“精神上的恢复”，而本赛季拜仁多位参加了世界杯的主力成员都显得异常疲惫，所以这段时间对于拉姆、施魏因斯泰格等长期征战的绝对主力来说是个难得的休整机会。

description.hltext_display: Number Investigator Empowers and Protects Consumers from Scams During the Holiday Season
description.content:
NumberInvestigator.com Works to Protect Consumers from Scam Artists that are Particularly Prevalent Around the Holiday Season.
Bellevue, WA (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
With the rise of mobile technology and the declining use of landlines and associated caller ID systems, Number Investigator helps consumers find and share information about the calls they receive.
Telemarketers aren't the only annoying callers plugging lines around the holidays in an attempt to separate people from their cash. While it's true that many popular scams have begun to take shape in the online world, there are still some old-fashioned swindlers attempting both cash and identity theft through phone calls and text messages.
In September 2010, the FDIC reported an elaborate scam aimed at home buyers and loan recipients. Potential scam victims received phone calls from individuals posing as FDIC employees attempting to gain personal information such as bank account numbers and debit or credit card numbers. As the holidays approach, there's no shortage of cons attempting to drive a wedge between unsuspecting victims and their hard-earned cash.
Police departments across the country are warning consumers about several popular scams this holiday season. One, known as the “Help! I've Been Robbed!” scam, involves staged phone calls to family and friends of the targeted “victim” indicating that they are a family member and have been robbed and require that money be wired or transferred so they can make it home. Another popular technique used all year long is known as “Smishing” or “text phishing”. Potential victims receive text messages from con artists claiming to be their bank or an online retailer. These texts usually indicate that there has been a problem with the owner's account and ask that they verify their account information. Individuals tend to be more vulnerable to this scam during the holiday season when they are shopping at a variety of stores both on and offline.
NumberInvestigator.com allows consumers to protect their identities and their cash by searching for and reporting offending con artists. The site has a running list of offending callers and complaints organized by phone number. An individual seeking information about an unknown caller simply has to enter in the 10-digit phone number. The resulting report will provide the requester with general location information, complaints related to the phone number and additional premium information for a fee.
In addition to NumberInvestiagor.com's complaint service and aggregation feature, the site also houses several tips and resources, including a link to the Do Not Call Registry.
Unlike many reverse phone lookup services, NumberInvestigator.com is one of the few consumer advocate sites that allows consumers to report phone number complaints to organizations that have the ability to take action. Number Investigator gives consumers power to report potential fraud and band together to take action to eliminate these intrusive phone calls.
About
Numberinvestigator.com is a leading provider of reverse phone lookup services that enable consumers to simply search a number, including cell numbers (where available), landline numbers and VoIP to accurately find the owner of that number.
Contact If you have questions, please contact NIMediaInquiry(at)gmail.com http://www.numberinvestigator.com
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebnumber/investigator/prweb4918634.htm

description.hltext_display: New Year盘点时尚，Gateway打造加分新形象
description.author: CBSi中国・ZOL
description.content:
年末是一场节日的盛宴，圣诞、元旦、春节纷至沓来，年末更是一部回顾迎新的时尚大片。在这个喜庆与浪漫共同飞舞的日子里，充满都市时尚精神PC品牌Gateway，为消费者盛情奉上为期近两个月的新年促销活动，与您一起盘点精彩，扮靓自我，打造新年新形象！
从2010年12月23日一直到2011年2月15日，以“ ”为主题，从笔记本、超便携笔记本到台式机乃至一体机，Gateway多系列48款明星机型，均参加此次岁末年促盛宴。活动期间，您不仅可以随心挑选个性产品，更有机会赢得Gateway精心准备的众多超值好礼：高档实用的Lotto拉杆箱、柔软贴心的保暖三件套、简约长款手包以及超便携笔记本内胆包——时尚的产品+温馨的礼物，为您的新年新形象再加分！
Gateway简约 由我
来自美国的传奇PC品牌Gateway，从诞生的第一天起，就被注入了独立时尚的都市精神，对“时尚个性、自由自信、品质细腻”的执着最求和坚持，让Gateway走在时尚潮流路线的最前沿。本次活动， Gateway 2010年度时尚力作汇聚一堂，星光闪耀：幽然灵犀的“夜光舞池触控板”，极具质感的银白色铝镁合金外壳，充分彰显着ID49C、ID43A、EC39C的超凡品味和迷人气质；尤其是Gateway有史以来最轻薄笔记本EC39C，在国际展览上大放异彩，相继擒获2010年台北国际计算机展创新设计奖和2010年日本优良设计奖，令人瞩目；而以效能领先的经典NV系列，多达24款丰富机型各有千秋，其中还包括最新上市的5款采用NV49C；此外，LT31超便携商务本和甜蜜，LT25糖果系列迷你本，堪称小型娱乐中心的SX系列台式机、提供强大多媒体动力的DX系列台式机、堪比赛车极速的FX系列游戏型台式机，还有引领时尚风潮的ZX系列触摸屏一体机，全系列精品悉数到场。每一款产品，秀外慧中，因需求不同性能配置各异，设计上却都尽显Gateway简约不凡的别致时尚，让完美由心而选！
售后无忧 优享服务
作为世界知名的PC品牌，Gateway的魅力不仅在于产品的时尚优雅，促销的盛大温馨，更在于其获得全球用户广泛赞誉的专业优质的售后服务。全国联保业务、三年有限保修、优秀的服务质量，已经让Gateway连续四年荣获“中国品牌风云榜”最佳售后服务奖，Gateway全心全意让您买的放心，用的安心，绝无后顾无忧！
Gateway全国客户服务热线：400-700-9888
Gateway中国官网：http://cn.gateway.com/

description.hltext_display: HydroWorx Plays Part in Underwater Treadmill “Torture” of Antonio Valencia
description.content:
When Manchester United winger Antonio Valencia fractured his left ankle in September, no one expected him to make a comeback before mid-February. But thanks in great part to intense physical therapy sessions on a HydroWorx underwater treadmill, the star is likely to return to the field as early as January.
Middletown, Pennsylvania (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
For an international soccer star, fracturing an ankle typically means a significant leave of absence. But Manchester United's Antonio Valencia hasn't taken his serious ankle injury in the September game against Rangers lying down. Instead, he's been undergoing what some have deemed “water torture” in the team's HydroWorx underwater treadmill to speed up his recovery.
According to John Davin, Manchester United's 1st Team Physiotherapist, Valencia's heavy-duty workouts and aquatic therapy sessions are having an incredibly positive impact.
“Antonio continues to make excellent progress through his rehabilitation,” says Davin. “His progression has, without doubt, been greatly assisted by the use of the HydroWorx underwater treadmill pool. It has provided a medium in which Antonio can run relatively early without adverse effect to the healing and repair of damaged tissue...”
The HydroWorx underwater treadmill allows athletes to minimize their land-based training and physical. As Anson Flake, President, HydroWorx, explains, “On a HydroWorx underwater treadmill, athletes are 20-100% ‘lighter' than they are on land. This equates to reduced overall body stress during physical therapy, thus decreasing much of the discomfort typically seen when rehabbing breaks, strains, sprains and similar problems.”
Adds Flake, “We look forward to seeing Antonio Valencia in action next month. We're privileged to have played a part in his journey back to the pitch.”
About HydroWorx:
HydroWorx is a Middletown, Pennsylvania, based company that offers a wide range of underwater treadmill pools, underwater treadmills, and peripheral products and services. Every day, over 15,000 athletes and patients use HydroWorx technology to recover from injuries and health conditions. More information about HydroWorx can be found at http://www.HydroWorx.com.
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4919064.htm

description.hltext_display: “大山姆”被炒引连锁反应 布莱克本队长欲出走
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：上周一，布莱克本俱乐部主席宣布了令所有人都颇感震惊的消息：主教练阿勒代斯下课！尽管“大山姆被炒”事件已经过去一周多时间，但在英媒体的口诛笔伐之下，布莱克本仍然没有平息此事，日前阿勒代斯在接受天空体育台采访时说：“现在我仍然不敢想象被解雇的事实，我根本不知道解雇我的原因。也许事情的原因正是我不够了解俱乐部的新老板，我们从来没有正式见面过，我想，很明显在这段时间，有些人在我背后说了些什么，并最终导致我的下课。这就是我想弄明白的事实，我要知道我到底因何被解雇，如果不能得到答案，那么我只能继续我的生活。”
布莱克本现任队长，来自刚果的萨姆巴表达了自己对阿勒代斯的支持，他表示：“如果这就是布莱克本的做事原则，那么我不想与俱乐部再有任何关系，我想离开这里。”
事件回顾：
英国当地时间12月13日，布莱克本俱乐部宣布辞掉主教练山姆.阿勒代斯，取代他位置的是俱乐部的看守领队-史蒂芬.基恩，一位名不见经传的小人物接替了功勋主教练。
俱乐部新老板（印度Venky集团）给出的解释是：我们将要使布莱克本成为英超前五名的强队，就像曼城和热刺所做的，而尽管阿勒代斯让球队能够稳定在中游行列，但这显然还远远不够，因此必须有更具实力的主教练来取代他。目前史蒂芬.基恩将代理主教练一职，直至俱乐部找到合适人选。
据英国卫报报道，布莱克本炒掉阿勒代斯的原因远非因与前五名的成绩相去甚远那么简单，事实上，自从入主布莱克本后，印度Venky集团觉得俱乐部能为自己脸上争光，但阿勒代斯在有俱乐部高层观战的老特拉福德之战上让老板们颜面扫尽，1:7的比分惨败给曼联，此后，很显然有人在怂恿俱乐部高层辞掉阿勒代斯。而基恩的上任，则很大程度上依赖于他在俱乐部的人脉，这位没有在任何俱乐部取得名气的野心领队终于爬到了他的制高点，事实上，基恩能来到布莱克本，还是当时阿勒代斯的引荐。
因此，一个不靠谱的理由+一个不靠谱的主教练，让所有人都替阿勒代斯鸣不平。而其所产生的连锁反应，则要远远超出纽卡斯尔炒掉休顿一事。若不是阿勒代斯的到来，布莱克本根本无法完成保级重任，那么本赛季早已经在英冠里打拼了。
最新动态：
前任-阿勒代斯：大山姆坚持认为他的被炒源于不为人知的第三方指使所致，并且，阿勒代斯想要一个真正的下课原因。与阿勒代斯一同被解雇还有他的副手-尼尔.马克唐纳。阿勒代斯认为，即便俱乐部需要招募新主帅，那么在这段空置期，马克唐纳也应该是最佳的接替人选，因为他与俱乐部及球员之间都十分了解，球员对他也很爱戴，况且他曾有过执教经验。
现任-基恩：上周末布莱克本1:1战平西汉姆，基恩获得了他首场执教英超的机会，但布莱克本的主场表现堪称本赛季最差，基恩在临场的指挥呆若木鸡，无法控制局面，并最终在领先的情况下，被西汉姆扳平比分。与前任阿勒代斯的表现对比，基恩还差几个档次。
队长-萨姆巴：萨姆巴最近放出话来：如果俱乐部照此发展下去，他将立刻走人。萨姆巴说：“作为队长，我很难说出这些话，但是我已经想了很长时间，并且想法很坚定，在足球界，没人会明白山姆被炒的原因。我相信这不是俱乐部主席-威廉希尔先生的决定，因为阿勒代斯的功劳，他比我们谁都更了解，若不是他，我们上个赛季已经降级了。对于这样一位功勋教练，这样的待遇还有公平可言吗？”让萨姆巴同样不可理解的是：俱乐部竟然在没有找到合适人选的时候就辞掉阿勒代斯！萨姆巴说：“球员和球迷们需要合理解释，除非能给我们指定下一任主帅人选，否则冬季转会期，俱乐部如何能够吸引球员加盟？”

description.hltext_display: New Jersey most likely destination for Nuggets' Anthony
description.author: Benjamin HochmanThe Denver Post
description.content:
The Nets have remained a serious player in the chase for Carmelo Anthony. Sources say they are attempting to bulk up their roster in hopes of wooing Melo. (John Leyba, The Denver Post )
A year ago today, the New Jersey Nets were as enticing as, well, a vacation to New Jersey.
They were 2-26, their coach had been fired and they were the laughingstocks of all sports laughingstocks.
One year later, New Jersey is a very likely destination for one of basketball's best players, Carmelo Anthony. With a new billionaire owner, assets to trade and a pending move to Brooklyn, the Nets seem more and more like the most promising suitor for the Nuggets' all-star forward. The Nuggets and Nets have ramped up trade talks, NBA sources said Tuesday, though it's still not known whether Anthony will sign off on the deal by signing a three-year, $65 million contract extension.
In addition, NBA sources said Tuesday a couple of contending teams have expressed interest in "renting" Anthony for the rest of the season. Those teams appear willing to trade for Melo knowing they might not be able to sign him to a long-term contract.
The sources would not identify the teams willing to possibly rent Anthony, but Dallas could be one team making an inquiry. Mavericks owner Mark Cuban told 103.3 FM in Dallas earlier this season, "It just depends on who the guy is and what we'd have to give up — (but) we'll play rent-a-player, no question about it."
An Anthony trade is not imminent, the sources said, but Melo is likely to be moved by mid-January, they said. The Nuggets and Nets have resumed serious discussions about a blockbuster, multiteam trade moving Melo for rookie center Derrick Favors, the expiring contract of sharpshooter Troy Murphy and at least two first-round draft picks. The trade would likely involve other teams and cash considerations. Yahoo Sports reported that Nuggets forward Al Harrington, a New Jersey native, could be part of a potential deal.
The key for the Nets is getting Anthony to agree to sign the extension, which would carry over to his new team.
Last week, Anthony told The Denver Post, "Wherever I
View slide show of Timberwolves-Nuggets game Dec. 18 .
Watch video of Nuggets forward Carmelo Anthony talking rumors, holidays and kids .
View slide show of Al Harrington and J.R. Smith spreading some holiday cheer at Toys "R" Us .
View more Nuggets photos .
Find analysis, notes and buzz on the All Things Nuggets blog .
Evaluate the latest team numbers on the Nuggets Stats Page .
Ask Benjamin Hochman about the team or NBA in Nuggets Mailbag .
Post photos of your team spirit .
go, I'm going to sign the extension."
But then he was asked, "If they come to you and say, 'We have a deal to send you to the Nets,' would you sign?"
"I don't know," Melo said. "I don't know — I'd have to deal with that when it comes."
The Nets, it is understood from sources, are actively working to improve their roster with an eye toward convincing Melo to sign the extension. New Jersey is trying to emulate what Orlando did recently in bulking up its roster around its superstar, Dwight Howard, in an effort to keep him long term. The Magic added Jason Richardson from the Suns and Gilbert Arenas from the Wizards in order to battle Miami and Boston for supremacy in the Eastern Conference.
The Nuggets have been working for months to accommodate Anthony's trade demands, namely, getting him to a big-city market. But talks between Denver and Chicago have stalled in the past over the Nuggets' demands to get big man Joakim Noah. And a trade to the New York Knicks, Melo's desired team, remains unlikely because the Knicks don't have as much to offer as New Jersey. Denver is determined to trade Anthony so it doesn't lose him to free agency after this season without getting a substantial return.
The Nuggets nearly completed a trade to New Jersey before the season began, and the Nets remain the most likely destination. The team is expected to move to Brooklyn, N.Y., in 2012, and its big-money owner, Mikhail Prokhorov, hopes to make a big splash in a Knicks-centric area by getting Melo.
Benjamin Hochman: 303-954-1294 or bhochman@denverpost.com

description.hltext_display: GAGA FAN QUESTIONED BY COPS OVER 'BACKSTAGE BREAK-IN'
description.content: LADY GAGA was left distressed after a fan used fake backstage passes to sneak through strict security in a bid to meet the superstar at London's 02 Arena last week (ends19Dec10), according to U.K. reports. The Poker Face hitmaker put on two sold-out shows at the huge venue in the U.K. capital, but was left shocked before Thursday's (16Dec10) concert when she was informed a devotee had made her way backstage. The woman had forged passes which helped her evade the star's security team - and she was only caught out by Gaga's management as she made her way to the singer's dressing room, according to Britain's Daily Mirror. Police were called and the woman was reportedly released after questioning. A source tells the newspaper, "This was a serious breach of security and the woman was heading in the direction of the stage and, more worryingly, Gaga's dressing room. "This woman had gone to great lengths to produce all the fake documentation so she could move at ease in the holding area backstage. "Gaga was understandably shaken by the incident but was a consummate professional and continued as per normal, putting on a dazzling show."

description.hltext_display: Somersworth teachers agree to terms of two-year contract: City Council now has to sign off on deal
description.content:
SOMERSWORTH — The Somersworth Association of Educators has accepted a two-year agreement that proposes a 1 percent and 2.3 percent cost of living increase in the contract's respective years and overall increased insurance costs for most of the Hilltop City's teaching staff.
Even though the agreement has now been ratified by both the union and School Board, the contract still needs City Council approval before it is finalized, a move that would officially bring closure to a long and trying negotiation process which has lasted more than a year and included multiple rounds of mediations and impasse.
Despite the fact the teachers must now wait until at least January for a decision, union officials said they are "relieved" and "pleased" the hardest part of the process is over and they can now focus on moving forward under the contract's terms.
"It's been a long haul," said SAE President Ed Olson. "The collective bargaining in itself is an adversarial task. I'm glad it's behind us, and I look forward to seeing the city councilors put their approval on it and we can go forward."
School Board Chairman Don Austin said the board is also "looking forward to moving on" from districtwide reduction-in-force notices, a $675,000 budget reduction and other things over the past year that have strained the relationship between the two sides.
"I think we're all glad we've come to an agreement on all of this," said Austin. "I'd like to make sure to continue to leave the avenues of conversation open. We've had a lot of controversies over the last several months that have created some bad feeling between the administrators and the teachers and we certainly want those to be considered as events in the past... and I hope all of that plays into a better relationship now that we have a contract."
While the two-year contract has salary increases, Olson said the contract overall represents a "wash or a small loss" for most of the union members because the salary increases are offset or surpassed by a 3 to 5 percent increase for health insurance coverage costs, depending on the type of plan.
That health insurance coverage increase begins in the first year, which ends on June 30, 2011, and doesn't change in the second year, which begins July 1, 2011.
The first year of the contract poses an overall budget increase of about $15,000, an amount Steve MacKenzie, head of the union negotiating team, said is "very, very slight" in the overall scheme of the budget.
He said terms outlined in the first year, which also includes a reduction in the total number of steps in the teachers salary schedule from 20 to 18 and better salary raises for higher degrees, carry over unchanged to the second year of the contract, which ends July 1, 2012.
School Board Chairman Don Austin said the budget increase posed by the second year of the contract is still a "soft number" because benefit costs aren't finalized, and said he couldn't provide a projected number. He said the "lion's share" of that increase, though, will be based upon the insurance costs.
In year two, teachers will also be responsible for greater copays for doctor visits and prescription drugs, which Austin said will help reduce insurance costs for the district and city. He said the $10 visit copay in this year's contract will jump to $20 starting July 1, 2011, and the drug copays will increase from this year's $5, 15 and $35 to $10, $30 and $65 in year two.
The contract also creates a joint health insurance committee between the two sides, which Austin said will help the city explore insurance savings, as well as leave the contract open to laws outlined by current state legislation, such as the Evergreen Law, which allows the expiring year of a contract to roll over if a new contract isn't ratified.
MacKenzie said he expected the ratified contract to go before City Council on Jan. 3, and he said he expected action to be taken during one of the two January meetings or during the first February meeting after the contract is reviewed by the council's Finance Committee.
When asked if he was optimistic about the council passing the contract, MacKenzie said "hell no" because the contract process has been difficult thus far, although he said he hopes councilors pass it so the union can focus on negotiations for the next contract, sessions which begin in September 2011.
"It's not a great deal, not even really a good deal, but given the times it's probably the most realistic deal we could get," he said. "We understand times are tough, and they're particularly tough in terms of local cities and towns in the State of New Hampshire and city and state government."

description.hltext_display: AutoGov Unveils New Algorithm for Healthcare Exchanges
description.content:
Buoyed by more than a decade of success building eligibility tools for Medicaid public and private sector clients, AutoGov's newest scoring engine creates a bridge between healthcare exchanges and Medicaid.
Austin, TX (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
AutoGov CEO, Rose Hayden, is announcing a new release of her company's flagship risk management tool, CaseVue. This version introduces a new multidimensional algorithm designed to bridge the information gaps between Medicaid and healthcare exchanges.
Hayden says CaseVue will now be able to ensure the integrity of critical handoff between Medicaid and the new state healthcare exchanges being created in response to the new healthcare reform regulations.
About the new engines Hayden said, “Our experience with the “exchange” between Medicaid and CHIP suggests that the handoffs or deeming from one program to another must be handled with great care ensuring the integrity of the programs, eliminating the likelihood of dual eligibiles, and managing a quality based transaction. Administrators must be able to assure the public that the process has been handled with the precision of an analytical and statistically sound model.”
CaseVue is part of a comprehensive platform used by government agencies, healthcare providers to provide decision support solutions with a base in predictive analytics. CaseVue provides users will fast, accurate decision support tools that improve both the timeliness and quality of eligibility and exchange related decisions.
AutoGov's 15 years of delivering consistent quality services to its government and corporate clients is borne of the knowledge and experience of its leadership team. All of AutoGov's principals have served at the highest levels in government and as executives in the private sector. The AutoGov team, their advice, and the solutions reflect decades of practical knowledge and experience. The company's firm belief is that solutions for its clients must be affordable, practical, and harness technology to support day to day operations without major disruption or expense.
For more information contact the company at 512-439-2900 or at autogov.com.
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4919194.htm

description.hltext_display: 莫雷不排除提前与姚明续约 巨人还值800万合同
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：北京时间12月22日，美国《体育画报》的专家克里斯-马尼克斯今天表示，虽然姚明本赛季报销，不过他仍然是莫雷未来重建的一部分。专家同时表示，姚明有可能提前续约，大约三年的合同800万美元左右。
上赛季没有姚明的情况下，休斯敦火箭队取得42胜40负的成绩，他们自2006年以来首次无缘季后赛，本赛季他们计划姚明回归，肯定能在10-11赛季重返季后赛，但现在这种希望消失了，姚明再一次错过整个赛季，医生发现他的左脚踝出现应力性骨折，姚明将会对脚踝进行第三次手术。
火箭队失去了姚明，这让火箭不用再去考虑他的上场时间了，本赛季姚明上场时间一直不能超过24分钟，医生对他进行了严格的限制，背靠背的比赛也不能出场，火箭在姚明身上医疗设备就花了数十万美元。在莫雷看来，姚明仍然有机率完全康复，他相信这位身高7尺6寸体重310磅的巨人会重新回到赛场上。
“对待姚明的问题上我们不会很天真的，”莫雷说。斯科拉上赛季场均得16.2分，火箭内线高度不够，马丁在外线的攻击力还不足以帮助火箭打进季后赛，火箭现在的阵容还需要姚明。今年夏天布鲁克斯曾经要求续约但遭到拒绝，他们同样没有给巴蒂尔续约，一切都在等姚明的情况，火箭队实际上在为重建做准备，下赛季他们的工资将会从7200万美元下降到4000万美元，因此他们可以有很多选择。
这是不是意味着火箭不想留下姚明呢，“我真不知道我们将来会做什么。”莫雷说。他认为即使没有姚明火箭也可以进入西部季后赛。“我们的目标是总冠军，”莫雷说。“我们需要一位全明星级的球员，姚明一直是最棒的，我们需要球员发挥出最高水平，我们必须要升级。”
莫雷是联盟中最为活跃的总经理，他急于进行各种交易来提升球队的实力，火箭队已经向联盟申请了一个伤病特例约合570万美元的工资空间，他把阿里扎630万美元和安德森的250万美元处理掉，布鲁克斯和巴蒂尔也是合同年，如果他们能够有机会得到安东尼，可能所有球员都可能被交易。
关于姚明的未来呢？他的伤病令未来充满了变数，火箭会继续支持他的，未来几周姚明将会选择手术，火箭会为他提供一切的帮助，帮助姚明恢复。明年7月1日姚明将会成为自由球员，莫雷也正在研究在下赛季续约姚明。“我们认为他和一般的球员不同，”莫雷说。“他是火箭重要的组成部分，我们希望他能继续留在这里，我们需要他在内线做出贡献，我们希望姚明会选择留下。”
随后马尼克斯在微博中透露，火箭不排除在赛季未结束前就会与姚明续，但合同的长度以及金额都不确定，但是莫雷已经表示他们不会放弃姚明的。姚明本赛季在5场比赛中场均上18分钟得10.2分5.4个篮板1.6次封盖，如果他还能继续上场打球，他得到800万的合同应该不是问题，合同时间约在三年左右。

description.hltext_display: new House seat, Utah doesn’t need to team with D.C.
description.content:
The Salt Lake Tribune
Updated 39 minutes ago Updated Dec 22, 2010 12:52AM
Washington • Supporters of the District of Columbia’s long-fought effort to get its own member of Congress found what they thought was a perfect political opportunity a few years back: Team up with Utah, which was still cranky about missing a new member by about 80 residents.
But that pairing — a team effort to add two seats that came close to winning — is now no more.
With news Tuesday that Utah would land a fourth congressional seat because of population growth, the need for the state’s officials to buddy up with the District of Columbia is over.
Utah was a great partner, mainly because of supportive state leaders, federal representatives and the state’s own driving need for another seat, said Ilir Zherka, the executive director of DC Vote who helped craft the deal in the mid-2000s. But he said Tuesday he was on the lookout for a new interested state, one that also missed out on a seat and would want to join the cause of ending what DC Vote calls taxation without representation for the district’s 600,000 residents.
“It does appear that it won’t be Utah” that the district pairs with, Zherka said.
The previous D.C.-Utah measure would have handed both a new seat in a temporarily expanded House and made a political compromise because one seat (the District’s) would likely be held by a Democrat and the other (Utah’s) would likely be held by the GOP.
For now, Utah will claim its new member of Congress in 2012, while the District of Columbia hunts for another willing partner.

description.hltext_display: Runcorn & Widnes Local News: Halton Business and Tourism Awards to take place in February
description.content:
Runcorn and Widnes Weekly News
THE third annual Halton Business and Tourism Awards will take place on February 25 at the Holiday Inn, Runcorn.
The event is a joint venture between Halton Chamber of Commerce and Runcorn and Widnes Tourism and Business Network.
Nominations are invited in the following categories:
Retailer of the Year
Best Contribution to the Environment
Third Sector Organisation of the Year
Entrepreneur of the Year
Business of the Year
A spokesperson said: “The more information you can provide, the more likely your nomination is to get through to the shortlist stage of the process.”
Nominations are open until January 20, when the shortlisting will begin.
The spokesperson added: “The amount of nominations a company receives will not be taken into account when shortlisting, however, the quality of the nominations will.
“Nominations are invited not only from local business, but also from members of the public, there are no restrictions on.
“If you are business owner, director or employee, feel free to nominate your own business, tell us why you deserve recognition.

entity.property: Environment Third Sector Organisation of the Year

description.hltext_display: PublicRecordFinder.com Enables Consumers to Reconnect Over the Holidays
description.content:
PublicRecordFinder.com, a Leading Online Public Records Search Site, Allows Consumers to Reconnect with Lost Loved Ones During the Holiday Season.
Bellevue, WA (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
For many, the Holidays are a magical time made up of family, friends and fond memories and for some, someone near and dear may be missing from their life. The Internet may hold valuable clues to the whereabouts of people who have lost touch with a special person and want to reconnect this holiday season.
Years ago, locating someone required a lot of legwork, some detective skills and a little luck for good measure. Today, there are online tools, sites and services to aide in the process. The key is to get organized, use the right tools and get started sooner rather than later.
It's important to gather together any and all information about the person. Begin with the basics, such as name, birth date, mother's maiden name or last known address. If those details are limited, make a list of anyone who might have knowledge about their whereabouts, such as childhood friends, relatives or old neighbors. Each person on the list may hold an important clue to helping you achieve your goal.
Although search engines or social networks may seem like the obvious place to begin, the volume of information you receive can be overwhelming, unproductive and even discouraging. To bypass quantity and go straight to quality, comprehensive data, utilize public records. Public Records are powerful tools that contain vital information and can unlock available home, work and personal data. Many times, using an email address or phone number can produce valuable insight. With the exception of juvenile files, adoptions and financial records, public information is available for anyone to view. There are consumer resource guides that help consumers become aware of what public records can offer. What once required a trip to the city or county clerk's office is now available at your fingertips from companies that pull this data together, such as PublicRecordFinder (http://www.PublicRecordFinder.com).
For those who may be homeless or do not want to be found, searching could require some serious sleuthing. Since no national database exists for this population, phone skills, patience and ingenuity are important. Check online for a list of shelters, community organizations and churches in the area and track down anyone who may be in contact. Share photographs, create a ‘Missing' poster or consider an ad in a local paper or website online.
Reconnecting with a special someone could be the best gift possible for the holidays, but it may also present challenges and even disappointment. Today's online tools make the process easier than ever before, but it still takes time and patience to undergo a search.
About
Public Record Finder is a leading provider of consumer and enterprise services that enable users to search for and find online public records. Publicrecordfinder.com's Public Records Search provides access for a fee to an instant report that may include phone, date of birth, relatives, address, average home value, marriage/divorce records and more. Its access to more detailed Background Check feature enables users to search individuals to get a complete background summary that includes information from criminal checks, sex offender checks, bankruptcies, contact information, property information and more.
Contact For more information on PublicRecordFinder.com please contact PRFMediaInquiry(at)gmail.com
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebpublicrecordfinder/12/prweb4919374.htm
