description.hltext_display: 海尔无氟变频物联网空调荣膺2010中国家电十大创新产品
description.author: CBSi中国・ZOL
description.content:
本报讯 近年来，在日益同质化的市场竞争中，技术创新已成为全球家电业突破市场瓶颈的关键，以物联网应用为代表的技术创新正成为家电业发展的主要动力，引领世界家电业的发展潮流。近日，在人民网主办的“2010年中国家电行业十大创新产品”的评选中，作为全球首台成功应用物联网技术的空调产品，海尔无氟变频物联网空调凭借物联网与无氟变频两大全球领先技术的融合创新、率先引领智能家居生活的独特优势，在家用空调类产品中唯一荣膺“2010中国家电十大创新产品”大奖。记者从活动现场了解到，海尔无氟变频物联网空调不仅是本次参选中唯一获奖的家用空调产品，也是唯一的物联网家电产品。这表明海尔空调在物联网技术的成功应用，以及智能、节能环保等方面的技术创新实力进一步得到权威认证，当仁不让地成为国内空调业的领跑者。
据悉，人民网主办的此次“2010年中国家电十大创新产品”评选，在活动专家评委进行初步筛选的基础上，以“网友投票”与“卖场销量”作为评选依据。海尔无氟变频物联网空调以其物联网技术创新方面的独有优势，不仅在销售排行上高居榜首，而且赢得了网友和消费者的热捧，从而通过了层层筛选最终获得“2010年中国十大创新家电产品”殊荣。
现场专家指出，海尔空调在物联网技术上的创新是此次成功获选大奖的关键。此款海尔物联网空调不仅通过国际级权威技术鉴定达到国际领先水平，在自主知识产权方面还拥有14项国家专利，这使海尔空调成为中国家电物联网技术应用的佼佼者，也占据了世界空调业的制高点。此外，在今年德国柏林国际电子消费品展览会（IFA）、中国家电协会主办的一系列评比中，此款空调也屡次斩获创新成就大奖。据海尔空调研发工程师介绍，作为全球首家空调企业在物联网技术上的第一次成功应用，此款物联网空调可实现家居远程监控、智能安防、运行管理、服务预警等多重智能操作功能，用户通过遥控手机即可实现人与家电的智慧沟通，远程调节家中空调、24小时视频监控家庭安全，真正实现“身在外，家就在眼前”的舒适智慧生活。此外，海尔此款空调还能实现1分钟速冷、2分钟内速热等即控即热功能，舒适享受快人一步。
据了解，自今年4月份实现全球成功研发、国庆前夕首次在全国同步上市，这款空调新品自上市以来成为中国消费电子市场的最大亮点。由于它为消费者打造了独特智能的室内空气解决方案，以其独特的智能安防功能打破了季节限制，自上市以来广受消费者欢迎，目前已高居国内空调高端市场畅销榜首。
如今，在物联网技术浪潮席卷全球之际，海尔率先推出物联网空调新品领衔全球物联网的技术革命，是中国空调业影响世界的一次创新之举，它为消费者创造了新的智能需求，引领着世界空调产品的消费潮流，持续推进中国空调业的物联网发展之路。

description.hltext_display: 科比被驱逐博伊金斯发飙 湖人负雄鹿创赛季新低
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：在今天进行的NBA常规赛中，卫冕冠军湖人主场迎战雄鹿。结果湖人全场被雄鹿的紧逼防守彻底拖垮，科比最后时刻也不满裁判被驱逐出场，湖人最终79-98不敌雄鹿，以创赛季最低得分的尴尬结束了5连胜。与此同时，雄鹿止住了3连败的势头。
双方四节具体比分为（雄鹿在前）：25-22；25-24；22-20和26-13。替补上场的博伊金斯拿下雄鹿最高的22分，萨尔蒙斯贡献20分6次助攻，伊利亚索夫17分11个篮板，博格特15分8个篮板。湖人方面，科比得到21分，加索尔拿下15分11个篮板，奥多姆得到12分10个篮板6次助攻，湖人其他球员得分都未能达到两位数。
湖人三杰大包大揽难领先
首节一开始双方就展开了一波对攻，博格特篮下连续进攻得手，奥多姆三次冲击篮下打中得分。第一节进行了不到4分半钟，双方的比分就变成了湖人12-15落后。随后科比跳投命中，但湖人此后突然陷入长达3分多钟的得分荒，雄鹿伊利亚索夫独揽6分帮助雄鹿扩大领先优势。整个第一节科比、加索尔和奥多姆包揽了湖人全部得分，第一节结束湖人24-25落后雄鹿。
雄鹿悍将掀反击遏制湖人
第二节雄鹿仅用两分钟就将领先优势扩大到7分，但以香农-布朗和巴恩斯为首的湖人替补突然发力，掀起一波12-2的进攻高潮反超雄鹿3分。萨尔蒙斯强突拜纳姆打三分成功追平比分，湖人换上主力阵容后反被雄鹿再次将比分超出。湖人暂停后加强了内线进攻，拜纳姆和科比轮番篮下得分，雄鹿外线失准领先再次易主。本节末尾阶段，伊利亚索夫远投中的掀起雄鹿一波7-0的进攻。随后科比和阿泰斯特连续强攻篮下，半场结束湖人46-50落后雄鹿4分。
萨尔蒙斯压哨球扩大优势
第三节雄鹿的进攻明显有所停滞，但湖人自身的进攻也没能打出足够的连续性，本节过半湖人仅仅追回了3分分差。伊利亚索夫连续抢下进攻篮板补投不中，科比抓住机会中投反超比分，但萨尔蒙斯马上就回敬三分远投，莫特也跟着跳投两分命中。关键时刻加索尔助攻拜纳姆篮下得分，跟着和科比配合跳投命中扳平比分。无奈雄鹿迅速回应连得5分，萨尔蒙斯最后时刻投中压哨两分，三节过后雄鹿72-66继续保持领先。
博伊金斯耀眼科比遭驱逐
最后一节湖人仍然无法摆脱雄鹿的紧逼防守，香农-布朗连得4分，博伊金斯接着就三分命中遏制湖人反击势头。随后博伊金斯再次三分得手，雄鹿趁机将领先优势扩大到两位数。此后湖人始终没能掀起有效的反击，比赛最后2分多钟，博伊金斯本节个人得分达到11分，郁闷的科比不满裁判被驱逐出场，湖人最终尴尬的输掉了比赛。
雄鹿首发阵容：肯扬-杜林、萨尔蒙斯、莫特、伊利亚索夫、博格特；
湖人首发阵容：费舍尔、科比、阿泰斯特、奥多姆、保罗-加索尔。

description.hltext_display: Johnstown's Brett Insurance Agency Announces an Easier Way to Purchase...
description.content:
Brett Insurance Agency, an insurance agency located in Johnstown Pennsylvania, is proud to announce the launch of their new website and digital marketing campaign.
Brett Insurance Agency has partnered with Astonish Results, LP, a digital marketing and training company for the insurance industry, to create a new online marketing campaign. The Astonish Results marketing strategy has been implemented by Brett Insurance Agency, to help the agency find and keep new customers. Featuring a "Virtual Insurance Office" and "Virtual Insurance Agent," Brett Insurance Agency is confident that its new system will better meet the needs of its clients.
Brettinsurance.com was created to make the experience of online insurance shopping easier. The site is divided into clear categories, making it simple for Pennsylvania insurance shoppers to visit Brettinsurance.com, find the type of insurance they are looking for, and gain a better understanding of their policy options. If you have questions about Home Insurance, Auto Insurance, Business Insurance, or any type of insurance you may need, Brettinsurance.com has answers. Brett Insurance Agency also provides current and prospective customers with ways to contact the agency at any time by filling out a form or calling 877.683.1336.
About Brett Insurance Agency:
Brett Insurance Agency is an independent Pennsylvania insurance agency that has been providing quality insurance coverage paired with courteous professional customer service for over 90 years. They are committed to designing insurance plans that are specially suited to their customers' needs. Through their partnership with Keystone and strong relationships with top insurance companies, Brett Insurance Agency is able to find the most competitively priced insurance coverage for their customers. Brett Insurance Agency is a fixture in the Johnstown community not only for their quality insurance coverage and superior customer service but also by participating in and sponsoring local events like Johnstown's annual Thunder in the Valley Motorcycle Rally.
For more information on Brett Insurance Agency visit http://www.Brettinsurance.com.

description.hltext_display: Affordable wines for holiday feasting
description.author: gstimme@thestar.ca (Gord Stimmell
description.content:
Grand Gaillard 2009 Sauvignon Blanc $13 (France).
With holiday entertaining in mind, we have Ogio for getting the party started, the Grand Gaillard for serving with Christmas turkey or shellfish dishes, and for elegant dining with friends, the Casa Cab. The Casa is from Casa Lapostolle in the Colchagua Valley of Chile, founded by Alexandra Marnier Lapostolle, of the Grand Marnier family. She single-handedly built up the winery in the early 1990s, and is now world famous for her Cuvée Alexandre series and her cult red flagship wine, Clos Apalta ($99).
Ogio 2009 Pinot Grigio $8.85 (Italy)
Sourced from Venezie, this presents pure anjou pear, marshmallow and lime aromas. The flavours echo the pear, with fresh apple, lime squeezings and lemon drop. The finish is decent, with the lemony pear coming to the forefront. A best buy, with quite friendly balancing acidity.
LCBO# 86199
Food suggestion: Hors d’oeuvres, hard cheeses
Rating: 88
Grand Gaillard 2009 Sauvignon Blanc $13 (France)
From the Bergerac appellation, this shows pleasant lemon, lime and bin apple aromas at first and a hint of gooseberry as it warms. The flavours are very citrus infused, with lots of lemon and lime leading to a very dry, minerally, limestone finish. Think seafood and shellfish.
LCBO# 168500
Food suggestion: Wine-poached mussels
Rating: 88+
Casa 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon $15.95 (Chile)
At last, a General List wine from the Casa Lapostolle winery. The aromas swirl with blackberry, smoky cedar, sage, vanilla and blackpepper accents. The flavours present full bore black cherry, blueberry and spicy black fruit. Quite rich, with very persistent length. A welcome entry.
LCBO# 168732
Food suggestion: Prime rib roast

description.hltext_display: Manufacturing in Mexico: Part 2 in a 3-Part News Series
description.content:
Great Things are Happening -- The advantages of conducting business in Mexico
Nogales, AZ (Vocus) December 22, 2010
Collectron International Management's Shelter Program is dedicated to assisting global manufacturers in establishing operations in Sonora, Mexico. Collectron is Mexico's original Shelter Plan, with more than 40 years experience in the management of all details required to secure Mexican business permits, customize site selection, recruit well-trained personnel and assist in compliance with environmental rules and regulations.
“The Mexican government offers unique programs and incentives to potential manufacturing partners, particularly in high tech manufacturing fields,” says Maria Elena Rigoli, President of Collectron. Supported by the local, state and federal governments of Mexico, Collectron has helped more than 200 companies start up and operate their maquiladora operations in Mexico in such areas as electronics, medical devices, aerospace, moulding and plastics, automotive, and communication devices.
According to consulting firm AlixPartners, Mexico currently offers the lowest manufacturing costs among Brazil, China and India. Mexico's proximity to the U.S. offers the cost- and time-saving advantages of near-shoring as opposed to offshore outsourcing in China or India. Manufacturing along the northern border of Mexico (Sonora) offers immediate access to the United States through the Port of Nogales along with the availability of U.S. major transportation companies.
In addition, manufacturing in Mexico offers the strategic advantage of being located in one of the world's largest developing economies with a work force skilled in high-tech manufacturing. Mexico also offers the advantage of free trade agreements with more than 32 countries.
Furthermore, Collectron understands that the most important asset of a business is their intellectual property. Mexico's legal system enforces intellectual property rights through civil remedies conforming with NAFTA requirements of legal standards familiar to North America thus making a much better manufacturing choice over China.
Collectron (http://www.collectron.com) also understands that the equation for manufacturing profitability has become more complex in recent years. The focus on cost of labor has evolved, and Collectron offers the experience and expertise to help companies successfully implement a broader strategy of Lean Manufacturing. Mexico's contiguity with the United States makes Just-in-Time production possible along with reduced shipping costs compared to off-shoring.
Collectron's Maquiladora Shelter Program offers multiple resources including special customs status and duty-free imports on all production-related machinery, equipment, materials and components produced in North America and covered by NAFTA. Collectron also provides import/export management, guidance and representation for environmental and labor compliance, customized site selection and staffing, on-going human resource administration and more. Combined, these benefits offer reduced costs throughout the entire project.
Collectron invites you to review the video testimonials from corporate executives who have chosen to use their services at http://www.collectron.com. Tripp Hindle of Hitran Corporation (http://www.collectron.com/testimonials/90-testimonial-tripp) sums up his company's satisfaction by saying, “We've come here and with the help of a company like Collectron we've been very successful. Mexico is open for business – there's no question about it.”
“Collectron is about business, but we're about people, too,” says Maria Elena. “I believe in the power of good people and I believe in the benefits of working together to continue to forge a positive and productive relationship between global companies. Working together, we will continue to take constructive steps forward, not just in the manufacturing industry, but far beyond that.”
For tours, interviews and photos with Collectron President, Maria Elena Rigoli, please call the contact numbers above.
About Collectron (http://www.collectron.com) Collectron International Management, Inc. is the original Maquiladora Shelter Plan Program Provider. Collectron operates in the USA and Mexico. The Nogales Port, recognized as the best-operated port in the United States, is the port which Collectron uses with companies worldwide. Collectron's Shelter Plan Program allows manufacturers to test Mexican productivity and product cost savings before committing to incorporating in Mexico and forming a Mexican subsidiary. The Shelter Plan simplifies launching and running a maquiladora operation and eliminates long-term commitments, costly expenditures and lengthy start-up schedules. Collectron's Shelter Plan services include U.S./Mexican customs documentation services, assistance with Mexican business permits and Mexican environmental agency compliance, aid in site selection and construction, recruitment of manufacturing, technical and managerial personnel, on-site personnel administration, payroll and accounting services, general contracting for expansions and more. A pioneer in the maquiladora industry, Collectron has helped more than 200 companies start up and operate their maquiladora plants in Mexico since 1969. Visit http://www.collectron.com.
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4919424.htm

Mexico is open for business ? there's no question about it.? ?Collectron is about business, but we're about people, too,?

description.hltext_display: For The Love Of Sport
description.content:
» 0 Comments | Post a Comment
Jackson couple Chad Wicker and Jennifer Llanto are engaged and due to be married in March 2011. On January 1, their repsective colleges are going head-to-head in the Gator Bowl.
Chad went to Mississippi State and Jennifer went to the University of Michigan. Chad says Jennifer has to ring a cowbell if MSU wins. He wants his fiance to realize that MSU is located in Starkville and not just in East Lansing.
"When you say MSU, she still thinks Michigan State," said Wicker.
"I do, I do," replied Llanto. But why would Jennifer think MSU represents Mississippi State, afterall, both her parents and brother went to Michigan State.
There's more irony. Two of Chad's groomsmen are from Jacksonvill, Florida; the host site this years Gator Bowl.

event_or_fact.property: When you say MSU, she still thinks Michigan State
Jennifer has to ring a cowbell if MSU wins

description.hltext_display: MCCARTHY CREATES NON-TOXIC BABY BEDDING
description.content: (PR-inside.com) Model-turned-actress JENNY MCCARTHY is helping to put new mums at ease - by launching her own range of eco-friendly crib bedding. The star's Too Good line features all-cotton sheets, blankets, rugs and hampers and all materials used are non-toxic. McCarthy admits she was inspired to create the collection because she was well aware of the fears she faced as she brought up her son Evan, eight. She tells Us Weekly, "I was psychotic about keeping my house clean, so I wanted items without harsh chemicals." ..

description.hltext_display: Realitní magnát Serge Borenstein rozprodává projekty a není v tom sám
description.content:
Pan Karlín, realitní magnát - takovými přízvisky byl v době boomu označován Serge Borenstein, spolumajitel a šéf developerské Karlin Group. Jeho vizionářské sny o přeměně této městské části se kvůli krizi rozplývají. Podobně jako další pražský realitní magnát Luděk Sekyra, i Borenstein je nucen prodávat své developerské projekty, aby mohl splácet své dluhy a financovat další výstavbu.
"Dnes rozhodně není nejlepší doba prodávat, ale je docela těžké získat od banky zdroje financování," řekl HN Borenstein s tím, že získané prostředky developer použije na splacení závazků a investice do dalších projektů. Karlin Group letos podle něho prodala tři projekty v Praze-Karlíně dohromady za 800 milionů korun a jedná o prodeji dalších tří.
"Banky obecně deklarují, že jsou připraveny financovat developerské projekty, ale podmínky se významně liší od toho, na co byli developeři zvyklí před rokem 2009," uvedl Zbyněk Buš, ředitel v oddělení Transakce a restrukturalizace v poradenské firmě KPMG Česká republika. Zvýšily se požadavky na předprodej bytů a předpronájem obchodních prostor. Tento podíl může u kanceláří dosahovat výše až 60 procent, dodal Buš.
Vysoké požadavky bank na předjednaný pronájem obchodních ploch a rezervaci bytů ještě předtím, než se kopne do země, trápí i Borensteina. "Lidé dnes byty na papíře nechtějí kupovat," říká Borenstein.
Podle Petra Merežka z České spořitelny se však od počátku krize podmínky financování projektů "změnily pro developery k lepšímu."
Dříve měla podle něho Spořitelna nejnižší hranici na předpronájem a předprodej 40 procent, dnes je to 35 procent.
Letos se v Praze začalo stavět zhruba 10 kancelářských budov a až na výjimky si je developeři financují svépomocí. Karlin Group je však nucen je prodávat. Příští rok chce začít stavět v Karlíně kanceláře a podle situace na trhu také zhruba dvě stovky bytů, jež budou součástí rezidenční čtvrti River Gardens. V projektu má vzniknout asi 900 bytů.
Zmíněné tři karlínské projekty, kterých se Karlin Group zbavuje, jsou kancelářský projekt River Gardens West, před několika týdny prodal bývalou tovární halu ČKD a v průběhu ledna se má podepsat prodej rozestavěné administrativní budovy Keystone.
Developer vyjednává prodej dalších tzv. projektů na papíře. Jedná se o administrativní budovu Corso IIB, další projekt s kancelářemi na Thámově ulici a část rezidenčního projektu River Gardens se zhruba 150 byty.
V pražských Modřanech jedná se dvěma skupinami o případném vytvoření joint venture. Prodejem již dokončených budov získal na financování dalších projektů finance nejnověji developer Finep.
800 milionů korun
zhruba tolik Karlin Group získá za tři projekty, které letos doposud prodal. Jedná se o projekt kanceláří River Garden West, halu ČKD a rozestavěnou administrativní budovu Keystone. Všechny se nacházejí v Praze-Karlíně. Uzavření transakce budovy Keystone se očekává v lednu.

description.hltext_display: 与太阳竞争季后赛
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：北京时间12月22日凌晨，《休斯顿纪事报》专栏作家理查德－贾斯提斯发表一篇文章，对火箭队的近况进行了简评：
在最近一段时间的比赛里，火箭队很好地向外界证明了一点，那就是这支球队并没有垮掉，他们已经以正确的方式登上航船，自从赛季之初5胜12负之后，最近他们已经是11战取得8胜3负的战绩，现在的他们正在逐步回到季后赛球队的竞争球队行列当中，目前火箭队的战绩为13胜15负，距离西部排名第八的开拓者队（15胜14负）已经越来越近。
火箭队在两个客场接连取得胜利之后，他们在1月29日晚回到主场迎战强大的热火队之前还有一场客场比赛对阵胜率低于五成的球队。火箭队在1月份的赛程会比较艰难，也许有可能到最后会是由火箭队与太阳队争夺最后一个西部联盟的季后赛名额。
火箭队在12月份的比赛当中除了赛程相对比较轻松之外，他们还碰到的一个有利因素是他们的好多对手都出现了伤病情况而有重要球员缺席比赛，这使得他们的比赛更加好打一些。不过，火箭队自己的阵容深度也在很大程度上帮助了他们自己，现在的火箭队经常在比赛当中使用两套完全不一样的阵容迎战对手，火箭队经常在比赛当中采取先发五人在一起配合，然后换上五个完全不一样的人员打第二阵容，与对手展开周旋。
火箭主帅阿德尔曼在调教年轻球员方面确实有一套，他此前一直把这项工作排在比较重要的位置，正是这一做法让火箭队受益，他们正在进入一个全新的时代，乔丹－希尔最近一段时间里的迅速成长进步就是一个典型例子。
火箭总经理达利尔－莫雷希望在未来几周时间里获得一名能够在低位有一定威慑力的球员，这一点是值得大家关注的。另外，再看看阿德尔曼如何在洛瑞和布鲁克斯之间分配角色和出场时间也会是很有意思的一个看点，还有一点值得我们关注的是，阿德尔曼如何在现有阵容的轮换当中挤出时间让特伦斯－威廉姆斯获得出场表现的机会。
不管怎么说，火箭队最近打得不错总归是令人高兴的，虽然火箭队现在在比赛当中也有出现断电的现象，但是这种断电现象持续的时间已经不像赛季之初那么长了，而且在暂时断电之后，火箭队经常会很快醒悟过来，火箭队的球迷们现在可以不用像赛季之初那样提心吊胆地看比赛了。

description.hltext_display: Un ministre britannique va-t-en-guerre se fait piéger
description.author: Cyrille Vanlerberghe
description.content:
«.» Avec ces quelques mots, le ministre du Commerce Vince Cable a plongé le gouvernement de coalition britannique dans un bel embarras. Le ministre libéral-démocrate, de facto numéro deux de Nick Clegg au sein de la coalition s'est fait piéger par deux journalistes du Daily Telegraph. Elles se sont fait passer pour des militantes libdems lors de la permanence qu'assure le député dans sa circonscription au sud-ouest de Londres.
Le dérapage de Vince Cable est d'autant plus grave que News Corporation, le groupe de Rupert Murdoch, s'efforce de racheter la totalité de l'opérateur de télévision par satellite BSkyB, une opération d'au moins 9 milliards d'euros qui ne peut se faire sans le feu vert du ministre du Commerce. Le très populaire Vince Cable a déjà compliqué la tentative de rachat de Sky par Murdoch en exigeant le mois dernier l'examen du dossier par l'autorité britannique de régulation des télécoms, en plus de l'autorisation demandée à Bruxelles en vertu des règles antimonopole. Il n'aura plus l'occasion de sévir, David Cameron vient de confier ce dossier au ministre de la Culture et des Médias.
Murdoch est un sujet très sensible au sein de la coalition. Lors de la dernière campagne électorale, David Cameron et les conservateurs avaient obtenu le soutien déclaré des grands titres du groupe News Corp., dont le Times et le Sun, alors que les libdems étaient régulièrement ridiculisés par les tabloïds du groupe.
Mardi, le Parti travailliste a demandé à ce que Vince Cable se retire immédiatement du processus de décision lié au rachat de BSkyB car son «impartialité était remise en cause». Des analystes faisaient remarquer mardi que les propos du ministre exposaient le gouvernement à une action en justice intentée par News Corporation en cas de décision défavorable.
Le premier article publié mardi matin par le Daily Telegraph sur les propos de Cable exposait au grand jour , mais ne mentionnait pas la sortie contre Murdoch. L'information n'a été révélée qu'en fin d'après-midi par la BBC, qui a reçu copie de l'enregistrement grâce à un contact au sein du journal.
Avec une grande franchise, Vince Cable expliquait que des désaccords très forts existaient au gouvernement sur des sujets aussi importants que la récente réforme des frais d'entrée à l'université, les quotas d'immigration ou encore le contrôle des bonus des banquiers. Pour tenter de convaincre ses interlocuteurs conservateurs, le dernier recours est «l'arme nucléaire», , a-t-il raconté aux deux journalistes travaillant sous-couvert. Lors de leur conférence de presse commune mardi au 10 Downing Street, le premier ministre, David Cameron, et le vice-premier ministre, Nick Clegg, ont fait front commun pour affirmer que la coalition est aussi solide que jamais. «Dans une coalition organisée par deux partis différents, il est normal qu'on ne soit pas d'accord sur tout, a expliqué Cameron. Si nous étions d'accord sur tout, nous serions dans le même parti ! Notre rôle est de discuter de ces sujets en privé pour arriver au meilleur accord possible pour le pays.» (Daily Telegraph, en anglais) (Daily Telegraph, en anglais) (Daily Telegraph, en anglais)

description.hltext_display: 既婚男性を誘うのって・・・ - たかられてるんじゃ？
description.content:
主人（５０代）は年に数回、10年ほど前に勤めていた会社の同僚女性数名（40代で結婚している方・していない方がいるようです）に誘われて飲みに出かけます。
声がかかる男性は主人一人です。
最初は、「結婚して地方に行った人が、東京に出てくるから久々に会ってくる」と言っていたので、特に何も思わずにいたのですが、今では定例会の様になっています。
私は、結婚してから男性の友人や元同僚とは出かけることはありませんし、女友達と飲みに行く時でも「懐かしいし、会いたいね」とは思っても
奥さんのいる友人に声をかけようとは思いません。奥さんが、必ずしも快く思ってくれるとは限らないと感じているからです。
仕事をしている人は、様々な付き合いがあるのであれもこれもダメとは言いたくありませんが、懐かしい仲間とはいえ女性グループの飲み会に既婚男性を
一人だけ誘うというのはどうでしょう？奥さんはどう思うかしら？などとは考えないのかしら？「やきもち」と言われれば、そうなのかもしれませんが・・・。
考え方の違いなのか、私の心の狭さなのか・・・

“富美绿装硒鼓终生以旧换新的具体操作细则分为两种：
一、首次购买式终生以旧换新：用户首先按既定的市场零售价购买某一型号富美硒鼓，用完后即可凭该空硒鼓并按既定以旧换新价支付相应款项后，置换同型号的富美正品硒鼓，如此往复，不限次数；
二、空硒鼓置换式以旧换新：用户若执有国际品牌厂家的一手空硒鼓，则可按上述规则直接进入“终生以旧换新”程序，而无须首先按市场零售价购买富美硒鼓。”富美公司副总裁、党委书记邵光锦详细解读“终生以旧换新”政策。 富美绿装硒鼓的“终生以旧换新”，是对营销模式的变革，但最终的目的是为用户提供优质的产品和服务，全心全意为用户服务。狠省钱

description.hltext_display: Former gubernatorial candidate from Dover seeks state GOP chair
description.content:
@Cutline nameline:Jack Kimball
DOVER — Former candidate for governor Jack Kimball is making a run for state Republican Party chairman, and he considers himself a good candidate for the job.
His official announcement Monday reflects confidence in his ability to "do well" in the position, bringing to the table years of experience as a business executive and two decades as a New Hampshire resident.
When reached Tuesday, Kimball said he was motivated to run for the job of retiring Chairman John H. Sununu after receiving encouragement from supporters.
"It was not something that was on my radar, but I got a lot of calls from state reps and they just wanted me to consider that," he said.
Kimball made a bid for governor in the recent election but lost in the primary against John Stephen.
"I'm a businessman and not a politician," he said, echoing one of his platform phrases during the elections. "I bring that business ethic and I bring organizational skills. I've been an executive for 40 years so I know how to do that."
In a recent letter to the NHGOP's Executive Committee announcing his retirement, Sununu cited qualifications for the next chairman that would help keep the Republican Party strong after several years of limited power.
He suggested the next chairman have a "real commitment" to conservative Republican principles and the willingness to make the required commitment of time and effort, as well as being able to make the fundraising effort to run the party.
Also stressed was the ability to be solely focused on the well-being of the party "without the distraction of personal political considerations."
Kimball doesn't hesitate in his assertion that he fits the bill.
"I would establish strong relationships within the party and make sure I'm a strong bridge between the new folks and those that have been in the trenches for a long time," he said, adding he will "keep fundraising strong."
As for being distracted by other political considerations? Kimball said his bid for GOP chair "precludes" any other run for office.
"I don't know what the future will bring," he said, "but if I do as well as I think I'll do, I might just hang in for two additional seats."
In addition to Kimball, Cheshire County Republican Chair Juliana Bergeron is a declared candidate, and Derry Republican Town Committee Chair Jim Foley is undecided.
James Sununu, son of former GOP Chair John Sununu, recently dropped out of the race, as did Jennifer Horn, a former congressional candidate for the 2nd district.
Sununu has yet to make an endorsement in the race.
GOP Communications Director Ryan Williams said Tuesday the party is really looking for a good manager to continue the efforts made to bolster the party's success.
"We've increased staffing levels so we can go toe to toe with the Democratic machine, so we need a chairman who can run the party efficiently and, most importantly, raise needed funds," Williams said. "The last thing we want is to go back to when it was underfunded and ineffective. Obviously people are looking at that criteria and deciding who is the best candidate going forward."
Kimball praised Sununu's work, saying he admires Sununu for coming back on the scene and working hard to reestablish the party.
"I think it's my responsibility if I'm elected to prove to all the parties that I can perform this job," he said.
The election of party officers is slated for Jan. 22 in Derry.

description.hltext_display: Solar System for iPad Raises the Bar (Again) for Electronic Books
description.content:
Solar System for iPad, the much-anticipated new title from Touch Press (publisher of The Elements) and Faber and Faber, is a breakthrough interactive book, created to inform and inspire people about our nearby astronomical neighborhood, presenting a wealth of spectacular imagery received from robot spacecraft. The title combines stunning fully manipulable 3D realizations of the planets and moons with an intelligent specially written text by best-selling Faber author and former radio astronomer Marcus Chown. Illuminating his insightful and surprising text are a wealth of beautiful 3D objects, movies, images, animations, and diagrams, all fully interactive, richly detailed and accurately based on real scientific data.
Champaign, Illinois and London, England (Vocus) December 22, 2010
Solar System for iPad, the first publication to emerge from the recently announced partnership between� Faber and Faber and Touch Press, is available today worldwide to download from the Apple iTunes App Store.
Eight months in development, and with a production budget approaching 1 trillion dollars (if you count location filming by NASA),� Solar System for iPad� sets a new standard for interactive books. The title combines stunning fully manipulable 3D realizations of the planets and moons with an intelligent specially written text by best-selling Faber author and former CalTech radio astronomer Marcus Chown.
This new electronic book follows on from� The Elements, the runaway best seller published by Touch Press to coincide with the launch of the iPad. Over 160,000 copies have now been sold, and The Elements has just won a place in the forthcoming Brit Insurance Designs of the Year 2011 exhibition at the London Design Museum.
Theodore Gray, creator of The Elements, comments, "What sets Solar System for iPad apart� more than anything is that it is not just an app or reference guide or tour, it's a real honest-to-goodness book you can sit down and read."
Like The Elements, the new title includes a song that plays once on the very first launch. This haunting and majestic track has been specially adapted by Björk from her forthcoming� Biophilia� project and for the moment is available only in� Solar System for iPad.
Notes to Editors:
Touch Press is a new digital publishing company based in London, UK and Champaign, Illinois, USA. It is led by its founding team:
Theodore Gray is the co-founder of Wolfram Research, Inc., creator of the Mathematica notebook interface, and a columnist for Popular Science magazine since 2003. His most recent books, Theo Gray's Mad Science: Experiments You Can Do at Home—But Probably Shouldn't and The Elements: A Visual Exploration of Every Known Atom in the Universe, were published in 2009 to wide acclaim.
Max Whitby is a multiple-BAFTA-award-winning former BBC producer. He brings to the team decades of experience in film and television production and in the design and delivery of interactive media. His science company RGB Research Ltd is based in London.
Stephen Wolfram is a renowned scientist, founder and CEO of Wolfram Research, Inc., creator of both Mathematica and the Wolfram|Alpha computational knowledge engine, and author of A New Kind of Science.
Touch Press is developing a series of electronic titles in science, technology, popular culture, and the arts. Partners include Wolfram Alpha LLC, Wolfram Research, Inc., Faber and Faber, and Chicago University Press. Wolfram Alpha LLC is the creator of the Wolfram|Alpha computational knowledge engine. Its parent company, Wolfram Research, is a software company founded in 1987 that is the creator and developer of Mathematica.
Screenshots are available.
Mathematica is a trademark of Wolfram Research, Inc.
Wolfram|Alpha is a trademark of Wolfram Alpha LLC.
Apple is a trademark of Apple, Inc.
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebSolarSystemforiPad/TouchPress/prweb4919514.htm

description.hltext_display: 曝火箭欲提前续约姚明 年薪800万
description.content:
东方网12月22日消息：北京时间12月22日，美国《体育画报》的专家克里斯-马尼克斯今天表示，虽然姚明本赛季报销，不过他仍然是莫雷未来重建的一部分。专家同时表示，姚明有可能提前续约，大约三年的合同800万美元左右。
上赛季没有姚明的情况下，休斯敦火箭队取得42胜40负的成绩，他们自2006年以来首次无缘季后赛，本赛季他们计划姚明回归，肯定能在10-11赛季重返季后赛，但现在这种希望消失了，姚明再一次错过整个赛季，医生发现他的左脚踝出现应力性骨折，姚明将会对脚踝进行第三次手术。
火箭队失去了姚明，这让火箭不用再去考虑他的上场时间了，本赛季姚明上场时间一直不能超过24分钟，医生对他进行了严格的限制，背靠背的比赛也不能出场，火箭在姚明身上医疗设备就花了数十万美元。在莫雷看来，姚明仍然有机率完全康复，他相信这位身高7尺6寸体重310磅的巨人会重新回到赛场上。
“对待姚明的问题上我们不会很天真的，”莫雷说。斯科拉上赛季场均得16.2分，火箭内线高度不够，马丁在外线的攻击力还不足以帮助火箭打进季后赛，火箭现在的阵容还需要姚明。今年夏天布鲁克斯曾经要求续约但遭到拒绝，他们同样没有给巴蒂尔续约，一切都在等姚明的情况，火箭队实际上在为重建做准备，下赛季他们的工资将会从7200万美元下降到4000万美元，因此他们可以有很多选择。
这是不是意味着火箭不想留下姚明呢，“我真不知道我们将来会做什么。”莫雷说。他认为即使没有姚明火箭也可以进入西部季后赛。“我们的目标是总冠军，”莫雷说。“我们需要一位全明星级的球员，姚明一直是最棒的，我们需要球员发挥出最高水平，我们必须要升级。”
莫雷是联盟中最为活跃的总经理，他急于进行各种交易来提升球队的实力，火箭队已经向联盟申请了一个伤病特例约合570万美元的工资空间，他把阿里扎630万美元和安德森的250万美元处理掉，布鲁克斯和巴蒂尔也是合同年，如果他们能够有机会得到安东尼，可能所有球员都可能被交易。
关于姚明的未来呢？他的伤病令未来充满了变数，火箭会继续支持他的，未来几周姚明将会选择手术，火箭会为他提供一切的帮助，帮助姚明恢复。明年7月1日姚明将会成为自由球员，莫雷也正在研究在下赛季续约姚明。“我们认为他和一般的球员不同，”莫雷说。“他是火箭重要的组成部分，我们希望他能继续留在这里，我们需要他在内线做出贡献，我们希望姚明会选择留下。”
随后马尼克斯在微博中透露，火箭不排除在赛季未结束前就会与姚明续，但合同的长度以及金额都不确定，但是莫雷已经表示他们不会放弃姚明的。姚明本赛季在5场比赛中场均上18分钟得10.2分5.4个篮板1.6次封盖，如果他还能继续上场打球，他得到800万的合同应该不是问题，合同时间约在三年左右。

description.hltext_display: 家用无线首选！双飞燕7200套装超值卖
description.content:
这款双飞燕7200套装使用了2.4G无线技术，双向通讯设计，抗干扰性强。与键鼠配对的接收器也是迷你设计，仅有USB接口大小，很容易与电脑融合在一起，此外，USB接口也经镀金处理，抗氧化性更强。创新的“独创数字键具鼠标功能，躺着也能操控光标”，不仅如此，双飞燕7200还配备了多个多媒体快捷键，更一步加大的操作的方便。 双飞燕7200无线套鼠标使用了高品质的G7630，2.4GHz无线传输技术，三段可调响应时间设计，主动跳频防干扰技术，2.4G双向通信技术，更换电池无需重新对码，右键8雕和电余量显示等功能已经历过市场考验，自上市以来一直受到广大用户的好评。 双飞燕7200无线套鼠标使用了符合人体工程学的左高右低造型，在鼠标的左下方有一凹槽，大拇指可以放置于此，这样的设计使用户在长时间使用后仍然不会感到疲劳。 银灰色顶面光滑细腻，而两侧则有明显的磨砂质感，再搭配适合手型的内凹式外形，把握时会更舒适。鼠标外观简洁，左右键按动起来声音清脆，回弹很快，弹性也较强，滚轮旋动的阻尼不大，段落感很密集，滚轮键硬度也不大，而且软性橡胶材料手感也不错。 键盘特别打造了圆角结构键帽，能够很好地包裹手指，稳妥舒适，有效的增加敲击手感。按键键程适中，按键极富弹性，百分百品质按键优质触感，按键声音小，是您在长时间操作时也不会感到疲劳。键盘键帽采用先进的激光镭雕技术，字体俊秀，有效避免了手部汗液对按键字符的腐蚀，提高的键盘的使用寿命。 键盘左右两侧各有5个多功能媒体键，从左至右依次为主页、E-mail、计算机、多媒体播放、我的电脑、播放/暂停、上一首、下一首、音量+、音量-，快捷键的加入使您操作更方便，畅游网络更轻松。 键盘采用全新的数字键区，在连按 Num Lock键后，数字键区即可具备鼠标功能。轻易执行鼠标指针的方向移动、左右键、滚轮等功能。使键盘与鼠标合二为一，操作更方便、更快捷。 独特的数字键盘鼠标功能拓展了键盘的功能，远距离操作不再受限与鼠标。此外，拥有双飞燕的零延迟技术，即使是在游戏中也难以察觉到延迟，再加上无需配码和极强的抗干扰能力，性能不弱于普通有线套装，无论是商务办公还是居家使用都是不错的选择。
双飞燕7200无线套装
[商家报价] 148元
[推荐商家] 双飞燕e世界专卖店A4528-4529
[联系电话] 010-62682287

description.hltext_display: Za realitním obchodem roku za 1,8 miliardy stojí CPI Group
description.content:
Včera byl v Praze podepsán obchod roku na českém trhu realitních investic. Developerská společnost Finep Holding prodala investiční a realitní skupině CPI Group Radovana Vítka za 1,8 miliardy korun dvě kancelářské budovy v Praze-Stodůlkách.
"Obchodní jednání s CPI probíhala několik měsíců. Na obou stranách jsme si uvědomovali, že finančním rozsahem této transakce stanovujeme nové tržní ceny," řekl Tomáš Pardubický, generální ředitel Finep Holding.
Srovnatelně velkou transakcí, jež byla oznámena letos v květnu, je prodej výškové budovy City Empiria a přilehlé City Forum v Praze-Pankráci developera ECM Real Estate Investments. Za 71,5 milionu eur komplex získala skupina Generali PPF Holding. V případě City Empiria se však jedná o starší administrativní budovu bývalého Motokovu, která prošla rekonstrukcí.
Včerejší akvizice dvou budov, ve kterých má dlouhodobou nájemní smlouvu podepsanou technologická firma Siemens, podle odborníků dokazuje, že se ze Stodůlek stává zavedená kancelářská lokalita.
"Doposud byl letošek ve znamení menších obchodů. Tento obchod představuje návrat velkých transakcí na český trh, před půl rokem by investoři nebyli ochotni tolik zaplatit," uvedl James Chapman, partner a vedoucí investičního oddělení v realitně-poradenské společnosti Cushman & Wakefield. Administrativní komplex City West developera Finep bude mít po dokončení sedm budov s pronajímatelnou plochou 100 000 metrů čtverečních.

description.hltext_display: 邓华德视上海为自己故乡
description.content:
东方网记者屠佳时12月22日报道：临近圣诞了，不少在CBA打拼的外援和外籍教练都会在这个时候想起美国的家，也算是人之常情。不过昨天上海男篮公开训练后，当记者问起邓华德，想不想远在美国的家，邓华德却笑着表示，自己的家就在这里。“如果接下来我们去吉林和辽宁打客场，我也许会想家，可现在我就在家里。”
显然邓华德已经把上海当做自己的故乡，亚运会期间，上海发生火灾时，邓华德也曾在发布会上说过自己的家乡受了难，感觉非常伤心。“我就是个上海人。”邓华德说。

description.hltext_display: Soliant Consulting Launches Revolutionary Productivity App
description.content:
Award-Winning Software Development Firm Announces Release of BORDS™, First-Ever Consumer Product Offering
Chicago, IL (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
Soliant Consulting, Inc. today announced the launch of BORDS™, a unique mobile creative-productivity application for the Apple iPad. BORDS is the first foray into the consumer mobile app market for Soliant, a leading developer of customized software for business improvement and workgroup collaboration.
Unlike other apps on the market, BORDS fosters both creativity and organization in a way that is intuitive on a completely personal level to the user. With whiteboard and sticky note functionality combined, BORDS brings organization to the creative process, while also introducing a creative touch to any organization project.
“One of the critical things we've witnessed consistently over the years in our collaborative development process is how individuals approach brainstorming differently,” said Scott Love, Soliant Consulting's chief operating officer. “BORDS grew out of the idea that everyone should have the ability to maximize their creative energy and do it in an organized fashion. We couldn't be more thrilled with how BORDS delivers against that original insight while leveraging the strengths of the iPad platform.“
Productivity apps are growing in popularity and several offerings are available featuring either whiteboard functions or sticky note functions. BORDS, for the first time, brings those functions together, in essence, establishing a new app category: creative productivity.
During the development of BORDS, Soliant took great care to imbed functions that mimic how sticky notes and whiteboards are used in real life, while also compensating for their limitations. Here are just a few of the many unique actions that BORDS enables: Write, Stack & Search Notes—Not only does BORDS allow you to write notes featuring different styles and colors, but it also allows you to group your notes in organized stacks and retrieve them easily for review. Unlike popular sticky note applications, BORDS gives you infinite note-writing capabilities due to its organizing functions. Freestyle Drawing, Freestyle Thinking—BORDS taps the inherent simplicity of the iPad and makes whiteboard-style brainstorming easy and productive. When combined with note writing, stacking and template functions, BORDS unleashes your ability to think, create and organize without boundaries. Create Without the Shackles of a Computer—BORDS makes a wide variety of objects and shapes readily available to you to manipulate in any way you can imagine. Lines with end points, perfect circles, triangles and more can be drawn impeccably so BORDS lets your ideas look just as perfect on your iPad as they do in your head. Email as PDF or Image—BORDS allows you to share your documents with others, and in version 1.1 will support printing as well. BORDS will sell for $4.99 and is available exclusively through the Apple App Store (http://www.itunes.com/apps/bords).
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebSoliantConsultingBords/201012/prweb4919524.htm

description.hltext_display: 13寸便携炫彩本!东芝L630-08R仅4599
description.content:
对于女性消费者来说，东芝 Satellite L630-08R笔记本绝对是个不错的选择。时尚纤薄的造型配合膜内转印技术、内蕴光华的罗马纹设计，在尽显潮流本色的同时，又不失高雅气质。而配置方面也属主流，配备13.3英寸高清炫彩屏，搭载全新的英特尔酷睿i3处理器，足矣满足用户的日常需求。
外观方面，东芝L630-08R采用了精美时尚的外观设计，机身采用纯白配色，引入膜转印技术的同时还将内蕴光华的罗马纹理相结合，复古之余不失时尚感。该机采用了一块13.3英寸的16:9LED背光屏，最佳分辨率为1366×768，显示效果出色。键盘方面，该机搭配全尺寸巧克力键盘，使用起来更加舒适，经过磨砂处理的触摸板手感也非常好。机身尺寸为329×221×28-37mm，重量为2.2Kg，十分便携。
配置方面，东芝L630-08R采用Intel 酷睿双核i3-350M处理器，有2.26GHz的主频和3M的缓存，标配2G DDR3 1066规格的内存和320G的硬盘，，内置DVD刻录机。显卡方面采用ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5145独显，拥有512M的显存，支持DX 10.1游戏特效，游戏性能不俗。同时还内置有百兆网卡和802.11b/g/n无线网卡并预装Microsoft windows7 Home Basic 家庭普通版操作系统。
东芝L630-08R是一款专为MM们量身订做的时尚本，烈焰红的色彩魅惑之气十足。双核独显的配置对于用户的日常体验上来看，日常办公绰绰有余的同时，玩3D网游和影音娱乐都能够轻松应对。

description.hltext_display: 大盘重拾升势近在眼前
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
周三上证指数在2900点附近震荡整理,终盘一小阴线报收,成交量较上一交易日略有萎缩。板块方面:钢铁板块、海南板块、有色金属等小幅上涨,生物育种、文化传播、黄金板块等跌幅超过1%。
从大盘的走势上看,今日大盘震荡走低,盘中出现了两波短线快速下跌,成交量在下跌时明显放大。盘口显示,每一次下跌表面看有非常多的恐慌盘出逃,但是,大盘盘中的下跌的持续性较差,因此,我们认为,今日大盘震荡洗盘的可能性较大,做多主力利用盘中的快速打压手法清洗短线浮筹。 推荐阅读 多头机构强势出击 数十亿资金涌入地产股
[免费诊股] 基金成大涨幕后推手 地产金融给力 沪指重上2900点 明年还有很多靴子会落地 地产全面崛起 低迷格局能否打破 军工行业重组主题蕴含机会 [微博]箱体震荡 小散如何操作 [股吧]利好扎堆的A股杀跌为哪般 [和讯知道]什么是A股、B股？ 从大盘的技术形态上看,今日上证指数盘中下探到20日均线获得支撑,收盘点位虽然低于5日、10日均线,但大盘的近期K线组合仍处于相对强势区域。另外,包括相对强弱指数在内的部分技术指标已经有再次走强的迹象,如果本周的后几个交易日,上证指数能站稳2910点,就会有多个技术指标发出买入信号。
操作上,上证指数的60分钟K线提示,大盘在2850点上方企稳的可能性较大,因此,我们继续建议投资者逢低增加仓位,等待大盘出现反弹。

description.hltext_display: Zoom Recorders, Effects, and Multitrackers Now Available at Musician's Friend
description.content:
Music Gear Retailer Announces Full Line Of Zoom Audio Gear Now In Stock
Medford, OR (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
Direct marketer of musical instruments, Musician's Friend announced it now offers products from audio gear manufacturer Zoom, a brand famous for its effects processors. In addition to carrying new Zoom handheld audio and video recorders, the retailer supplies the Zoom R16 and R24 multitrackers, two comprehensive tools for audio production, as well as 16 guitar and bass effects processors including several USB compatible and signature pedals from guitar virtuosos Michael Amott and Richie Kotzen. Zoom effect pedals feature 32-bit processors with accurate effect modeling and audio resolution. Zoom's value-conscious gear joins the Musician's Friend assortment of new and used music gear shipping free through the holidays.
About Musician's Friend Musician's Friend, Inc., is a top 50 Internet retailer and the largest direct marketer of musical instruments in the United States. Musician's Friend is a wholly owned subsidiary of Guitar Center, the world's leading retailer of musical equipment. Musician's Friend, Inc., was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Medford, Ore. With more than 90,000 unique products for sale, the company covers a wide range of musical needs, including guitars, basses, amplifiers, keyboards, live sound, recording equipment, drums, percussion, woodwind, brasswind and orchestral stringed instruments, as well as related accessories that are marketed through its print catalogs and websites, including musiciansfriend.com.
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebZoom/Musiciansfriend/prweb4919614.htm

description.hltext_display: 火箭旧将大对决
description.content:
东方网12月21日消息：本周三上海男篮将坐镇主场，迎来新赛季的第五轮比赛，对手是浙江稠州银行队。在经历了两连胜后，主场拿下对手，尽快在积分榜上与领头羊拉近距离将是上海男篮的唯一目标。浙江稠州银行目前的战绩是1胜3负，火箭旧将詹姆斯的加盟给了球队极大的帮助，然而过度依赖外援也让浙江队尝到了苦头，客场对阵实力在自己之上的上海队，胜算不高。
看点一：“违约门”面子之争
上海队新援哈里斯，与浙江队的“违约门”一度闹得沸沸扬扬，最终以哈里斯通过电邮向浙江队道歉而结束。明晚，当事人双方将在上海滩对决，哈里斯能否在赛场上用实力为自己挽回面子，值得期待。
看点二：火箭旧将CBA对决
哈里斯和詹姆斯，两位火箭旧将的同场竞技，谁又能更拉风呢？
地点：上海卢湾体育馆
时间：2010年12月22日19：30
两队上赛季交锋记录[上海队2战1胜1负]：第2轮浙江98-96上海；第19轮上海100-90浙江

description.hltext_display: Danskar rekordnegativa till euron
description.author: Av: TT-Ritzau
description.content:
Danskarna har aldrig varit så negativa till euron som nu, enligt Danske Banks kvartalsvisa opinionsmätningar. På ett kvartal har gapet mellan nej och ja vuxit från 5 till 13 procentenheter. Nu säger 42 procent av danskarna ja eller kanske ja till att införa EU-valutan, medan 55 procent säger nej.
Mätningen gjordes under de två första veckorna i december. Av: TT-Ritzau

description.hltext_display: Ministério admite que vai ser difícil fazer cortes de 15 por cento sem pôr em causa os cuidados de saúde
description.content:
Ana Jorge assume que sector da saúde está subfinanciado. Finanças em silêncio. CDS quer ministra no Parlamento.
“Medidas permitem enfrentar o cenário de restrições que se impõe com o OE”, disse Ana Jorge em Novembro (Foto: Miguel Manso/arquivo)
O Ministério da Saúde (MS) admitiu ontem, pela primeira vez, que os planos de redução de custos para 2011 podem pôr em causa a qualidade dos cuidados. Confrontada pelo PÚBLICO com o alerta do presidente da Associação Portuguesa dos Administradores Hospitalares (APAH), Pedro Lopes, a porta-voz de Ana Jorge respondeu: "Vai ser este um dos grandes desafios da gestão do SNS em 2011. Acreditamos que possa ser possível, reconhecendo desde já a dificuldade do cumprimento deste objectivo."
O DE noticiou ontem ainda que os maiores hospitais do país não obedeceram aos cortes de 15 por cento nos custos operacionais impostos pelo Ministério das Finanças para o próximo ano. Na resposta por escrito, a porta-voz do Ministério da Saúde revelou que "os dados em causa foram carregados numa base de dados do Ministério das Finanças. O Ministério da Saúde aguarda o envio desses documentos". O PÚBLICO confrontou o Ministério de Teixeira dos Santos, mas não obteve qualquer resposta até à hora de fecho desta edição.
As contas do Serviço Nacional de Saúde (SNS) continuam a gerar polémica. A derrapagem de 100 milhões em apenas três meses para 200,2 milhões de euros, ontem noticiada pelo PÚBLICO, com base na execução do terceiro trimestre divulgada pela Administração Central do Sistema de Saúde (ACSS), não bate certo com os 500 milhões anunciados pelo ministro das Finanças aquando da apresentação da proposta de Orçamento do Estado para 2011.
Confrontada pela Antena 1 com esta divergência, a ministra da Saúde explicou que o défice do SNS não contabiliza as despesas dos hospitais EPE, o que acontece quando as contas são feitas a nível do Ministério das Finanças, que contabiliza "tudo aquilo que é o sector Estado".
"Há um défice calculado para este ano do SNS de cerca de 200 milhões de euros. Apontámos isso há algum tempo, achamos que isso que vai acontecer", disse Ana Jorge, admitindo que pode até ser "menor" do que o previsto no final do ano e inferior a 2009 (cerca de 300 milhões de euros). A ministra admitiu ainda, pela primeira vez, que existe um subfinanciamento na saúde, uma área que "cronicamente e tradicionalmente se diz que é subfinanciada".
Questionada pela PÚBLICO se este subfinanciamento não irá agravar-se com os cortes previstos para o próximo ano, a porta-voz de Ana Jorge salientou que "o subfinanciamento da saúde em Portugal é um facto invocado desde há muitos anos, não é uma questão de 2010 ou de 2011". "Os cortes previstos exigirão maiores rigor e criatividade na gestão da prestação de cuidados de saúde", acrescentou. Esta resposta revela, porém, uma evolução no discurso dos responsáveis do Ministério da Saúde. A 4 de Novembro, no Parlamento, a ministra assegurava: "As medidas que tomámos [em Maio] permitem enfrentarmos o cenário de restrições que se impõem com a proposta de OE que apresentamos (...) é bom não esquecer que em 2003, 2004 e 2005 (...) a verba do SNS estava claramente suborçamentada, como as respectivas execuções o vieram confirmar."
Este ano, apesar do ligeiro aumento (0,6 por cento) da dotação do SNS, as contas estão a derrapar. Isto apesar de Óscar Gaspar, o secretário de Estado da Saúde com o pelouro das contas, sempre ter assumido que o OE/2010 "não tem folgas" mas tem os "instrumentos necessários para uma execução adequada em termos orçamentais". Apesar de o défice do exercício ter duplicado em apenas três meses, o Ministério garantiu em comunicado que "a despesa do SNS está controlada". O MS continua é sem revelar a estimativa do défice acumulado até ao final deste ano. O CDS-PP anunciou ontem que vai requerer a presença da ministra da Saúde, Ana Jorge, no Parlamento por considerar que "o descontrolo do défice no SNS assumiu proporções sem precedentes".

description.hltext_display: XIPWIRE.com Selects Paulson Management Group, Inc. for Affiliate Program Management
description.content:
XIPWIRE.com, innovators in developing a system that facilitates easy mobile payments via text message, has selected Paulson Management Group, Inc., an affiliate marketing agency headquartered in Boulder, CO, with offices in London UK to launch and manage their affiliate program in the Commission Junction affiliate network.
Boulder, CO (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
XIPWIRE.com, innovators in developing a system that facilitates easy mobile payments via text message, has selected Paulson Management Group, Inc., an affiliate marketing agency headquartered in Boulder, CO, with offices in London UK to launch and manage their affiliate program in the Commission Junction affiliate network.
XIPWIRE.com revolutionized mobile payments, making it simple and secure to send and receive payments and donations with a text message. XIPWIRE.com takes the convenience of mobile payments to a whole new level, allowing people to “XIP” money to friends, family, businesses, and even their favorite non-profits by simply typing in a code and pressing send. XIPWIRE.com has proven especially useful to non-profit organizations, allowing supporters to quickly and anonymously send a donation by texting a certain code to a given number. XIPWIRE is one of the only organizations still accepting donations for WikiLeaks, and allows supporters to do so completely anonymously if they wish. XIPWIRE.com features a patent-pending security feature that allows users to send and receive money anonymously, taking non-profit donations to a whole new level of easy.
XIPWIRE is also a boon to businesses looking for ways to add convenient payment options to their services. Customers can also easily send mobile payments to friends and families to repay a friendly loan or chip in for that unexpected lunch with co-workers. XIPWIRE offers multiple services to make it a safe, trusted method of donating to causes or sending mobile payments for goods or services, including a patent-pending automatic, photo verification option that ensures your account at businesses cannot be used fraudulently. XIPWIRE also has a trademarked feature that enables users to share accounts with other users call Trusted Wallets.
The XIPWIRE.com affiliate program, launching soon in the Commission Junction affiliate network, will offer a generous $2.00 commission for every qualified lead. The XIPWIRE affiliate program will feature a 90-day cookie, and an array of banners and text media to assist affiliates in successfully promoting the XIPWIRE.com affiliate program.
Paulson Management Group, Inc., a full-service affiliate management agency out of Boulder, CO, is pleased to offer their services and proprietary affiliate management technologies to assist the growth of the XIPWIRE.com affiliate program. PMG affiliate management team members will utilize PMG tools such as PMG AffMan™, which assists the team in effectively matching affiliates to an individual affiliate program for recruitment, and PMG UniTrac™ a multi network tracking system which alleviates fraud and enhances reporting. Paulson Management Group, Inc. looks forward to working with XIPWIRE to build a robust affiliate program with a large number of active affiliate partners.
Affiliates interested in signing up for, or learning more about the XIPWIRE.com affiliate program, can visit PaulsonManagementGroup.com for more details.
-- About PaulsonManagementGroup.com
Paulson Management Group, Inc. is located in the technology hub of Boulder, Colorado, with an office in London UK. PMG launches and manages affiliate programs for retailers and service providers interested in their affiliate channel's success. PMG is the premier affiliate management agency with proprietary technologies built to streamline sales efficacy for the affiliate programs under their managed care.
PMG is the original developer of PMG-AffiliateTV™ the UniTrac™ Multi network tracking system, the AffMan™ affiliate merchant matching system, the PhoneTrac™ affiliate phone sales tracker, ValidSale™ sales validation tool, and the PMG CouponFeeder™ for affiliates. PMG has access to over 30 million affiliates via Syntryx. Visit PaulsonManagementGroup.com to learn more about affiliate marketing for your brand.
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4919634.htm

description.hltext_display: 結婚に向けて見苦しくなってきた彼女 - ぶつかる意味がわからない
description.content:
私は38歳、彼女は36歳です。縁があって来年結婚することになりました。私も彼女ももういい年で、若い頃の様な燃え上がる情熱はありませんが、お互いを尊重しつつ相応の付き合いを続けております。
ところが、具体的に結婚に向けた話しを進めているうちに、だんだん彼女の様子がおかしくなってきました。結納はこう、婚約指輪はこう、新婚旅行はこう、新居はこう、家具はこう、といった具合に、彼女の中にはかなり具体的なイメージが固まっている様なのですが、いずれも随分派手で大げさな内容であり、かなり違和感があります。ただこれらは私たち二人或いはせいぜい家族の範囲内の話なので、気の済む様にさせてあげるつもりですが、極め付きは彼女が夢想する派手派手な結婚式です。
我々は四捨五入すると40だし、本当は、それなりのレストランでごく親しい親族・友人を招いて手作り感のある式・披露宴をしたかったのですが、それは諦めざるを得ませんでした。
それでも、
なあ、なんで忙しいのに講義に通ってまで教会で式を挙げるの？
お色直しをそんなにする必要あるの（白無垢とウェディングドレスはかぶってるだろ）？
なにそのウェディングドレス？自分の二の腕見たことあるだろ？
お色直し後のドレスの胸元がなんでそんなに開いてるの？見苦しいでしょ。
10年も音信不通の友人にまで動員かける必要あるの？
そもそもこのホテルでなくちゃ駄目っていう理由が良く判んないよ。オレの大学の同窓が利用する○○○○でいいじゃん、格式もあるし、メシも旨いし。
毎日喧嘩です。
どうも友人達の中では遅い結婚となる様なので、満を持してという気持ちの様なのですが、私の意向は完全に置き去りです。
そんなところで見栄張って、人間として薄く見えるよ？
何とか彼女を思いとどまらせたく考えておりますが、客観的なご意見をお聞かせください。
ユーザーID：2698820690
お気に入り登録数：943
古いレス順
レス数：399本
1 2 3 4 5 すべて トピ主のみ(9)
タイトル
投稿者
大
2010年12月19日 19:14
あなたが言う通り、見苦しい
その彼女、変ですよ・・・
結婚やめた方がいいと思う
ユーザーID：8553921420
momo
2010年12月19日 19:16
普段は冷静な彼女が、”Ｔｈｅ・結婚・イベント”にだけ人間変わっているのなら、出来るだけお付き合いしてあげたほうがいいですよ。
イベント後の生活にもかかわることには引き締めも大事ですが、イベントに夢持って夢持って生きてきたのかも知れません。
思うようにやらせてあげれば、のちの生活の幸せが保証されます。
それより、わざわざ教会に通ってまでするなら、あなたのために、と恩を着せてポイント稼いだ方がいいです。似合わないドレスは、彼女の親兄弟や友人にも意見を聞いて、やめさせた方が親切です。
まあ、がんばってください。式が終わって3か月もしたら元に戻りますから。
ユーザーID：9975802802
人生一度きり
2010年12月19日 19:18
そういう女性の価値観・金銭感覚はいくら言っても変えることはできない。
今からそんな状況じゃ、この先ほんと思いやられるね・・
もう一度、考え直したほうがいいと思う。
ユーザーID：9296007377
たまご
2010年12月19日 19:20
トピ主さんは堅実でまっとうな金銭感覚の持ち主だとお見受けしました。
トピ主さんたちと同年代・既婚女です。
われわれは披露宴に関してはトピ主さんと同じような感覚だったのですが、私の親が「一流ホテルでやらないのは恥」「出席者に手作りのギフトだなんてみっともない」だのなんだのと口を挟み、本人たちの意向無視の派手披露宴になってしまいました。
今思えば、本人たちの意向重視で、と突っぱねることもできたのでしょうが、しこりを残したくなかったのです。でも、結果としてわれわれは妻実家とは距離を置き、夫実家と親しくする関係で定着しています。
この場合はお相手が派手に披露したいと言っている以上、避けようがないですよね。
結婚式・披露宴の時だけで済むならあと数ヶ月辛抱すればいい話。
でも私はそういうお相手が、結婚後身の丈に合った生活をしていけるのか、そこに不安を覚えます。やめるなら今のうち、でしょうね。
ま、お付き合いしている間に見抜けなかったトピ主さんもトピ主さんということで、このまま進むのもありかと思います。
お幸せに！
ユーザーID：3302216380
しずか
2010年12月19日 19:23
結婚前の、そういったゴタゴタを処理することこそが
結婚生活を順調におくるための第一関門であり
最大の難所です。
いいかげんに流してしまってはいけません。
お互いが十分に納得するまで、出来るまで
すり合わせをすることをオススメします。
ここをいいかげんに済ますと、後々ほころびが出てきますよ。
毎日喧嘩で良いと思います。
妥協せず本音を出し合って頑張ってください。
ユーザーID：5837709259
あいラン
2010年12月19日 19:33
お二方のご両親はどう思ってるのでしょうか？
資金は大丈夫ですか？
見栄もあるのでしょうがお二人に見合ったお式で十分だと思います。
そんなに気合入れてあれもこれもやりたいこと全部やって・・・！白無垢にドレスもって・・・どんだけ結婚式に気合入れてるの！？って周りは内心ドン引きですよ。
人に見せるお式は少し控えめなほうがお上品でよい式だと思いますね。
披露宴をどこか店を貸しきって会費制でおしゃれにするのがうらやましがられますよ＾＾
ユーザーID：8928371635
真央
2010年12月19日 19:37
私たち夫婦も昨年、私36歳と夫37歳で結婚しました。
私たちもすごくもめて、毎日喧嘩してました。
36歳であれば、やっとという思いはぬぐいきれないと思います。
堂々と手にとった結婚情報誌を見れば、妄想は膨れ上がります。
いままでたくさんの式に出てきたのだから、その経験も踏まえれば、妄想は無限大です。
十分に妄想させてあげてください。
ただ、本当に彼女を愛しているなら（愛してるのですよね？）、ブレーキを掛けられるのはトピ主さんだけです。
彼女にとっては耳の痛いことだらけでしょうけど、「なんのための結婚式なのか」をテーマできちんと話し合えば納得してもらえると思いますよ。
私の場合は、以下に説得されました。
都内高級ホテル→実家近くの神社
ウェディングドレスお色直し→母の訪問着
たくさんの友人→2人
今では本当によい式だったと思ってますし、親族からは大好評でした。
夫の「結婚式は育ててくれた両親に見せるもの」という一言が効きましたね。
私の両親は私の好きなようにって言ってくれてましたが。。。。結果、とても喜んでくれました。
ユーザーID：6645552092
コタツムリなう
2010年12月19日 19:38
結婚式に理想を抱き続ける期間が長い人だとそういう方向に突っ走る人多いですね。若いとお金がないから派手婚はできないし、親に援助してもらうとそれはそれで親の意向を無視できないから常識的な式になりますしね。
式の派手さはお金と比例するのでお互いに折り合いをつけなければならないですが、ドレスだけは好きなのを選んでもらっては？二の腕を隠せるドレスなんてないですよ。何を着ても太いもんは太い。ダイエットするしかないです。
ユーザーID：0243416085
るるるの女房
2010年12月19日 19:40
とても冷たくてびっくりしました。。。
ご自身ではそう感じませんでしょうか？
二の腕、胸元を30過ぎてさらすと、他人ならともかく旦那様からも
そんな風に批判されてしまうのでしょうか？
正直、20代で結婚した若い友人らの結婚式も
「演出過多」、「自己満足なんだろうな」と感じたこともしばしば。
でも本人たちのお祝いの席なのですから、思う存分楽しんでもらって
良いと思いました。
年齢は関係ありません。
仮にですが奥様が26歳だったとしたら、喜んですべて
言いなりになったのでしょうか？
「若くてかわいいお嫁さんをもらえた！」とお友達に披露したくなるのですか？
だったら26歳の奥様をお探しください。
また逆に、奥様に「40近い旦那で正直おっさんだ。友人にみせられない。式はこっそりやりましょう」といわれても「えへへ、そうだね」っていえますか？
ユーザーID：8586949847
匿名
2010年12月19日 19:42
人間として薄く見えるとか、彼女の考えがちょっとズレてておかしいとお考えのようですが、それは違うと思います。
ただ単に、結婚式等に関するお二人の思いや嗜好が合っていないだけです。
お前の外見は見苦しいのでその格好はやめるのが「正しい」。そのプランは「人間として薄く見える」というのは、あなたの個人的な考えに過ぎないので決して言うべきではないと思います。
華やかな結婚式がみっともないわけではありません。素敵だと思う人もいます。
「自分はそういう式は好きじゃないので、もっと自分の意見も取り入れて歩み寄って欲しい。これでは自分はやや苦痛だ」
という言い方をしてください。
ユーザーID：5783196062
らいらっく
2010年12月19日 19:43
もし彼女が自分の夢のために多く負担すると言うなら、好きにやらせてあげたら？
腕や胸の出るドレスについては、式までにダイエットしたら解決しますし。
でも１０年音信不通の友人招待はちょっぴり迷惑でしょうね。
(人数ＵＰ目的？それとも１０年前に式に参加したから？＝これなら納得)
もし彼女がトピ主さんのお金を目当てに計画しているのなら、
止めさせる理由は「そんなにお金は出せない」で済みますけど。
ユーザーID：4597336782
おっさん
2010年12月19日 19:48
鬱積したものがあるのでしょう。触れてはいけない話題です。
せいぜい予算の上限は決めて、すべて任せましょう。
ユーザーID：8622797254
あいすどーる
2010年12月19日 20:02
Sex and the Cityの映画 パート1の方です。
ぜひご覧くださいな。
もちろん、ご一緒にですよ。
これで、ご本人自らがお気づきになるのでは、
と思いますが、翻意しないようなら、筋金入りです。
いろんなご覚悟を。
ユーザーID：4434860323
ジウン
2010年12月19日 20:09
彼女はもともと結婚式に思い入れのある方なのでしょうね。
それは彼女の価値観なので、変えることは非常に難しいと思います。
彼女の意向に合わせてあげる、または破談にしてトピ主さんと似た価値観の女性を探す、の二者択一でしょう。
それよりも気になったのは、トピ主さんの婚約者に対する上から目線です。
お互いを尊重しつつ相応の付き合いと書いてありますが、トピ文の後半を読むと「いい歳なのだから、若い女性のようなことを望むな」と言うことですよね？
そういう気持ちで結婚されて、彼女と上手くいくのでしょうか？
ユーザーID：8574460983
凛
2010年12月19日 20:14
お2人ともいい年なのでトピ主さんが言うようにごく親しい人だけの式、披露宴の方がいいように思います。正直40前の新婦のお色直しを何回も見たくないかな〜
ですが彼女の理想としている式、披露宴ができなかったら一生ネチネチ言われそうですね。
困りましたね。
結婚前からこんな事でもめてお互い歩みよれないでは前途多難ですね。
ユーザーID：9170143036
mico
2010年12月19日 20:16
トピ主さんのセンスに同意します。
確かに、彼女の鼻息の荒さは、傍目にはイタイ。
けれども、自分が結婚式にむけて準備していた時、やはりそれなりの夢、たった一回の晴れ舞台に大きな期待と願望を抱き、思うようにならないことに対してはムキーッとなっていたことも…事実です。
今から思うと、こだわったところこそセンスがいまいちだったり、こだわるその姿が我ながらイタかったり、恥の多い結婚式だったのですが、その中で、しかたないなあと合わせてくれた彼、実、義理の両親、親せき、友人には今でも感謝しています（私もいっぱいあきらめて譲歩しましたが）。
やっぱり、花嫁にとっては夢ですから。
そして今、結婚式にお呼ばれすると、昔とは違うあたたかーい目で、お式を見守る自分がいます。
結婚式する若い人たちが、多少イタくても、それはそれでかわいいのです。
友人たちはともかく、御親戚はそういう目で「若輩者」を祝ってくれるのではないかと思います。
まあ、お恥ずかしいとは思いますが、ここでぶつかったり、彼女の夢を一部叶えてあげたりというのも、長い結婚生活の初めの共同作業かと思うので…ご健闘を祈ります。

description.hltext_display: Nieuwe sneeuw op komst
description.content:
Vanavond en vannacht valt bijna overal in België een nieuwe laag sneeuw. Woensdagmiddag is het somber en mistig, maar het blijft overwegend droog. Er waait een zwakke noordoostenwind en de middagtemperatuur schommelt rond 1 graad. Woensdagavond valt er lichte sneeuw of aanvriezende regen over de zuidoostelijke helft van het land.
Woensdagnacht sneeuwt het op vele plaatsen behalve in een strook dicht bij de kust. In de zuidoostelijke landshelft valt de neerslag enige tijd onder de vorm van aanvriezende regen. Bij temperaturen van rond of net onder het vriespunt kan het dus glad worden op de weg. Donderdag is het zwaarbewolkt met af en toe sneeuw. Aan zee en in het westen valt weinig neerslag. Ten zuiden van de Ardennen valt eerst nog aanvriezende regen die nadien overgaat in sneeuw. Er waait een matige, aan de kust een krachtige noordoostenwind. De middagtemperatuur schommelt rond het vriespunt. Vrijdag is het zwaarbewolkt met lichte sneeuwval. Er waait een gure noordoostenwind bij een middagtemperatuur rond het vriespunt. Op beide kerstdagen en ook begin volgende week is het droog met opklaringen en wolkenvelden. Overdag vriest het licht en 's nachts komt matige, plaatselijk strenge vorst voor.

description.hltext_display: 卓越品质，超凡应用――三星商用笔记本年终巡礼
description.author: CBSi中国・ZOL
description.content:
在当前这样一个笔记本电脑办公极为普及的时代，一台设计全面、品质出众的笔记本电脑，对于保护信息、提高工作效率，有着多么重要的意义不言而喻。在即将过去的2010年，三星商用笔记本能够赢得政教、金融、电信等各大行业市场的青睐，多次获得采购大单，便是得益于其卓越的产品品质和深厚的品牌积淀。
长久以来，三星商用笔记本秉持原厂制造、高效易用的性能和领先的设计，构筑磐石般的坚强品质，无时无刻不在助力企业的高效团队和骨干员工释放强大竞争力。
原厂制造：卓越品质的基石
与很多笔记本品牌采用OEM生产商代加工不同，三星商用笔记本全部是由位于苏州的三星全球唯一生产基地制造。在这里，三星打造出中国用户的特有产品、推出专门针对行业用户的专有产品线。原厂制造确保了三星商用笔记本产品始终如一的高品质，它也是三星商用笔记本最核心的竞争优势之一。
出众的品质还源于专业严谨的测试标准。每一台三星商用笔记本出厂前都必经包括按键、压力、跌落、噪音、散热、稳定性、兼容性等数百项严格测试。千锤百炼之下诞生的三星商用笔记本即使在苛刻、复杂的使用环境中，也能持续稳定地为用户创造价值。高效易用：卓越品质的支柱
三星商用笔记本以高效、易用的产品性能，全面贴合商务用户高效工作的需求，帮助企业创造富有激情与效率的出色团队。
为了满足商务人士笔记本电脑使用方面的高效、便捷，功能扩展等需求，在产品性能与配置上，以经典P系列为代表的新一代三星商用笔记本电脑均配备了英特尔最新酷睿i3/i5处理器，使得整机拥有更强的数据处理能力，提高了工作效率；而Nvidia Geforce高性能显卡，可帮助用户从容地应对各种2D、3D图形处理问题，在处理Photoshop、3D Studio MAX等工作软件，甚至在运行时下市面上的主流3D游戏时，也能做到游刃有余，毫不费力。不仅如此，三星商用笔记本还配备了HDMI、USB2.0、RJ45、耳机输出、麦克风输入等齐全的输入、输出接口，以方便与投影机、话筒等其他多媒体设备配合使用；加入了WIFI通讯模组，通过三星的点对点传输软件，可以轻松实现电脑之间的实时数据传输和共享，方便快捷；支持蓝牙、摄像头，方便用户随时进行有效地沟通。简单易用的设置极大方便了多媒体接驳和移动办公的需求。领先设计：卓越品质的精髓
三星笔记本电脑从生产流水线到液晶屏、硬盘等主要部件全部由三星自主研发。在行业内坚持自主创新以保持核心竞争力，以领先的设计和技术引领潮流。选择三星是品质与信誉的双重保障。
三星商用笔记本整机表面均采用高科技喷涂工艺，能有效减少表面被划伤可能。LED背光源液晶屏，相较于CCFL背光源，直降功耗达30%以上。操控区采用独岛式键盘，键深、键程，以及键盘反弹力度均切合人体工学原理，键盘表面更是经过了绿色环保的银离子涂层处理。人性化的设计令点滴之处突显贴心照顾，为您带来简便快捷的操作环境和无后顾之忧的健康生活。在产品内部结构设计上，三星商用同样投入了大量精力，全部采用国际一流元器件，不断提高主板结构、防震系统的整体性能，散热系统采用U型中空铜导管加涡轮风扇，大幅提升散热能力，与整机外壳多出风口分散设计构成超强的散热系统，有效保证硬件系统性能稳定。另外，在新一代P系列产品上还提供BIOS硬盘密码、硬盘跌落保护、防泼溅键盘等一系列数据保护措施，确保商务用户信息的最高安全级别。
不仅如此，三星可以为每位集团客户提供商用笔记本定制服务，如定制独特的屏保、界面等为您带来更加个性化的设计，有力地提升企业整体形象。还可以与三星打印机、电视、监控系统、数码等其他产品搭配应用，为集团客户提供更多更好的商用解决方案。世界500强企业三星集团，凭借在液晶屏、内存、硬盘、光驱、电池等生产领域全球领先技术和制造优势，采用高品质配件和严格的工艺，制造出品质超群的三星商用笔记本，时刻为用户带来稳定高效的极致办公体验。面对竞争与机遇并存的市场环境，相信三星能够率先抓住新的机遇，领跑2011年的商用笔记本电脑市场；也相信任何一位注重效率、看重内在品质、了解笔记本电脑产品内涵的用户，都会把三星商用笔记本作为自己的不二之选。

description.hltext_display: New Penn Financial Taps Former Bank Executive to Head Financial...
description.content:
New Penn Financial, LLC, a leading nationwide mortgage lender, today announced the appointment of Bob Wexler as its Vice President of the newly formed Financial Services Division. New Penn’s Financial Services Division provides wholesale and correspondent mortgage lending to brokers, banks and credit unions. Reporting to President and Chief Executive Officer, Jerry Schiano, Bob will oversee operations of the Financial Services Division including mortgage originations.
“Bob’s leadership and deep banking experience are important additions to New Penn Financial at this stage of the company’s development,” said Jerry Schiano. “His business management skills and solid reputation in the banking community will build on our track record of responsible lending as we position the company for future growth.”
Prior to joining New Penn Financial, Mr. Wexler served as Executive Vice President of Public Savings Bank. Mr. Wexler also served as the Executive Vice President of Allied Mortgage Group, where he held various strategic management roles and helped the company expand its Wholesale Lending division. His background also includes mortgage origination roles at First Union Corporation and First Virginia Bank.
Despite the downturn in financial services, New Penn Financial continues to grow year over year based on the strength of its people, mortgage lending expertise, and an unwavering commitment to responsible lending practices.
“It’s exciting to be part of an organization with such a firm commitment to growing the business. In today’s market, you need a solid balance sheet and a clear strategy to differentiate yourself from the pack. We will be providing a platform of mortgage products and technology to our wholesale and correspondent partners that will enable them to service their customers in an entirely new way,” said Bob Wexler.
About New Penn Financial: New Penn Financial, LLC is a leading nationwide lender that serves consumers, brokers and financial institutions with a customer-focused, responsive and reliable lending approach. Providing borrowers expertise and personal attention, the company offers some of the lowest mortgage rates available on a full suite of products, which include fixed-rate loans, adjustable rate mortgage loans (ARMs), jumbo loans, FHA mortgages and more. Founded in 2008, New Penn is headquartered in Plymouth Meeting, Pennsylvania and also operates offices in: Columbia, Maryland; Charlotte, North Carolina; Medina, Ohio; Virginia Beach, Virginia; Concord, California; Roseville, California; Oakbrook Terrace; Illinois; Melville, New York, Alpharetta, Georgia; Portland, Oregon; and Boca Raton, Florida. The company now employs approximately 300 employees and serves thousands of customers. More information is available at http://www.newpennfinancial.com and http://www.gonewpenn.com and on social media sites: http://www.twitter.com/newpennllc and http://www.facebook.com/newpennfinancial.

description.hltext_display: LARSSON'S GIRLFRIEND PLANS TELL-ALL BOOK
description.content: The grieving girlfriend of late author STIEG LARSSON has written her own account of the months following the writer's death in 2004 - in an effort to stop journalists hounding her for secrets about her life with the Swedish author. Eva Gabrielsson dated The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo author for 32 years and has been at war with the writer's father and brother over his post-death fortune since Larsson's mysterious death. Tired of talking about her dispute with Joakim and Erland Larsson, she has decided to put her thoughts into words - and her book about the saga will hit stores next year (11). She tells Rolling Stone magazine, "I am done with refuting things about Stieg, about me and what happened after he died. Therefore, I have written a book about it, and I hope that will be the end of all (the) lies and speculation." Larsson died virtually penniless months before his Millennium trilogy of books turned him into one of the world's bestselling author. The Larsson's offered Gabrielsson $2.6 million (1.73 million) from her late boyfriend's estate but she refused the cash. The writer's brother, Joakim, tells the publication he has no idea what Gabrielsson wants.

description.hltext_display: Saunders' attorneys hope to suppress evidence in ex-Dover woman's murder trial
description.content:
@Cutline nameline:Dianna Saunders
DOVER — Lawyers for murder conspiracy suspect Dianna Saunders were in a pretrial hearing Tuesday hoping to suppress evidence they believe wasn't properly attained by the prosecution.
Saunders is expected to face a jury in early February on charges she allegedly conspired to commit murder and is an accomplice to first-degree murder of longtime boyfriend David King. She has pleaded not guilty to those charges.
On Tuesday, Saunders sat handcuffed in Strafford County Superior Court while her defense lawyers, Jeff Karp and Robert Sheketoff, questioned potential witnesses including a Texas investigator who was present when Dover Police Lt. Bill Breault questioned Saunders at a home located near Fort Worth, Texas, after King's death as part of the investigation.
Karp said they are looking at the legitimacy of Breault's version of the conversation since he did not record or take notes during the interview.
Dover Police Officer Janine Harrington was also brought forward during Tuesday's hearing for having interviewed Saunders on the night of King's death. Defense lawyers stated they were looking for any indication that Saunders did not willingly give permission for Dover police to search her house and vehicles the night of King's death.
Authorities have said Saunders wanted King dead and paid her ex-husband, Roy Saunders, $8,000 to arrange the murder. Roy Saunders allegedly then paid his son, Derek Saunders, and Scott Mazzone to commit the killing.
Derek Saunders and Mazzone allegedly drove from Massachusetts to King's 81 Old Dover Point Road home on Aug. 29, 2008, and Mazzone killed King by shooting him in the head and then slitting his throat.
Roy Saunders killed himself in April 2009, just as he was scheduled to turn himself in on a charge of accomplice to second-degree murder. Mazzone and Derek Saunders both negotiated plea deals in May 2009 with the state Attorney General's Office that are contingent on their cooperation with the investigation into Dianna Saunders.
Saunders also went to court for allegedly seeking claim to King's life insurance policy.
During the investigation to Saunders alleged involvement in King's murder, police interviewed a licensed insurance agent who said Saunders bought a $350,000 life insurance policy for King in January 2006 with herself as the sole beneficiary.
She also later purchased a second policy on King in April 2006 for $150,000, again making herself the sole beneficiary.
King's family also is seeking claim to the policy, but it's likely that issue won't be resolved until the end of the criminal trial.
Judge Marguerite Wageling will continue the pretrial hearing today.
Prosecutors are estimating a three-week trial in February while Saunders' defense attorneys said it can be completed in one day since they only have one witness.
Saunders is currently being held at the Strafford County jail.

event_or_fact.property: they are looking at the legitimacy of Breault's version of the conversation since he did not record or take notes during the interview

description.hltext_display: Jack Jaffa & Associates Unveils New Software for NYC Landlords
description.content:
Amid tightened property violation reinforcement, landlords find alert tracking software effective in controlling complaints and fines.
Brooklyn, NY (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
Feeling the pinch of the economic downturn, landlords have increasingly moved to take the sting out of what was once, in the not so distant past, little more than one of seemingly unavoidable annoyances of owning commercial real estate.
Building violations, the wide range of penalties that almost all commercial owners receive at one time or another, used to eat into the bottom line in nibbles rather than bites.
While the current choppy economic times may have been enough to push most landlords to re-examine what were once thought of as trivial and inevitable costs, the city, facing looming deficits in the future, has also taken steps in recent months to make these penalties more painful and to accelerate the time owners have to deal with them.
“It used to be that if you missed a hearing date for a violation, you had a year to reschedule. Now it's 45 days and the penalties have jumped if you don't respond in that time frame,” said Michael Jaffa, an executive at his family's firm, Jack Jaffa & Associates, which provides software and other services that help landlords and property management companies track and deal with building violations.
“Fines that used to be $2,500 were raised this year to $8,000 and $10,000,” Jaffa said.
In recent months, Jack Jaffa & Associates unveiled a new line of software that Michael Jaffa said the company had been developing for many months.
The programs allow building owners and property managers to receive alerts and track violations as well as opt electronically whether to have Jaffa take care of the infractions for them. Michael Jaffa said that his family's company has streamlined a process that had become difficult for many landlords and even experienced property managers to negotiate.
Owners can receive building violations for a host of reasons. Tenants or visitors to a building can trigger them by reporting a problem in a building such as litter or a non-functioning elevator. Building owners can also receive penalties if work is being done on a property either without a permit or with one that has expired.
Even seemingly innocuous offenses are closely tracked by the city, such as whether a building's boiler has been inspected and properly filed.
“It isn't the late 1980s when the City was lax in enforcing violations. They've sent the message out loud and clear that they'll be enforcing and collecting on all outstanding violations and compliance issues,” Jaffa said.
Negotiating the bureaucracy in dealing with a violation is not for the faint of heart, according to Jaffa. A number of different city agencies such as the Environmental Control Board, the Department of Buildings, and the Department of Housing Preservation and Development issue summons and each has its own system for curing the offense.
“Sometimes landlords don't even get the notice that they have received a violation, because it's sent to the property address and not the managing agent of the owner's office,” Jaffa said.
“It's also difficult for owners to deal with these violations and time consuming. An owner will go in and find out that he or she filled out the documents incorrectly, or provided insufficient documentation that the problem has been ameliorated in order to get their fine reduced.
“Our software and services streamlines that whole process and makes it completely transparent.”
Jaffa said that his firm helped convince city officials last year to create a one-time three-month period during which owners could cure outstanding offenses at a lower charge than the maximum that is assessed against those who have either overlooked or ignored past violations.
You can view December's issue of The Jack Jaffa Report, "2010- A Year in Review", by clicking here.
By Linda O'Flanagan - Real Estate Weekly� � � � # # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4907194.htm

event_or_fact.property: his family's company has streamlined a process that had become difficult for many landlords and even experienced property managers to negotiate.
the company had been developing for many months

his firm helped convince city officials last year to create a one-time three-month period during which owners could cure outstanding offenses at a lower charge than the maximum that is assessed against those who have either overlooked or ignored past viol

description.hltext_display: Nilton Parreira pode render Nélson dos Santos na GNR
description.content:
O general Nélson dos Santos, que estava a exercer as funções de comandante-geral da GNR, vai abandonar o cargo até final do ano. Para o seu lugar perfila-se agora o general Nilton Parreira, que já exerce funções na Inspecção-Geral da GNR.
O general Nélson dos Santos tomou posse em Maio de 2008 ()
A saída de Nélson dos Santos, que está no final de uma comissão de serviço de três anos - é oriundo do Exército, como de resto o são os restantes dez generais que estão ali colocados -, fica a dever-se a questões de saúde e também a algum desencanto face às difíceis condições financeiras da corporação.
Quando, há três anos, chegou à GNR, Nélson dos Santos deparou-se com um processo de reestruturação interna que já se encontrava em marcha por imposição do então ministro da Administração Interna, António Costa. As brigadas territoriais estavam a ser extintas, assim como a Brigada Fiscal e a Brigada de Trânsito (BT). Estas alterações, que em princípio deveriam fazer reduzir os custos na GNR e implicavam uma reorganização dos postos de chefia, foram altamente contestadas. Ainda hoje há quem defenda, por exemplo, que o aumento da sinistralidade rodoviária verificado nos últimos tempos se ficou a dever ao fim da BT.
Nélson dos Santos é visto dentro da GNR como um homem "de grande dimensão humana", conforme disse ao PÚBLICO o presidente da assembleia geral da Associação dos Profissionais da Guarda (APG), José Manageiro. Os dirigentes da APG reconhecem que o comandante cessante teve parcos recursos financeiros para poder desempenhar melhor as suas funções, ao ponto de não ter conseguido aprovar a promoção de milhares de soldados para o posto imediato.
Entre as falhas apontadas à governação do general conta-se o facto de não ter conseguido implementar um horário de trabalho na GNR e de não ter conseguido fazer vingar os direitos associativos no Conselho Superior da Guarda. Se a tradição se mantiver, a saída do comandante-geral da GNR implicará também o abandono do segundo comandante, o tenente-general Mário Cabrita.

description.hltext_display: COAI releases 2nd Edition of the Kindle™ Best Seller “Inside the Giant Machine: An Amazon.com Story”
description.content:
Center of Artificial Imagination releases 2nd edition of the best-selling Kindle™ book “Inside the Giant Machine: An Amazon.com Story,” by author-technologist Kalpanik S. The second edition of the book has grown in size and breadth of content, and includes further details of Amazon's transformation from an online retailer to a market place where other sellers come to sell their products. In two news bonus chapters, the author describes his self- publishing experience on Kindle™ and CreateSpace.
Seattle, WA (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
- Center of Artificial Imagination has just released the 2nd edition of the best-selling Kindle™ Book “Inside the Giant Machine: An Amazon.com Story,” by Kalpanik S. This edition includes five new chapters, giving further details of Amazon's transformation from a retailer to a marketplace which enabled it to surpass its long time Nemesis, eBay, in profits. The author, a former Amazon.com technologist conitue to use humor and his sharp wit to make his description of the inner workings of Amazon.com interesting as he explains how Amazon learned from its e-commerce nemesis, eBay and leveraged its own unique advantages to launch a eCommerce platform leading to its supremacy in both the online retail and online marketplace segments,
Intermixed with the main story, we also get a glimpse of his yearning for acceptance as an immigrant, his adjustment to and acceptance of midlife, and his struggle as a technologist to find harmony in the chaos of the Internet revolution.
In this greatly expanded 2nd edition which was released earlier today on Kindle(tm), Kalpanik adds more details to his hilarious-yet-touching personal story - how, after leaving behind their home and their friends in Silicon Valley and moving to Seattle to work for Amazon and found himself facing the double whammy of having to cope with both the drastically different Northwest climate and Amazon's unusual work environment. The newly added chapters on Amazon's transformation to a marketplace and its foray in the work of digital publishing, continue to have the fish-out-of-water humor. wisdom and a touch of philosophy. Finally, the author has added two bonus chapters at the end of the book, where he describes his experiences in self-publishing the first edition of the book on Kindle™ and how he used that knowledge to improve the 2nd edition.
“After reviewing feedback from readers for the first edition, we decided to a follow up edition with additional material in the areas where the readers felt that the book fell short." said Kalpanik S. who authored the book. "Kindle platform's flexibility has allowed us to rapidly add new content in response to feedback and release the 2nd edition in less than 10 months. In addition, because of the digital nature of the distribution of Kindle™ content, we did not have to worry about inventory obsolescence which is a major issue while revising printed books. I believe that the additional details included in this newly released 2nd edition further accentuate the story of my unique experiences expressed in my distinctive voice, making this book an entertaining and enjoyable read for everyone.”
To celebrate today's release of the 2nd edition, the publisher, Center of Artificial Imagination, is offering the book on Kindle™ for a special low price till a limited time.
Trademark and Other Notices
Kindle™ and Amazon are registered trademarks of Amazon.com. eBay is a registered trademark of eBay. Even though this book about Amazon and Kindle™ is published using Amazon's digital publishing services (also called the Kindle™ publishing network), this book, like all other books published on Kindle™, is not officially endorsed in any way by Amazon's Kindle™ group.
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebamazon/kindle/prweb4917094.htm

description.hltext_display: Pedophilia Guide Author Denies Book Is Obscene
description.content:
Phillip Greaves Charged With Violating Fla.'s Obscenity Law
UPDATED: 5:06 pm EST December 21, 2010
Email Print
Author Of Pedophilia Guide Faces Charges In Fla.
Embed this Video
Facebook
Digg
Twitter
Yahoo Buzz
Reddit
Delicious
Link
BARTOW, Fla. -- A Colorado man who wrote a how-to guide for pedophiles said Tuesday that his book is not obscene.
Phillip Greaves, 47, of Pueblo, Colo., arrived at the Polk County jail in central Florida on Tuesday morning and is due in court Wednesday afternoon, officials said.
He was arrested Monday in Colorado and charged with violating Florida's obscenity law, a third-degree felony. If convicted, he faces a maximum of five years in state prison.
Speaking to reporters outside the jail Tuesday, Greaves denied the book is obscene and said he plans to fight the charge.
"I characterize it as a book of showing people who have been improperly represented," he said. "And also telling people how they can go about to improve their own lives and so that these people that are being incarcerated now can possibly be rehabilitated."
Polk County Sheriff Grady Judd claims jurisdiction because Greaves sold and mailed the book to undercover deputies who had written him requesting a copy.
Florida's obscenity law prohibits the "distribution of obscene material depicting minors engaged in conduct harmful to minors."
The book was briefly for sale on Amazon.com but was yanked in November after it prompted online outrage.

description.hltext_display: 爱网络 爱生活 极速G10家居摄像头
description.author: CBSi中国・ZOL
description.content:
生活和网络是两个世界，各有着自己的空间和魅力。在生活当中，我们可能忙于奔波，而失去了真实的自我。久了，连自己都不敢面对自己的心灵的真音，逐渐迷失真性。大家都渴望逃避这样的生活，寻求美妙的生活方式。利用周末的时间爬山涉水，而平时下班也要给家里好好打扮一番，做几个小菜，美美的享用，然后在上网找朋友开心。在好好打扮家庭的同时，于是，极速G10摄像头慢慢的出现在了大多女性观众的视线。
有一女性朋友说她特爱生活，努力打扮自己的闺房。被单也成卡通的了，桌子也是蓝色的，就连电脑设备也换成白色带花纹的，可是最后安装摄像头的时候，怎么觉得一个高杆摄像头怎么这么别捏呢，与周围环境极不搭配。于是上网搜索，百度问问，直到极速G10出现在她的视线，才豁然开朗，要是把这么一个摄像头摆放在电脑旁边，哪无疑是最完美的搭配。
说干就干，女孩子的任性真的是男孩子想不到的。直接淘宝搜索“极速G10摄像头”，果然，有许多商家在卖。随便点了一个，价格合适，100元以下还包邮啊。美丽而优雅的图片无法使人拒绝，直接点购买，地址、电话、付款一气呵成，终于完成了一个心事，可以在朋友面前好好的显摆一下了，高杆摄像头，见鬼去吧！
收到包裹就第一时间打开，大大的包装盒让人觉得100元没有百花，嘻嘻。急忙打开包装，一个美丽的摄像头之花躺在面前，整理好拿出来放在电脑装上，耐心的看着它，它没有玫瑰那么妖艳，没有康乃馨那么有气质，总之，它是一种无法言喻的醇美。也许这正是爱上它的原因，总是觉得，把极速G10放在电脑桌上是那么的搭配，乃至完美。想了一下，拿出数码相机，拍一套最新的唯美DIY组合，放到经常聊天的QQ群里去，让别人羡慕去吧！

description.hltext_display: Tsunami-alarm in Japan opgeheven
description.content: TOKIO - In het zuiden van Japan heeft zich dinsdagavond een zeebeving met een kracht van 7,4 voorgedaan. Er werd een tsunami-alarm afgegeven, maar grote vloedgolven bleven uit. Het alarm werd enige tijd later weer ingetrokken. Er zijn geen berichten over gewonden; ook werd nauwelijks schade aangericht. De beving deed zich voor op tien kilometer diepte in de Stille Oceaan, op ongeveer 130 kilometer afstand van de zuidkust van het eiland Chichi.

description.hltext_display: ショック！彼からのメールで名前間違え。。。 - 二人で会うことは話し合うこと？
description.content:
付き合って半年の外国人の彼からのメール（英語）で名前を間違えられました。
とてもショックです。。。
○○子へ という宛名で、最後の「KO」のスペルだけはあっていたのですが、上は全く他の名前で誰なのか心当たりもありません。
元カノ？もしかして浮気相手？などモンモンとしていて、翌日はデートだったのですが、結局行きませんでした。
彼にはメールで（名前の間違いがありショックだったこと、今日は会いたくない）と連絡を入れたのですが、見ていなかったようで、約束の時間を少し過ぎて電話がありました。
その時に再度伝えましたところ、名前に心当たりはない、とにかく会って話し合おうと言われましたが、私は今は会いたくない、少し考える時間がほしいと伝えました。
２-３回そのやり取りがあった後、彼が逆切れし「もういい、勝手にしろ！」と電話をガチャ切りされました。
名前の間違いなど大したことないという方もいると思いますが、私にとっては大きな問題です。
そして、彼が謝らない（Sorryと言わない）ことと、電話をガチャ切りしたこともショックです。
普段の彼はとても温厚で怒ることもなく、大したことでもないのにSorryという言葉を口にします。
外国人は謝らないとよく言いますが、そういう性格ではないかと思います。
私が頑固だからいけないのかなどとモンモンと考えてしまいます。
なんだか愚痴っぽくなってしまいましたが、いろいろな意見を聞ければと思いますので、よろしくお願いいたします。
